3134 C Local variables
3135 C
3136  INTEGER iaa, ib
3137 C
3138  REAL*8 aci, dxidx, g1yi, g2yi
3139  REAL*8 g3yi, pres, rho, rlsli
3140  REAL*8 rlui, rmu, shdrv, shg
3141  REAL*8 shpfun, src, taubar, tauc
3142  REAL*8 taum, u1, u2, u3
3143  REAL*8 ubar, wdetj
3144 C
3145 c
3146  dimension yl(npro,nshl,ndof),
3147  & acl(npro,nshl,ndof),
3148  & shp(nshl,ngauss), shgl(nsd,nshl,ngauss),
3149  & xl(npro,nenl,nsd), dwl(npro,nenl),
3150  & rl(npro,nshl,nflow), ql(npro,nshl,idflx)
3151 c
3152 
3153  dimension xkebe(npro,9,nshl,nshl), xgoc(npro,4,nshl,nshl)
3154 c
3155 c.... local declarations
3156 c
3157  dimension g1yi(npro,ndof), g2yi(npro,ndof),
3158  & g3yi(npro,ndof), shg(npro,nshl,nsd),
3159  & aci(npro,3), dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd),
3160  & wdetj(npro), rho(npro),
3161  & pres(npro), u1(npro),
3162  & u2(npro), u3(npro),
3163  & rlui(npro,nsd), ubar(npro,nsd),
3164  & xmudmi(npro,ngauss), sgn(npro,nshl),
3165  & shpfun(npro,nshl), shdrv(npro,nsd,nshl),
3166  & rmu(npro), tauc(npro),
3167  & taum(npro), taubar(npro),
3168  & src(npro,3)
3169 
3170  dimension rlsl(npro,nshl,6), rlsli(npro,6)
3171 
3172  real*8 rerrl(npro,nshl,6)
3173  integer aa
3174 
3175 c
3176 c DES - TO REMOVE !!!
3177 c.... local reconstruction of diffusive flux vector for quadratics
3178 c or greater but NOT for bflux since local mass was not mapped
3179 c
3180 c if ( idiff==2 .and. ires .eq. 1 ) then
3181 c call e3ql (yl, dwl, shp, shgl,
3182 c & xl, ql, xmudmi,
3183 c & sgn)
3184 c endif
3185 c
3186 c.... loop through the integration points
3187 c
3188  do intp = 1, ngauss
3189 
3190  if (qwt(lcsyst,intp) .eq. zero) cycle ! precaution
3191 c
3192 c.... get the hierarchic shape functions at this int point
3193 c
3194  call getshp(shp, shgl, sgn,
3195  & shpfun, shdrv)
3196 c
3197 c.... get necessary fluid properties (including eddy viscosity)
3198 c
3199  call getdiff(dwl, yl, shpfun, xmudmi, xl, rmu, rho)
3200 c
3201 c.... calculate the integration variables
3202 c
3203  call e3ivar(yl, acl, shpfun,
3204  & shdrv, xl,
3205  & aci, g1yi, g2yi,
3206  & g3yi, shg, dxidx,
3207  & wdetj, rho, pres,
3208  & u1, u2, u3,
3209  & ql, rlui, src,
3210  & rerrl, rlsl, rlsli,
3211  & dwl)
3212 c
3213 c.... compute the stabilization terms
3214 c
3215  call e3stab(rho, u1, u2,
3216  & u3, dxidx, rlui,
3217  & rmu, tauc, taum,
3218  & taubar, ubar )
3219 c
3220 c.... compute the residual contribution at this integration point
3221 c
3222  call e3res( u1, u2, u3,
3223  & ubar, aci, wdetj,
3224  & g1yi, g2yi, g3yi,
3225  & rlui, rmu, rho,
3226  & tauc, taum, taubar,
3227  & shpfun, shg, src,
3228  & rl, pres, acl,
3229  & rlsli)
3230 c
3231 c.... compute the tangent matrix contribution
3232 c
3233  if (lhs .eq. 1) then
3234  call e3lhs( u1, u2, u3,
3235  & ubar, wdetj, rho,
3236  & rlui, rmu,
3237  & tauc, taum, taubar,
3238  & shpfun, shg, xkebe,
3239  & xgoc )
3240  endif
3241 
3242 c
3243 c.... end of integration loop
3244 c
3245  enddo
3246 
3247 c
3248 c.... symmetrize C
3249 c
3250  if (lhs .eq. 1) then
3251  do ib = 1, nshl
3252  do iaa = 1, ib-1
3253  xgoc(:,4,iaa,ib) = xgoc(:,4,ib,iaa)
3254  enddo
3255  enddo
3256  endif
3257 c
3258 c.... return
3259 c
3260  return
3261  end
3262 
3265 
3266  subroutine e3sclr (yl, acl, shp,
3267  & shgl, xl, dwl,
3268  & rl, ql, xsebe,
3269  & sgn, xmudmi)
3270  include "global.h"
3271  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
3272  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
3273  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
3274  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
3275  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
3276  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
3277  include "common_blocks/sclrs.h"
3278  include "common_blocks/solpar.h"
3279 c
3280  real*8 yl(npro,nshl,ndof), acl(npro,nshl,ndof),
3281  & shp(nshl,ngauss), shgl(nsd,nshl,ngauss),
3282  & xl(npro,nenl,nsd), rl(npro,nshl),
3283  & ql(npro,nshl,nsd), xsebe(npro,nshl,nshl),
3284  & dwl(npro,nshl)
3285 c
3286 c.... local declarations
3287 c
3288  real*8 grads(npro,nsd), shg(npro,nshl,nsd),
3289  & sdot(npro), sclr(npro),
3290  & dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd), wdetj(npro),
3291  & u1(npro), u2(npro), u3(npro),
3292  & sgn(npro,nshl), shpfun(npro,nshl),
3293  & shdrv(npro,nsd,nshl), rls(npro),
3294  & taus(npro), diffus(npro),
3295  & srcl(npro), srcr(npro),
3296  & ggrads(npro,nsd), dcfct(npro),
3297  & giju(npro,6)
3298 c
3299 c.... Source terms sometimes take the form (beta_i)*(phi,_i). Since
3300 c the convective term has (u_i)*(phi,_i), it is useful to treat
3301 c beta_i as a "correction" to the velocity. In calculating the
3302 c stabilization terms, the new "modified" velocity (u_i-beta_i) is
3303 c then used in place of the pure velocity for stabilization terms,
3304 c and the source term sneaks into the RHS and LHS.
3305  real*8 umod(npro,nsd), srcrat(npro), xmudmi(npro,ngauss)
3306 c
3307  integer aa, b
3308 c DES - TO REMOVE !!!
3309 c.... local reconstruction of diffusive flux vector
3310 c
3311 c if ( idiff==2 ) then
3312 c call e3qlSclr (yl, dwl, shp, shgl, xl, ql, sgn)
3313 c endif
3314 c
3315 c.... loop through the integration points
3316 c
3317  do intp = 1, ngauss
3318 
3319  if (qwt(lcsyst,intp) .eq. zero) cycle ! precaution
3320 c
3321 c.... get the hierarchic shape functions at this int point
3322 c
3323  call getshp(shp, shgl, sgn,
3324  & shpfun, shdrv)
3325 c
3326 c.... get necessary fluid properties
3327 c
3328  call getdiffsclr(shpfun,dwl,yl,diffus)
3329 c
3330 c.... calculate the integration variables
3331 c
3332  call e3ivarsclr(yl, acl, shpfun,
3333  & shdrv, xl, xmudmi,
3334  & sclr, sdot, grads,
3335  & shg, dxidx, wdetj,
3336  & u1, u2, u3,
3337  & ql, rls, srcr,
3338  & srcl, umod, dwl,
3339  & diffus, srcrat)
3340 
3341 
3342 c
3343 c.... compute the stabilization terms
3344 c
3345  call e3stabsclr(umod, dxidx, taus,
3346  & diffus, srcr, giju,
3347  & srcrat)
3348 c
3349 c... computing the DC factor for the discontinuity capturing
3350 c
3351  if (idcsclr(1) .ne. 0) then
3352  if ((idcsclr(2).eq.1 .and. isclr.eq.1) .or.
3353  & (idcsclr(2).eq.2 .and. isclr.eq.2)) then ! scalar with dc
3354 c
3355  call e3dcsclr( grads, giju, ggrads,
3356  & rls, taus, srcr,
3357  & dcfct)
3358  endif
3359  endif !end of idcsclr
3360 c
3361 c.... compute the residual contribution at this integration point
3362 c
3363  call e3ressclr( umod, ggrads,
3364  & sclr, sdot, grads,
3365  & wdetj, rls, taus,
3366  & shpfun, shg, srcr,
3367  & diffus,
3368  & rl )
3369 c
3370 c.... compute the tangent matrix contribution
3371 c
3372  if (lhs .eq. 1) then
3373  call e3lhssclr( umod, giju, dcfct,
3374  & sclr, sdot, grads,
3375  & wdetj, rls, taus,
3376  & shpfun, shg, srcl,
3377  & diffus,
3378  & xsebe )
3379 
3380  endif
3381 
3382 c
3383 c.... end of integration loop
3384 c
3385  enddo
3386 
3387 c
3388 c.... return
3389 c
3390  return
3391  end
3392 
3432 
3433 
3434  subroutine e3b (ul, yl, acl, iBCB, BCB,
3435  & shpb, shglb,
3436  & xlb, rl, sgn, dwl, xkebe)
3437  use lagrangemultipliers
3438 c
3439  include "global.h"
3440  include "common_blocks/aerfrc.h"
3441  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
3442  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
3443  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
3444  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
3445  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
3446  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
3447  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
3448  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
3449  include "common_blocks/solpar.h"
3450  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
3451 
3452 C Argument variables
3453 C
3454  INTEGER ibcb
3455 C
3456  REAL*8 acl, bcb, rl, sgn
3457  REAL*8 shglb, shpb, ul, xkebe
3458  REAL*8 xlb, yl
3459 C
3460 C Local variables
3461 C
3462  INTEGER i, iel, iface, ii
3463  INTEGER j, k, l, lnode
3464  INTEGER m, n, nodlcl, nodlcl2
3465  INTEGER nodlclm,nodlcln
3466 C
3467  REAL*8 allu, bnorm, g1yi
3468  REAL*8 g2yi, g3yi, pres, rho
3469  REAL*8 rkwall_glob, rlkwall, rmu, rna
3470  REAL*8 rou, shape, shdrv, stabk
3471  REAL*8 tau1n, tau2n, tau3n, temp
3472  REAL*8 u1, u2, u3, unm
3473  REAL*8 vdot, wdetjb
3474 
3475 c
3476  dimension yl(npro,nshl,ndof), ibcb(npro,ndibcb),
3477  & bcb(npro,nshlb,ndbcb), shpb(nshl,ngaussb),
3478  & shglb(nsd,nshl,ngaussb),
3479  & xlb(npro,nenl,nsd), ul(npro,nshl,nsd),
3480  & acl(npro,nshl,ndof),
3481  & rl(npro,nshl,nflow)
3482 c
3483  dimension g1yi(npro,ndof), g2yi(npro,ndof),
3484  & g3yi(npro,ndof), wdetjb(npro),
3485  & bnorm(npro,nsd)
3486 c
3487  dimension u1(npro), u2(npro),
3488  & u3(npro), rho(npro),
3489  & unm(npro), pres(npro),
3490  & vdot(npro,nsd), rlkwall(npro,nshlb,nsd)
3491 c
3492  dimension rou(npro), rmu(npro),
3493  & temp(npro), allu(nsd)
3494 c
3495  dimension tau1n(npro),
3496  & tau2n(npro), tau3n(npro)
3497 c
3498  dimension lnode(27), sgn(npro,nshl),
3499  & shape(npro,nshl), shdrv(npro,nsd,nshl),
3500  & rna(npro,4)
3501 
3502  real*8 xmudmi(npro,ngauss), dwl(npro,nshl)
3503 c
3504  dimension xkebe(npro,9,nshl,nshl), rkwall_glob(npro,9,nshl,nshl),
3505  & stabk(npro,9,nshl,nshl)
3506 
3507  integer num
3508 
3509 c
3510 c.... compute the nodes which lie on the boundary (hierarchic)
3511 c
3512  call getbnodes(lnode)
3513 c
3514 c.... loop through the integration points
3515 c
3516  if(lcsyst.eq.3.or.lcsyst.eq.4) then
3517  ngaussb = nintb(lcsyst)
3518  else
3519  ngaussb = nintb(lcsyst)
3520  endif
3521 
3522  stabk = zero
3523 
3524  do intp = 1, ngaussb
3525 c
3526 c.... get the hierarchic shape functions at this int point
3527 c
3528 c call getshp(shpb, shglb, sgn,
3529 c & shape, shdrv)
3530 
3531 c SHOULD CALL THE ROUTINE WITH BOUNDARY SHAPE FUNCTIONS
3532 c OTHERWISE: BOUND CHECK ERROR - DES - 30JAN2014
3533  call getshpb(shpb, shglb, sgn,
3534  & shape, shdrv)
3535 
3536 c
3537 c NOTE I DID NOT PASS THE lnode down. It is not needed
3538 c since the shape functions are zero on the boundary
3539 c
3540 c Note that xmudmi is not calculated at these quadrature
3541 c points so you give it a zero. This has implications.
3542 c the traction calculated by this approach will include
3543 c molecular stresses ONLY. This is why we will use the
3544 c consistent flux method to obtain the forces when doing
3545 c effective viscosity wall modeling. When doing slip velocity
3546 c this is not a problem since the traction is given from the
3547 c log law relation (not the viscosity).
3548 c
3549  xmudmi=zero
3550 c
3551 c.... get necessary fluid properties (including eddy viscosity)
3552 c
3553  call getdiff(dwl, yl, shape, xmudmi, xlb, rmu, rho)
3554 c
3555 c.... calculate the integraton variables
3556 c
3557  call e3bvar(yl, acl, ul,
3558  & shape,
3559  & shdrv, xlb,
3560  & lnode, wdetjb,
3561  & bnorm, pres,
3562  & u1, u2, u3,
3563  & rmu, unm,
3564  & tau1n, tau2n, tau3n,
3565  & vdot, rlkwall,
3566  & xkebe, rkwall_glob)
3567 
3568 c
3569 c.... -----------------> boundary conditions <-------------------
3570 c
3571 
3572 
3573  do iel = 1, npro
3574 c
3575 c if we have a nonzero value then
3576 c calculate the fluxes through this surface
3577 c
3578  iface = abs(ibcb(iel,2))
3579  if (iface .ne. 0 .and. ires.ne.2) then
3580  flxid(1,iface) = flxid(1,iface) + wdetjb(iel)! measure area too
3581  flxid(2,iface) = flxid(2,iface) - wdetjb(iel) * unm(iel)
3582  flxid(3,iface) = flxid(3,iface)
3583  & - ( tau1n(iel) - bnorm(iel,1)*pres(iel))
3584  & * wdetjb(iel)
3585  flxid(4,iface) = flxid(4,iface)
3586  & - ( tau2n(iel) - bnorm(iel,2)*pres(iel))
3587  & * wdetjb(iel)
3588  flxid(5,iface) = flxid(5,iface)
3589  & - ( tau3n(iel) - bnorm(iel,3)*pres(iel))
3590  & * wdetjb(iel)
3591 
3592  endif
3593 c
3594 c
3595 c.... mass flux
3596 c
3597 
3598  if (btest(ibcb(iel,1),0)) then
3599  unm(iel) = zero
3600  do n = 1, nshlb
3601  nodlcl = lnode(n)
3602  unm(iel) = unm(iel)
3603  & + shape(iel,nodlcl) * bcb(iel,n,1)
3604  enddo
3605  endif
3606 c
3607 c.... pressure
3608 c
3609  if (btest(ibcb(iel,1),1)) then
3610  pres(iel) = zero
3611  do n = 1, nshlb
3612  nodlcl = lnode(n)
3613  pres(iel) = pres(iel)
3614  & + shape(iel,nodlcl) * bcb(iel,n,2)
3615  enddo
3616  endif
3617 c
3618 c.... viscous flux
3619 c
3620  if (btest(ibcb(iel,1),2)) then
3621  tau1n(iel) = zero
3622  tau2n(iel) = zero
3623  tau3n(iel) = zero
3624  do n = 1, nshlb
3625  nodlcl = lnode(n)
3626  tau1n(iel) = tau1n(iel)
3627  & + shape(iel,nodlcl)*bcb(iel,n,3)
3628  tau2n(iel) = tau2n(iel)
3629  & + shape(iel,nodlcl)*bcb(iel,n,4)
3630  tau3n(iel) = tau3n(iel)
3631  & + shape(iel,nodlcl)*bcb(iel,n,5)
3632  enddo
3633  endif
3634 c
3635 c.... turbulence wall (as a way of checking for deformable wall stiffness)
3636 c
3637  if (btest(ibcb(iel,1),4)) then
3638  rlkwall(iel,:,:) = rlkwall(iel,:,:) / ngaussb ! divide by number of gauss points
3639  pres(iel) = zero ! to avoid the gauss point loop
3640  tau1n(iel) = zero ! and make the traction contribution
3641  tau2n(iel) = zero ! zero
3642  tau3n(iel) = zero
3643  else
3644  rlkwall(iel,:,:) = zero ! this is not a deformable element
3645  vdot(iel,:) = zero
3646  xkebe(iel,:,:,:) = zero
3647  rkwall_glob(iel,:,:,:) = zero ! no stiffness: not a wall element
3648  endif
3649 c
3650 c..... to calculate inner products for Lagrange Multipliers
3651 c
3652  if(lagrange.gt.zero) then
3653  do k=1, numlagrangesrfs
3654  if (ibcb(iel,2).eq.nsrflistlagrange(k)) then
3655  do n = 1, nshlb
3656  nodlcl = lnode(n)
3657  do m=1, nsd
3658  do i=1, nshlb
3659  nodlcl2 = lnode(i)
3660  do l=1, nsd
3661  do j=1, 3
3662  num=(m-1)*nsd+l
3663  loclhslag(iel,num,n,i,j)=
3664  & loclhslag(iel,num,n,i,j)+
3665  & shape(iel,nodlcl)*wdetjb(iel)*
3666  & shape(iel,nodlcl2)*
3667  & laginplanevectors(m,j,k)*
3668  & laginplanevectors(l,j,k)
3669  enddo
3670  enddo
3671  enddo
3672  enddo
3673  enddo
3674  endif
3675  enddo
3676  endif ! end of if(Lagrange.gt.zero)
3677 c
3678  enddo ! end of bc loop
3679 c
3680 c$$$c.... if we are computing the bdry for the consistent
3681 c$$$c boundary forces, we must not include the surface elements
3682 c$$$c in the computataion (could be done MUCH more efficiently!)--->
3683  !this
3684  !comment should read as for the consistent flux calculation rather than boundary forces
3685 c$$$c
3686  if (ires .eq. 2) then
3687  do iel = 1, npro
3688  if (nsrflist(ibcb(iel,2)) .ne. 0) then
3689  unm(iel) = zero
3690  tau1n(iel) = zero
3691  tau2n(iel) = zero
3692  tau3n(iel) = zero
3693 c pres(iel) = zero
3694 c
3695 c whatever is zeroed here will beome part of the post-processed surface
3696 c "traction force"
3697 c
3698 c uncomment the next two lines to get all of the t vector coming from
3699 c Alberto's wall motion model.
3700  vdot(iel,:)=zero
3701  rlkwall(iel,:,:)=zero
3702 
3703 c
3704 c uncomment the next 8 lines to get only the tangential part
3705 c
3706 
3707 c vn=dot_product(vdot(iel,:),bnorm(iel,:))
3708 c vdot(iel,:)=vn*bnorm(iel,:)
3709 c walln1=dot_product(rlkwall(iel,1,:),bnorm(iel,:))
3710 c walln2=dot_product(rlkwall(iel,2,:),bnorm(iel,:))
3711 c walln3=dot_product(rlkwall(iel,3,:),bnorm(iel,:))
3712 c rlkwall(iel,1,:)=walln1*bnorm(iel,:)
3713 c rlkwall(iel,2,:)=walln2*bnorm(iel,:)
3714 c rlkwall(iel,3,:)=walln3*bnorm(iel,:)
3715  endif
3716  enddo
3717  endif
3718 c
3719 c.... assemble the contributions
3720 c
3721  rna(:,1) = -wdetjb * ( tau1n - bnorm(:,1) * pres - vdot(:,1))
3722  rna(:,2) = -wdetjb * ( tau2n - bnorm(:,2) * pres - vdot(:,2))
3723  rna(:,3) = -wdetjb * ( tau3n - bnorm(:,3) * pres - vdot(:,3))
3724  rna(:,4) = wdetjb * unm
3725 c
3726 c.... THIS IS DONE FOR ADDING STABILITY IN THE CASE OF BACK FLOW
3727 c
3728  rou = backflowstabcoef*5d-1*rho*wdetjb*(abs(unm) - unm)
3729  rna(:,1) = rna(:,1) + rou*u1
3730  rna(:,2) = rna(:,2) + rou*u2
3731  rna(:,3) = rna(:,3) + rou*u3
3732 
3733 c BUG FIX - DES - 30JAN2014
3734  DO n = 1, nshlb
3735  nodlcln = lnode(n)
3736  DO m = 1, nshlb
3737  nodlclm = lnode(m)
3738  temp = alfi*gami*delt(1)*rou*shape(:,nodlcln)*
3739  2 shape(:,nodlclm)
3740  stabk(:,1,n,m) = stabk(:,1,n,m) + temp
3741  stabk(:,5,n,m) = stabk(:,5,n,m) + temp
3742  stabk(:,9,n,m) = stabk(:,9,n,m) + temp
3743  END DO
3744  END DO
3745 
3746 c SMALL CONTRIBUTION ACCORDING TO MAHDI - DES 30JAN2014
3747 c DO iel=1, npro
3748 c IF (rou(iel) .GT. 0D0) THEN
3749 c allU(1) = u1(iel)
3750 c allU(2) = u2(iel)
3751 c allU(3) = u3(iel)
3752 c DO n=1, nshlb
3753 c nodlclN = lnode(n)
3754 c DO m=1, nshlb
3755 c nodlclM = lnode(m)
3756 c DO i=1,nsd
3757 c DO j=1,nsd
3758 c ii = j + (i - 1)*nsd
3759 c stabK(iel,ii,n,m) = stabK(iel,ii,n,m) -
3760 c 2 rho(iel)*WdetJb(iel)*alfi*gami*Delt(1)*
3761 c 3 shape(iel,nodlclN)*shape(iel,nodlclM)*allU(i)*
3762 c 4 bnorm(iel,j)
3763 c END DO
3764 c END DO
3765 c END DO
3766 c END DO
3767 c END IF
3768 c END DO
3769 
3770  if(iconvflow.eq.1) then ! conservative form was integrated
3771  ! by parts and has a convective
3772  ! boundary integral
3773 c
3774 c.... assemble the contributions
3775 c
3776  rou=rho*unm
3777  rna(:,1) = rna(:,1) + wdetjb * rou * u1
3778  rna(:,2) = rna(:,2) + wdetjb * rou * u2
3779  rna(:,3) = rna(:,3) + wdetjb * rou * u3
3780  endif
3781 c
3782 c.... -------------------------> Residual <--------------------------
3783 c
3784 c.... add the flux to the residual
3785 c
3786  do n = 1, nshlb
3787  nodlcl = lnode(n)
3788 
3789  rl(:,nodlcl,1) = rl(:,nodlcl,1) - shape(:,nodlcl) * rna(:,1)
3790  rl(:,nodlcl,2) = rl(:,nodlcl,2) - shape(:,nodlcl) * rna(:,2)
3791  rl(:,nodlcl,3) = rl(:,nodlcl,3) - shape(:,nodlcl) * rna(:,3)
3792  rl(:,nodlcl,4) = rl(:,nodlcl,4) - shape(:,nodlcl) * rna(:,4)
3793 
3794  enddo
3795  if(ideformwall.eq.1) then
3796  rl(:,1,1) = rl(:,1,1) - rlkwall(:,1,1)
3797  rl(:,1,2) = rl(:,1,2) - rlkwall(:,1,2)
3798  rl(:,1,3) = rl(:,1,3) - rlkwall(:,1,3)
3799 
3800  rl(:,2,1) = rl(:,2,1) - rlkwall(:,2,1)
3801  rl(:,2,2) = rl(:,2,2) - rlkwall(:,2,2)
3802  rl(:,2,3) = rl(:,2,3) - rlkwall(:,2,3)
3803 
3804  rl(:,3,1) = rl(:,3,1) - rlkwall(:,3,1)
3805  rl(:,3,2) = rl(:,3,2) - rlkwall(:,3,2)
3806  rl(:,3,3) = rl(:,3,3) - rlkwall(:,3,3)
3807  endif
3808 
3809  enddo
3810  if(ideformwall.eq.1) then
3811 c
3812 c.... -----> Wall Stiffness and Mass matrices for implicit LHS <-----------
3813 c
3814 c.... Now we simply have to add the stiffness contribution in rKwall_glob to
3815 c.... the mass contribution already contained in xKebe
3816 
3817 c.... this line is going to destroy the mass matrix contribution
3818 
3819 
3820 c xKebe = zero
3821 
3822  xkebe(:,:,:,:) = ( xkebe(:,:,:,:)*iwallmassfactor
3823  & + rkwall_glob(:,:,:,:)*iwallstiffactor )
3824 
3825 
3826  endif
3827 c$$$ ttim(40) = ttim(40) + tmr()
3828 c
3829 c.... return
3830 c
3831 
3832  xkebe = xkebe + stabk
3833 
3834  return
3835  end
3836 
3837 
3838 c^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
3839 c*********************************************************************
3840 c*********************************************************************
3841 
3842 
3843  subroutine e3bsclr (yl, iBCB, BCB, shpb, shglb,
3844  & xlb, rl, sgn, dwl)
3845 
3846  include "global.h"
3847  include "common_blocks/aerfrc.h"
3848  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
3849  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
3850  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
3851  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
3852  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
3853  include "common_blocks/sclrs.h"
3854  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
3855  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
3856 
3857 C Argument variables
3858 C
3859  INTEGER ibcb
3860 C
3861  REAL*8 bcb, rl, sgn, shglb
3862  REAL*8 shpb, xlb, yl
3863 C
3864 C Local variables
3865 C
3866  INTEGER ib, ibb, iel, iface
3867  INTEGER iwalljump, lnode, n, nodlcl
3868 C
3869  REAL*8 flux, rna, shape, shdrv
3870 C
3871 c
3872  dimension yl(npro,nshl,ndof), ibcb(npro,ndibcb),
3873  & bcb(npro,nshlb,ndbcb), shpb(nshl,*),
3874  & shglb(nsd,nshl,*),
3875  & xlb(npro,nenl,nsd),
3876  & rl(npro,nshl)
3877 c
3878  real*8 wdetjb(npro), bnorm(npro,nsd)
3879 c
3880  dimension lnode(27), sgn(npro,nshl),
3881  & shape(npro,nshl), shdrv(npro,nsd,nshl),
3882  & rna(npro), flux(npro)
3883  real*8 dwl(npro,nshl)
3884 
3885 c
3886 c.... compute the nodes which lie on the boundary (hierarchic)
3887 c
3888  call getbnodes(lnode)
3889 c
3890 c.... loop through the integration points
3891 c
3892  if(lcsyst.eq.3.or.lcsyst.eq.4) then
3893  ngaussb = nintb(lcsyst)
3894  else
3895  ngaussb = nintb(lcsyst)
3896  endif
3897  do intp = 1, ngaussb
3898 c
3899 c.... get the hierarchic shape functions at this int point
3900 c
3901 c BUG FIX - DES - 30JAN2014
3902  call getshpb(shpb, shglb, sgn,
3903  & shape, shdrv)
3904 c
3905 c.... calculate the integraton variables
3906 c
3907  call e3bvarsclr(yl, shdrv, xlb,
3908  & shape, wdetjb, bnorm,
3909  & flux, dwl )
3910 c
3911 c.... -----------------> boundary conditions <-------------------
3912 c
3913 
3914 c
3915 c.... heat or scalar flux
3916 c
3917  if(isclr.eq.0) then
3918  iwalljump=0
3919  else
3920  iwalljump=1 !turb wall between heat and scalar flux..jump over
3921  endif
3922  ib=4+isclr+iwalljump
3923  ibb=6+isclr
3924  do iel=1, npro
3925 c
3926 c if we have a nonzero value then
3927 c calculate the fluxes through this surface
3928 c
3929  if (ibcb(iel,2) .ne. 0 .and. ires.ne.2) then
3930  iface = abs(ibcb(iel,2))
3931  flxid(ibb,iface) = flxid(ibb,iface)
3932  & - wdetjb(iel) * flux(iel)
3933  endif
3934 
3935  if (btest(ibcb(iel,1),ib-1)) then
3936  flux(iel) = zero
3937  do n = 1, nshlb
3938  nodlcl = lnode(n)
3939  flux(iel) = flux(iel)
3940  & + shape(iel,nodlcl) * bcb(iel,n,ibb)
3941  enddo
3942  endif
3943  enddo
3944 c
3945 c.... assemble the contributions
3946 c
3947  rna(:) = -wdetjb * flux
3948 c
3949 c.... -------------------------> Residual <--------------------------
3950 c
3951 c.... add the flux to the residual
3952 c
3953  do n = 1, nshlb
3954  nodlcl = lnode(n)
3955 
3956  rl(:,nodlcl) = rl(:,nodlcl) - shape(:,nodlcl) * rna(:)
3957  enddo
3958 c
3959 c.... --------------------> Aerodynamic Forces <---------------------
3960 c
3961  if ((ires .ne. 2) .and. (iter .eq. nitr)) then
3962 c
3963 c.... compute the forces on the body
3964 c
3965  if(isclr.eq.0) hflux = sum(flux)
3966 c
3967  endif
3968 c
3969 c.... end of integration loop
3970 c
3971  enddo
3972 
3973 c
3974 c.... return
3975 c
3976  return
3977  end
3978 
4008 
4009  subroutine e3bvar (yl, acl, ul,
4010  & shpb, shglb,
4011  & xlb, lnode,
4012  & wdetjb, bnorm, pres,
4013  & u1, u2, u3, rmu,
4014  & unm, tau1n, tau2n, tau3n,
4015  & vdot, rlkwall,
4016  & xkebe, rkwall_glob)
4017 
4018  include "global.h"
4019  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
4020  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
4021  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
4022  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
4023  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
4024  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
4025  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
4026  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
4027 
4028 C Argument variables
4029 C
4030  INTEGER lnode
4031 C
4032  REAL*8 acl, bnorm, pres
4033  REAL*8 rkwall_glob, rlkwall, rmu, shglb
4034  REAL*8 shpb, tau1n, tau2n, tau3n
4035  REAL*8 u1, u2, u3, ul
4036  REAL*8 unm, vdot, wdetjb, xkebe
4037  REAL*8 xlb, yl
4038 C
4039 C Local variables
4040 C
4041  INTEGER ipt2, ipt3, k, n
4042  INTEGER nodlcl
4043 C
4044  REAL*8 b1, b2, b3
4045  REAL*8 detjacrot, dmatrix, dtimesb1
4046  REAL*8 dtimesb2, dtimesb3, dxdxib, dxidxb
4047  REAL*8 g1yi, g2yi, g3yi, gl1yi
4048  REAL*8 gl2yi, gl3yi, rkwall_glob11
4049  REAL*8 rkwall_glob12, rkwall_glob13
4050  REAL*8 rkwall_glob21, rkwall_glob22
4051  REAL*8 rkwall_glob23, rkwall_glob31
4052  REAL*8 rkwall_glob32, rkwall_glob33
4053  REAL*8 rkwall_local11, rkwall_local12
4054  REAL*8 rkwall_local13, rkwall_local21
4055  REAL*8 rkwall_local22, rkwall_local23
4056  REAL*8 rkwall_local31, rkwall_local32
4057  REAL*8 rkwall_local33, rotnodallocal
4058  REAL*8 temp, temp1, temp2, temp3
4059  REAL*8 tmp1, v1, v2
4060  REAL*8 v3, x1rot, x2rot, x3rot
4061 C
4062 c
4063  dimension yl(npro,nshl,ndof), rmu(npro),
4064  & shpb(npro,nshl), shglb(npro,nsd,nshl),
4065  & xlb(npro,nenl,nsd),
4066  & lnode(27), g1yi(npro,ndof),
4067  & g2yi(npro,ndof), g3yi(npro,ndof),
4068  & wdetjb(npro), bnorm(npro,nsd),
4069  & pres(npro),
4070  & u1(npro), u2(npro),
4071  & u3(npro),
4072  & unm(npro),
4073  & tau1n(npro), tau2n(npro),
4074  & tau3n(npro),
4075  & acl(npro,nshl,ndof), ul(npro,nshl,nsd),
4076  & vdot(npro,nsd), rlkwall(npro,nshlb,nsd)
4077 c
4078  dimension gl1yi(npro,ndof), gl2yi(npro,ndof),
4079  & gl3yi(npro,ndof), dxdxib(npro,nsd,nsd),
4080  & dxidxb(npro,nsd,nsd), temp(npro),
4081  & temp1(npro), temp2(npro),
4082  & temp3(npro),
4083  & v1(npro,nsd), v2(npro,nsd),
4084  & v3(npro,nsd),
4085  & rotnodallocal(npro,nsd,nsd),
4086  & x1rot(npro,nsd), x2rot(npro,nsd),
4087  & x3rot(npro,nsd), detjacrot(npro),
4088  & b1(npro,5,3), b2(npro,5,3),
4089  & b3(npro,5,3), dmatrix(npro,5,5),
4090  & dtimesb1(npro,5,3), dtimesb2(npro,5,3),
4091  & dtimesb3(npro,5,3),
4092  & rkwall_local11(npro,nsd,nsd),
4093  & rkwall_local12(npro,nsd,nsd),
4094  & rkwall_local13(npro,nsd,nsd),
4095  & rkwall_local21(npro,nsd,nsd),
4096  & rkwall_local22(npro,nsd,nsd),
4097  & rkwall_local23(npro,nsd,nsd),
4098  & rkwall_local31(npro,nsd,nsd),
4099  & rkwall_local32(npro,nsd,nsd),
4100  & rkwall_local33(npro,nsd,nsd),
4101  & rkwall_glob11(npro,nsd,nsd),
4102  & rkwall_glob12(npro,nsd,nsd),
4103  & rkwall_glob13(npro,nsd,nsd),
4104  & rkwall_glob21(npro,nsd,nsd),
4105  & rkwall_glob22(npro,nsd,nsd),
4106  & rkwall_glob23(npro,nsd,nsd),
4107  & rkwall_glob31(npro,nsd,nsd),
4108  & rkwall_glob32(npro,nsd,nsd),
4109  & rkwall_glob33(npro,nsd,nsd)
4110 c
4111  dimension rkwall_glob(npro,9,nshl,nshl),
4112  & xkebe(npro,9,nshl,nshl)
4113 c
4114  real*8 lhmfctvw, tsfctvw(npro)
4115 
4116  dimension tmp1(npro)
4117 c
4118  real*8 turb(npro), xki,
4119  & xki3, fv1
4120 c
4121  integer e, i, j
4122 c
4123  integer aa, b
4124 
4125 
4126 c
4127 c.... -------------------> integration variables <--------------------
4128 c
4129 c.... compute the primitive variables at the integration point
4130 c
4131  pres = zero
4132  u1 = zero
4133  u2 = zero
4134  u3 = zero
4135 c
4136  do n = 1, nshlb
4137  nodlcl = lnode(n)
4138 c
4139  pres = pres + shpb(:,nodlcl) * yl(:,nodlcl,1)
4140  u1 = u1 + shpb(:,nodlcl) * yl(:,nodlcl,2)
4141  u2 = u2 + shpb(:,nodlcl) * yl(:,nodlcl,3)
4142  u3 = u3 + shpb(:,nodlcl) * yl(:,nodlcl,4)
4143 
4144  enddo
4145 c
4146 c.... ----------------------> Element Metrics <-----------------------
4147 c
4148 c.... compute the deformation gradient
4149 c
4150  dxdxib = zero
4151 c
4152  do n = 1, nenl
4153  dxdxib(:,1,1) = dxdxib(:,1,1) + xlb(:,n,1) * shglb(:,1,n)
4154  dxdxib(:,1,2) = dxdxib(:,1,2) + xlb(:,n,1) * shglb(:,2,n)
4155  dxdxib(:,1,3) = dxdxib(:,1,3) + xlb(:,n,1) * shglb(:,3,n)
4156  dxdxib(:,2,1) = dxdxib(:,2,1) + xlb(:,n,2) * shglb(:,1,n)
4157  dxdxib(:,2,2) = dxdxib(:,2,2) + xlb(:,n,2) * shglb(:,2,n)
4158  dxdxib(:,2,3) = dxdxib(:,2,3) + xlb(:,n,2) * shglb(:,3,n)
4159  dxdxib(:,3,1) = dxdxib(:,3,1) + xlb(:,n,3) * shglb(:,1,n)
4160  dxdxib(:,3,2) = dxdxib(:,3,2) + xlb(:,n,3) * shglb(:,2,n)
4161  dxdxib(:,3,3) = dxdxib(:,3,3) + xlb(:,n,3) * shglb(:,3,n)
4162  enddo
4163 c
4164 c.... compute the normal to the boundary. This is achieved by taking
4165 c the cross product of two vectors in the plane of the 2-d
4166 c boundary face.
4167 c
4168  if(lcsyst.eq.1) then ! set to curl into element all others out
4169  ipt2=2
4170  ipt3=3
4171  elseif(lcsyst.eq.2) then
4172  ipt2=4
4173  ipt3=2
4174  elseif(lcsyst.eq.3) then
4175  ipt2=3
4176  ipt3=2
4177  elseif(lcsyst.eq.4) then
4178  ipt2=2
4179  ipt3=4
4180  elseif(lcsyst.eq.5) then
4181  ipt2=4
4182  ipt3=2
4183  elseif(lcsyst.eq.6) then
4184  ipt2=2
4185  ipt3=5
4186  endif
4187  v1 = xlb(:,ipt2,:) - xlb(:,1,:)
4188  v2 = xlb(:,ipt3,:) - xlb(:,1,:)
4189 c
4190 c compute cross product
4191 c
4192  temp1 = v1(:,2) * v2(:,3) - v2(:,2) * v1(:,3)
4193  temp2 = v2(:,1) * v1(:,3) - v1(:,1) * v2(:,3)
4194  temp3 = v1(:,1) * v2(:,2) - v2(:,1) * v1(:,2)
4195 c
4196 c mag is area for quads, twice area for tris
4197 c
4198  temp = one / sqrt( temp1**2 + temp2**2 + temp3**2 )
4199  bnorm(:,1) = temp1 * temp
4200  bnorm(:,2) = temp2 * temp
4201  bnorm(:,3) = temp3 * temp
4202 c
4203  if (lcsyst .eq. 1) then
4204  wdetjb = qwtb(lcsyst,intp) / (four*temp)
4205  elseif (lcsyst .eq. 2) then
4206  wdetjb = qwtb(lcsyst,intp) / (four*temp)
4207  elseif (lcsyst .eq. 3) then
4208  wdetjb = qwtb(lcsyst,intp) / (two*temp)
4209  elseif (lcsyst .eq. 4) then
4210  wdetjb = qwtb(lcsyst,intp) / (four*temp)
4211  elseif (lcsyst .eq. 5) then
4212  wdetjb = qwtb(lcsyst,intp) / (four*temp)
4213  elseif (lcsyst .eq. 6) then
4214  wdetjb = qwtb(lcsyst,intp) / (two*temp)
4215  endif
4216 c
4217 c.... --------------------------> Grad-V <----------------------------
4218 c
4219 c.... compute grad-v for Navier-Stokes terms
4220 c
4221  if (navier .eq. 1) then
4222 c
4223 c.... compute the inverse of deformation gradient
4224 c
4225  dxidxb(:,1,1) = dxdxib(:,2,2) * dxdxib(:,3,3)
4226  & - dxdxib(:,3,2) * dxdxib(:,2,3)
4227  dxidxb(:,1,2) = dxdxib(:,3,2) * dxdxib(:,1,3)
4228  & - dxdxib(:,1,2) * dxdxib(:,3,3)
4229  dxidxb(:,1,3) = dxdxib(:,1,2) * dxdxib(:,2,3)
4230  & - dxdxib(:,1,3) * dxdxib(:,2,2)
4231  temp = one / ( dxidxb(:,1,1) * dxdxib(:,1,1)
4232  & + dxidxb(:,1,2) * dxdxib(:,2,1)
4233  & + dxidxb(:,1,3) * dxdxib(:,3,1) )
4234  dxidxb(:,1,1) = dxidxb(:,1,1) * temp
4235  dxidxb(:,1,2) = dxidxb(:,1,2) * temp
4236  dxidxb(:,1,3) = dxidxb(:,1,3) * temp
4237  dxidxb(:,2,1) = (dxdxib(:,2,3) * dxdxib(:,3,1)
4238  & - dxdxib(:,2,1) * dxdxib(:,3,3)) * temp
4239  dxidxb(:,2,2) = (dxdxib(:,1,1) * dxdxib(:,3,3)
4240  & - dxdxib(:,3,1) * dxdxib(:,1,3)) * temp
4241  dxidxb(:,2,3) = (dxdxib(:,2,1) * dxdxib(:,1,3)
4242  & - dxdxib(:,1,1) * dxdxib(:,2,3)) * temp
4243  dxidxb(:,3,1) = (dxdxib(:,2,1) * dxdxib(:,3,2)
4244  & - dxdxib(:,2,2) * dxdxib(:,3,1)) * temp
4245  dxidxb(:,3,2) = (dxdxib(:,3,1) * dxdxib(:,1,2)
4246  & - dxdxib(:,1,1) * dxdxib(:,3,2)) * temp
4247  dxidxb(:,3,3) = (dxdxib(:,1,1) * dxdxib(:,2,2)
4248  & - dxdxib(:,1,2) * dxdxib(:,2,1)) * temp
4249 c
4250 c.... compute local-grad-Y
4251 c
4252  gl1yi = zero
4253  gl2yi = zero
4254  gl3yi = zero
4255 c
4256  do n = 1, nshl
4257  gl1yi(:,1) = gl1yi(:,1) + shglb(:,1,n) * yl(:,n,1)
4258  gl1yi(:,2) = gl1yi(:,2) + shglb(:,1,n) * yl(:,n,2)
4259  gl1yi(:,3) = gl1yi(:,3) + shglb(:,1,n) * yl(:,n,3)
4260  gl1yi(:,4) = gl1yi(:,4) + shglb(:,1,n) * yl(:,n,4)
4261 c
4262  gl2yi(:,1) = gl2yi(:,1) + shglb(:,2,n) * yl(:,n,1)
4263  gl2yi(:,2) = gl2yi(:,2) + shglb(:,2,n) * yl(:,n,2)
4264  gl2yi(:,3) = gl2yi(:,3) + shglb(:,2,n) * yl(:,n,3)
4265  gl2yi(:,4) = gl2yi(:,4) + shglb(:,2,n) * yl(:,n,4)
4266 c
4267  gl3yi(:,1) = gl3yi(:,1) + shglb(:,3,n) * yl(:,n,1)
4268  gl3yi(:,2) = gl3yi(:,2) + shglb(:,3,n) * yl(:,n,2)
4269  gl3yi(:,3) = gl3yi(:,3) + shglb(:,3,n) * yl(:,n,3)
4270  gl3yi(:,4) = gl3yi(:,4) + shglb(:,3,n) * yl(:,n,4)
4271  enddo
4272 c
4273 c.... convert local-grads to global-grads
4274 c
4275  g1yi(:,2) = dxidxb(:,1,1) * gl1yi(:,2) +
4276  & dxidxb(:,2,1) * gl2yi(:,2) +
4277  & dxidxb(:,3,1) * gl3yi(:,2)
4278  g2yi(:,2) = dxidxb(:,1,2) * gl1yi(:,2) +
4279  & dxidxb(:,2,2) * gl2yi(:,2) +
4280  & dxidxb(:,3,2) * gl3yi(:,2)
4281  g3yi(:,2) = dxidxb(:,1,3) * gl1yi(:,2) +
4282  & dxidxb(:,2,3) * gl2yi(:,2) +
4283  & dxidxb(:,3,3) * gl3yi(:,2)
4284 c
4285  g1yi(:,3) = dxidxb(:,1,1) * gl1yi(:,3) +
4286  & dxidxb(:,2,1) * gl2yi(:,3) +
4287  & dxidxb(:,3,1) * gl3yi(:,3)
4288  g2yi(:,3) = dxidxb(:,1,2) * gl1yi(:,3) +
4289  & dxidxb(:,2,2) * gl2yi(:,3) +
4290  & dxidxb(:,3,2) * gl3yi(:,3)
4291  g3yi(:,3) = dxidxb(:,1,3) * gl1yi(:,3) +
4292  & dxidxb(:,2,3) * gl2yi(:,3) +
4293  & dxidxb(:,3,3) * gl3yi(:,3)
4294 c
4295  g1yi(:,4) = dxidxb(:,1,1) * gl1yi(:,4) +
4296  & dxidxb(:,2,1) * gl2yi(:,4) +
4297  & dxidxb(:,3,1) * gl3yi(:,4)
4298  g2yi(:,4) = dxidxb(:,1,2) * gl1yi(:,4) +
4299  & dxidxb(:,2,2) * gl2yi(:,4) +
4300  & dxidxb(:,3,2) * gl3yi(:,4)
4301  g3yi(:,4) = dxidxb(:,1,3) * gl1yi(:,4) +
4302  & dxidxb(:,2,3) * gl2yi(:,4) +
4303  & dxidxb(:,3,3) * gl3yi(:,4)
4304 c
4305 c.... end grad-v
4306 c
4307  endif
4308 c
4309 c.... mass flux
4310 c
4311  unm = bnorm(:,1) * u1 +bnorm(:,2) * u2 +bnorm(:,3) * u3
4312 ! no rho in continuity eq.
4313 
4314 
4315 c
4316 c.... viscous flux
4317 c
4318  tau1n = bnorm(:,1) * two * rmu * g1yi(:,2)
4319  & + bnorm(:,2) * (rmu * (g2yi(:,2) + g1yi(:,3)))
4320  & + bnorm(:,3) * (rmu * (g3yi(:,2) + g1yi(:,4)))
4321  tau2n = bnorm(:,1) * (rmu * (g2yi(:,2) + g1yi(:,3)))
4322  & + bnorm(:,2) * two * rmu * g2yi(:,3)
4323  & + bnorm(:,3) * (rmu * (g3yi(:,3) + g2yi(:,4)))
4324  tau3n = bnorm(:,1) * (rmu * (g3yi(:,2) + g1yi(:,4)))
4325  & + bnorm(:,2) * (rmu * (g3yi(:,3) + g2yi(:,4)))
4326  & + bnorm(:,3) * two * rmu * g3yi(:,4)
4327 c
4328  temp1 = bnorm(:,1) * tau1n
4329  & + bnorm(:,2) * tau2n
4330  & + bnorm(:,3) * tau3n
4331 
4332  pres = pres - temp1
4333 
4334  tau1n = tau1n - bnorm(:,1) * temp1
4335  tau2n = tau2n - bnorm(:,2) * temp1
4336  tau3n = tau3n - bnorm(:,3) * temp1
4337 
4338  vdot = zero
4339  rlkwall = zero
4340  if (intp.eq.ngaussb) then ! do this only for the last gauss point
4341  rkwall_glob = zero
4342  endif
4343 
4344  if(ideformwall.eq.1) then
4345  do n = 1, nshlb
4346  nodlcl = lnode(n)
4347 c
4348  vdot(:,1) = vdot(:,1) + shpb(:,nodlcl) * acl(:,nodlcl,2)
4349  vdot(:,2) = vdot(:,2) + shpb(:,nodlcl) * acl(:,nodlcl,3)
4350  vdot(:,3) = vdot(:,3) + shpb(:,nodlcl) * acl(:,nodlcl,4)
4351 
4352  enddo
4353  vdot = vdot * thicknessvw * rhovw
4354 c
4355 c.... ---------------------> Stiffness matrix & residual <-----------------
4356 c
4357 c.... B^t * D * B formulation for plane stress enhanced membrane
4358 c
4359 c
4360 c.... rotation matrix
4361 c
4362  v1 = xlb(:,ipt2,:) - xlb(:,1,:)
4363  temp = one / sqrt( v1(:,1)**2 + v1(:,2)**2 + v1(:,3)**2 )
4364  v1(:,1) = v1(:,1) * temp
4365  v1(:,2) = v1(:,2) * temp
4366  v1(:,3) = v1(:,3) * temp
4367 
4368  v2 = xlb(:,ipt3,:) - xlb(:,1,:)
4369 
4370 c compute cross product
4371  temp1 = v1(:,2) * v2(:,3) - v2(:,2) * v1(:,3)
4372  temp2 = v2(:,1) * v1(:,3) - v1(:,1) * v2(:,3)
4373  temp3 = v1(:,1) * v2(:,2) - v2(:,1) * v1(:,2)
4374 
4375  temp = one / sqrt( temp1**2 + temp2**2 + temp3**2 )
4376  v3(:,1) = temp1 * temp
4377  v3(:,2) = temp2 * temp
4378  v3(:,3) = temp3 * temp
4379 
4380 c cross product again for v2
4381  temp1 = v3(:,2) * v1(:,3) - v1(:,2) * v3(:,3)
4382  temp2 = v1(:,1) * v3(:,3) - v3(:,1) * v1(:,3)
4383  temp3 = v3(:,1) * v1(:,2) - v1(:,1) * v3(:,2)
4384 
4385  temp = one / sqrt( temp1**2 + temp2**2 + temp3**2 )
4386  v2(:,1) = temp1 * temp
4387  v2(:,2) = temp2 * temp
4388  v2(:,3) = temp3 * temp
4389 
4390  do j = 1, nsd
4391  rotnodallocal(:,1,j) = v1(:,j)
4392  rotnodallocal(:,2,j) = v2(:,j)
4393  rotnodallocal(:,3,j) = v3(:,j)
4394  enddo
4395 c
4396 c.... rotated coordinates
4397 c
4398  x1rot = zero
4399  x2rot = zero
4400  x3rot = zero
4401 
4402  do i = 1, nsd
4403  do j = 1, nsd
4404  x1rot(:,i) = x1rot(:,i)+rotnodallocal(:,i,j)*xlb(:,1,j)
4405  x2rot(:,i) = x2rot(:,i)+rotnodallocal(:,i,j)*xlb(:,ipt2,j)
4406  x3rot(:,i) = x3rot(:,i)+rotnodallocal(:,i,j)*xlb(:,ipt3,j)
4407  enddo
4408  enddo
4409 c
4410 c.... B matrices
4411 c
4412  b1 = zero
4413  b2 = zero
4414  b3 = zero
4415  detjacrot = (x2rot(:,1)-x1rot(:,1)) * (x3rot(:,2)-x1rot(:,2)) -
4416  & (x3rot(:,1)-x1rot(:,1)) * (x2rot(:,2)-x1rot(:,2))
4417 
4418  b1(:,1,1) = (x2rot(:,2)-x3rot(:,2))/detjacrot(:)
4419  b1(:,2,2) = (x3rot(:,1)-x2rot(:,1))/detjacrot(:)
4420  b1(:,3,1) = (x3rot(:,1)-x2rot(:,1))/detjacrot(:)
4421  b1(:,3,2) = (x2rot(:,2)-x3rot(:,2))/detjacrot(:)
4422  b1(:,4,3) = (x2rot(:,2)-x3rot(:,2))/detjacrot(:)
4423  b1(:,5,3) = (x3rot(:,1)-x2rot(:,1))/detjacrot(:)
4424 
4425  b2(:,1,1) = (x3rot(:,2)-x1rot(:,2))/detjacrot(:)
4426  b2(:,2,2) = (x1rot(:,1)-x3rot(:,1))/detjacrot(:)
4427  b2(:,3,1) = (x1rot(:,1)-x3rot(:,1))/detjacrot(:)
4428  b2(:,3,2) = (x3rot(:,2)-x1rot(:,2))/detjacrot(:)
4429  b2(:,4,3) = (x3rot(:,2)-x1rot(:,2))/detjacrot(:)
4430  b2(:,5,3) = (x1rot(:,1)-x3rot(:,1))/detjacrot(:)
4431 
4432  b3(:,1,1) = (x1rot(:,2)-x2rot(:,2))/detjacrot(:)
4433  b3(:,2,2) = (x2rot(:,1)-x1rot(:,1))/detjacrot(:)
4434  b3(:,3,1) = (x2rot(:,1)-x1rot(:,1))/detjacrot(:)
4435  b3(:,3,2) = (x1rot(:,2)-x2rot(:,2))/detjacrot(:)
4436  b3(:,4,3) = (x1rot(:,2)-x2rot(:,2))/detjacrot(:)
4437  b3(:,5,3) = (x2rot(:,1)-x1rot(:,1))/detjacrot(:)
4438 
4439 C B1 = B1 / detJacrot
4440 C B2 = B2 / detJacrot
4441 C B3 = B3 / detJacrot
4442 
4443 c
4444 c.... D matrix
4445 c
4446  dmatrix = zero
4447  temp1 = evw / (1.0d0 - rnuvw*rnuvw)
4448  temp2 = rnuvw * temp1
4449  temp3 = pt5 * (1.0d0 - rnuvw) * temp1
4450  dmatrix(:,1,1) = temp1
4451  dmatrix(:,1,2) = temp2
4452  dmatrix(:,2,1) = temp2
4453  dmatrix(:,2,2) = temp1
4454  dmatrix(:,3,3) = temp3
4455  dmatrix(:,4,4) = temp3*rshearconstantvw
4456  dmatrix(:,5,5) = temp3*rshearconstantvw
4457 c
4458 c.... D * [B1|B2|B3]
4459 c
4460  dtimesb1 = zero
4461  dtimesb2 = zero
4462  dtimesb3 = zero
4463  do i = 1, 5
4464  do j = 1, 3
4465  do k = 1, 5
4466  dtimesb1(:,i,j) = dtimesb1(:,i,j)
4467  & + dmatrix(:,i,k) * b1(:,k,j)
4468  dtimesb2(:,i,j) = dtimesb2(:,i,j)
4469  & + dmatrix(:,i,k) * b2(:,k,j)
4470  dtimesb3(:,i,j) = dtimesb3(:,i,j)
4471  & + dmatrix(:,i,k) * b3(:,k,j)
4472  enddo
4473  enddo
4474  enddo
4475 c
4476 c.... [B1|B2|B3]^T * D * [B1|B2|B3]
4477 c
4478  rkwall_local11 = zero
4479  rkwall_local12 = zero
4480  rkwall_local13 = zero
4481  rkwall_local21 = zero
4482  rkwall_local22 = zero
4483  rkwall_local23 = zero
4484  rkwall_local31 = zero
4485  rkwall_local32 = zero
4486  rkwall_local33 = zero
4487 
4488  do i = 1, 3 ! i is a node index: i=1, nenbl=3
4489  do j = 1, 3 ! same is true for j
4490  do k = 1, 5
4491  rkwall_local11(:,i,j) = rkwall_local11(:,i,j)
4492  & + b1(:,k,i) * dtimesb1(:,k,j)
4493  rkwall_local12(:,i,j) = rkwall_local12(:,i,j)
4494  & + b1(:,k,i) * dtimesb2(:,k,j)
4495  rkwall_local13(:,i,j) = rkwall_local13(:,i,j)
4496  & + b1(:,k,i) * dtimesb3(:,k,j)
4497  rkwall_local21(:,i,j) = rkwall_local21(:,i,j)
4498  & + b2(:,k,i) * dtimesb1(:,k,j)
4499  rkwall_local22(:,i,j) = rkwall_local22(:,i,j)
4500  & + b2(:,k,i) * dtimesb2(:,k,j)
4501  rkwall_local23(:,i,j) = rkwall_local23(:,i,j)
4502  & + b2(:,k,i) * dtimesb3(:,k,j)
4503  rkwall_local31(:,i,j) = rkwall_local31(:,i,j)
4504  & + b3(:,k,i) * dtimesb1(:,k,j)
4505  rkwall_local32(:,i,j) = rkwall_local32(:,i,j)
4506  & + b3(:,k,i) * dtimesb2(:,k,j)
4507  rkwall_local33(:,i,j) = rkwall_local33(:,i,j)
4508  & + b3(:,k,i) * dtimesb3(:,k,j)
4509  enddo
4510  enddo
4511  enddo
4512 
4513 c
4514 c.... Now we need to rotate each of these submatrices to the global frame
4515 c
4516  call rotatestiff(rkwall_local11, rotnodallocal, rkwall_glob11)
4517  call rotatestiff(rkwall_local12, rotnodallocal, rkwall_glob12)
4518  call rotatestiff(rkwall_local13, rotnodallocal, rkwall_glob13)
4519  call rotatestiff(rkwall_local21, rotnodallocal, rkwall_glob21)
4520  call rotatestiff(rkwall_local22, rotnodallocal, rkwall_glob22)
4521  call rotatestiff(rkwall_local23, rotnodallocal, rkwall_glob23)
4522  call rotatestiff(rkwall_local31, rotnodallocal, rkwall_glob31)
4523  call rotatestiff(rkwall_local32, rotnodallocal, rkwall_glob32)
4524  call rotatestiff(rkwall_local33, rotnodallocal, rkwall_glob33)
4525 
4526 c multiply the nodal matrices by the area and the thickness
4527  do i =1, nsd
4528  do j = 1, nsd
4529  rkwall_glob11(:,i,j) = rkwall_glob11(:,i,j) * detjacrot(:)
4530  & * pt5 * thicknessvw
4531  rkwall_glob12(:,i,j) = rkwall_glob12(:,i,j) * detjacrot(:)
4532  & * pt5 * thicknessvw
4533  rkwall_glob13(:,i,j) = rkwall_glob13(:,i,j) * detjacrot(:)
4534  & * pt5 * thicknessvw
4535  rkwall_glob21(:,i,j) = rkwall_glob21(:,i,j) * detjacrot(:)
4536  & * pt5 * thicknessvw
4537  rkwall_glob22(:,i,j) = rkwall_glob22(:,i,j) * detjacrot(:)
4538  & * pt5 * thicknessvw
4539  rkwall_glob23(:,i,j) = rkwall_glob23(:,i,j) * detjacrot(:)
4540  & * pt5 * thicknessvw
4541  rkwall_glob31(:,i,j) = rkwall_glob31(:,i,j) * detjacrot(:)
4542  & * pt5 * thicknessvw
4543  rkwall_glob32(:,i,j) = rkwall_glob32(:,i,j) * detjacrot(:)
4544  & * pt5 * thicknessvw
4545  rkwall_glob33(:,i,j) = rkwall_glob33(:,i,j) * detjacrot(:)
4546  & * pt5 * thicknessvw
4547  enddo
4548  enddo
4549 
4550 c
4551 c.... Final K * u product (in global coordinates) to get the residual
4552 c
4553  do i = 1, 3 ! now i is a spatial index: i=1, nsd=3
4554  rlkwall(:,1,1) = rlkwall(:,1,1)
4555  & + rkwall_glob11(:,1,i) * ul(:,1,i)
4556  & + rkwall_glob12(:,1,i) * ul(:,2,i)
4557  & + rkwall_glob13(:,1,i) * ul(:,3,i)
4558  rlkwall(:,1,2) = rlkwall(:,1,2)
4559  & + rkwall_glob11(:,2,i) * ul(:,1,i)
4560  & + rkwall_glob12(:,2,i) * ul(:,2,i)
4561  & + rkwall_glob13(:,2,i) * ul(:,3,i)
4562  rlkwall(:,1,3) = rlkwall(:,1,3)
4563  & + rkwall_glob11(:,3,i) * ul(:,1,i)
4564  & + rkwall_glob12(:,3,i) * ul(:,2,i)
4565  & + rkwall_glob13(:,3,i) * ul(:,3,i)
4566  rlkwall(:,2,1) = rlkwall(:,2,1)
4567  & + rkwall_glob21(:,1,i) * ul(:,1,i)
4568  & + rkwall_glob22(:,1,i) * ul(:,2,i)
4569  & + rkwall_glob23(:,1,i) * ul(:,3,i)
4570  rlkwall(:,2,2) = rlkwall(:,2,2)
4571  & + rkwall_glob21(:,2,i) * ul(:,1,i)
4572  & + rkwall_glob22(:,2,i) * ul(:,2,i)
4573  & + rkwall_glob23(:,2,i) * ul(:,3,i)
4574  rlkwall(:,2,3) = rlkwall(:,2,3)
4575  & + rkwall_glob21(:,3,i) * ul(:,1,i)
4576  & + rkwall_glob22(:,3,i) * ul(:,2,i)
4577  & + rkwall_glob23(:,3,i) * ul(:,3,i)
4578  rlkwall(:,3,1) = rlkwall(:,3,1)
4579  & + rkwall_glob31(:,1,i) * ul(:,1,i)
4580  & + rkwall_glob32(:,1,i) * ul(:,2,i)
4581  & + rkwall_glob33(:,1,i) * ul(:,3,i)
4582  rlkwall(:,3,2) = rlkwall(:,3,2)
4583  & + rkwall_glob31(:,2,i) * ul(:,1,i)
4584  & + rkwall_glob32(:,2,i) * ul(:,2,i)
4585  & + rkwall_glob33(:,2,i) * ul(:,3,i)
4586  rlkwall(:,3,3) = rlkwall(:,3,3)
4587  & + rkwall_glob31(:,3,i) * ul(:,1,i)
4588  & + rkwall_glob32(:,3,i) * ul(:,2,i)
4589  & + rkwall_glob33(:,3,i) * ul(:,3,i)
4590  enddo
4591 c
4592 c.... --------------> End of Stiffness matrix & residual <-----------------
4593 c
4594 
4595 c
4596 c.... -----> Wall Stiffness and Mass matrices for implicit LHS <-----------
4597 c
4598 
4599 c.... Here we just add the mass matrix contribution. The stiffness contribution
4600 c.... is added in e3b
4601 
4602 c lhmFct = almi * (one - flmpl) Maybe we have to define flmplW: lumped
4603  ! mass parameter for the wall
4604  lhmfctvw = almi * (one - flmpl)
4605 c
4606 c.... scale variables for efficiency
4607 c
4608  tsfctvw = lhmfctvw * wdetjb * rhovw * thicknessvw
4609 c
4610 c.... compute mass and convection terms
4611 c
4612 c.... NOTE: the wall mass contributions should only have 3 nodal components
4613 c.... since the fourth node is an interior node... therefore, the loops should
4614 c.... be done from 1 to nshlb=3...
4615 
4616  do b = 1, nshlb
4617  do aa = 1, nshlb
4618  tmp1 = tsfctvw * shpb(:,aa) * shpb(:,b)
4619 c
4620 c tmp1=alpha_m*(1-lmp)*WdetJ*N^aN^b*rho*thickness the time term
4621 c
4622  xkebe(:,1,aa,b) = xkebe(:,1,aa,b) + tmp1
4623  xkebe(:,5,aa,b) = xkebe(:,5,aa,b) + tmp1
4624  xkebe(:,9,aa,b) = xkebe(:,9,aa,b) + tmp1
4625  enddo
4626  enddo
4627 
4628 c
4629 c.... assemble the nodal stiffness into the element stiffness matrix rKwall_glob
4630 c
4631 c.... We have passed the integer intp to make this operation only once: we are
4632 c.... not using the gauss points structure to compute the stiffness of the wall
4633 c.... elements, so we don't want to be redundant and calculate ngaussb times the
4634 c.... stiffness matrix which is constant for linear triangles...
4635 
4636 c.... This is ugly, but I will fix it later...
4637 
4638  if (intp.eq.ngaussb) then ! do this only for the last gauss point
4639  rkwall_glob(:,1,1,1) = rkwall_glob11(:,1,1)
4640  rkwall_glob(:,2,1,1) = rkwall_glob11(:,1,2)
4641  rkwall_glob(:,3,1,1) = rkwall_glob11(:,1,3)
4642  rkwall_glob(:,4,1,1) = rkwall_glob11(:,2,1)
4643  rkwall_glob(:,5,1,1) = rkwall_glob11(:,2,2)
4644  rkwall_glob(:,6,1,1) = rkwall_glob11(:,2,3)
4645  rkwall_glob(:,7,1,1) = rkwall_glob11(:,3,1)
4646  rkwall_glob(:,8,1,1) = rkwall_glob11(:,3,2)
4647  rkwall_glob(:,9,1,1) = rkwall_glob11(:,3,3)
4648 
4649  rkwall_glob(:,1,1,2) = rkwall_glob12(:,1,1)
4650  rkwall_glob(:,2,1,2) = rkwall_glob12(:,1,2)
4651  rkwall_glob(:,3,1,2) = rkwall_glob12(:,1,3)
4652  rkwall_glob(:,4,1,2) = rkwall_glob12(:,2,1)
4653  rkwall_glob(:,5,1,2) = rkwall_glob12(:,2,2)
4654  rkwall_glob(:,6,1,2) = rkwall_glob12(:,2,3)
4655  rkwall_glob(:,7,1,2) = rkwall_glob12(:,3,1)
4656  rkwall_glob(:,8,1,2) = rkwall_glob12(:,3,2)
4657  rkwall_glob(:,9,1,2) = rkwall_glob12(:,3,3)
4658 
4659  rkwall_glob(:,1,1,3) = rkwall_glob13(:,1,1)
4660  rkwall_glob(:,2,1,3) = rkwall_glob13(:,1,2)
4661  rkwall_glob(:,3,1,3) = rkwall_glob13(:,1,3)
4662  rkwall_glob(:,4,1,3) = rkwall_glob13(:,2,1)
4663  rkwall_glob(:,5,1,3) = rkwall_glob13(:,2,2)
4664  rkwall_glob(:,6,1,3) = rkwall_glob13(:,2,3)
4665  rkwall_glob(:,7,1,3) = rkwall_glob13(:,3,1)
4666  rkwall_glob(:,8,1,3) = rkwall_glob13(:,3,2)
4667  rkwall_glob(:,9,1,3) = rkwall_glob13(:,3,3)
4668 
4669  rkwall_glob(:,1,2,1) = rkwall_glob21(:,1,1)
4670  rkwall_glob(:,2,2,1) = rkwall_glob21(:,1,2)
4671  rkwall_glob(:,3,2,1) = rkwall_glob21(:,1,3)
4672  rkwall_glob(:,4,2,1) = rkwall_glob21(:,2,1)
4673  rkwall_glob(:,5,2,1) = rkwall_glob21(:,2,2)
4674  rkwall_glob(:,6,2,1) = rkwall_glob21(:,2,3)
4675  rkwall_glob(:,7,2,1) = rkwall_glob21(:,3,1)
4676  rkwall_glob(:,8,2,1) = rkwall_glob21(:,3,2)
4677  rkwall_glob(:,9,2,1) = rkwall_glob21(:,3,3)
4678 
4679  rkwall_glob(:,1,2,2) = rkwall_glob22(:,1,1)
4680  rkwall_glob(:,2,2,2) = rkwall_glob22(:,1,2)
4681  rkwall_glob(:,3,2,2) = rkwall_glob22(:,1,3)
4682  rkwall_glob(:,4,2,2) = rkwall_glob22(:,2,1)
4683  rkwall_glob(:,5,2,2) = rkwall_glob22(:,2,2)
4684  rkwall_glob(:,6,2,2) = rkwall_glob22(:,2,3)
4685  rkwall_glob(:,7,2,2) = rkwall_glob22(:,3,1)
4686  rkwall_glob(:,8,2,2) = rkwall_glob22(:,3,2)
4687  rkwall_glob(:,9,2,2) = rkwall_glob22(:,3,3)
4688 
4689  rkwall_glob(:,1,2,3) = rkwall_glob23(:,1,1)
4690  rkwall_glob(:,2,2,3) = rkwall_glob23(:,1,2)
4691  rkwall_glob(:,3,2,3) = rkwall_glob23(:,1,3)
4692  rkwall_glob(:,4,2,3) = rkwall_glob23(:,2,1)
4693  rkwall_glob(:,5,2,3) = rkwall_glob23(:,2,2)
4694  rkwall_glob(:,6,2,3) = rkwall_glob23(:,2,3)
4695  rkwall_glob(:,7,2,3) = rkwall_glob23(:,3,1)
4696  rkwall_glob(:,8,2,3) = rkwall_glob23(:,3,2)
4697  rkwall_glob(:,9,2,3) = rkwall_glob23(:,3,3)
4698 
4699  rkwall_glob(:,1,3,1) = rkwall_glob31(:,1,1)
4700  rkwall_glob(:,2,3,1) = rkwall_glob31(:,1,2)
4701  rkwall_glob(:,3,3,1) = rkwall_glob31(:,1,3)
4702  rkwall_glob(:,4,3,1) = rkwall_glob31(:,2,1)
4703  rkwall_glob(:,5,3,1) = rkwall_glob31(:,2,2)
4704  rkwall_glob(:,6,3,1) = rkwall_glob31(:,2,3)
4705  rkwall_glob(:,7,3,1) = rkwall_glob31(:,3,1)
4706  rkwall_glob(:,8,3,1) = rkwall_glob31(:,3,2)
4707  rkwall_glob(:,9,3,1) = rkwall_glob31(:,3,3)
4708 
4709  rkwall_glob(:,1,3,2) = rkwall_glob32(:,1,1)
4710  rkwall_glob(:,2,3,2) = rkwall_glob32(:,1,2)
4711  rkwall_glob(:,3,3,2) = rkwall_glob32(:,1,3)
4712  rkwall_glob(:,4,3,2) = rkwall_glob32(:,2,1)
4713  rkwall_glob(:,5,3,2) = rkwall_glob32(:,2,2)
4714  rkwall_glob(:,6,3,2) = rkwall_glob32(:,2,3)
4715  rkwall_glob(:,7,3,2) = rkwall_glob32(:,3,1)
4716  rkwall_glob(:,8,3,2) = rkwall_glob32(:,3,2)
4717  rkwall_glob(:,9,3,2) = rkwall_glob32(:,3,3)
4718 
4719  rkwall_glob(:,1,3,3) = rkwall_glob33(:,1,1)
4720  rkwall_glob(:,2,3,3) = rkwall_glob33(:,1,2)
4721  rkwall_glob(:,3,3,3) = rkwall_glob33(:,1,3)
4722  rkwall_glob(:,4,3,3) = rkwall_glob33(:,2,1)
4723  rkwall_glob(:,5,3,3) = rkwall_glob33(:,2,2)
4724  rkwall_glob(:,6,3,3) = rkwall_glob33(:,2,3)
4725  rkwall_glob(:,7,3,3) = rkwall_glob33(:,3,1)
4726  rkwall_glob(:,8,3,3) = rkwall_glob33(:,3,2)
4727  rkwall_glob(:,9,3,3) = rkwall_glob33(:,3,3)
4728 
4729  rkwall_glob = rkwall_glob*betai*delt(itseq)*delt(itseq)*alfi
4730 
4731  else
4732 c.... nothing happens
4733  goto 123
4734  endif
4735 
4736 123 continue
4737 
4738  endif
4739 c
4740 c.... return
4741 c
4742  return
4743  end
4744 
4746 
4747  subroutine e3bvarsclr (yl, shdrv, xlb,
4748  & shape, wdetjb, bnorm,
4749  & flux, dwl )
4750 
4751  include "global.h"
4752  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
4753  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
4754  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
4755  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
4756  include "common_blocks/sclrs.h"
4757  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
4758 
4759 C Argument variables
4760 C
4761  REAL*8 bnorm, flux, shape, shdrv
4762  REAL*8 wdetjb, xlb, yl
4763 C
4764 C Local variables
4765 C
4766  INTEGER isc, n
4767 C
4768  REAL*8 dxdxib, dxidxb, grads, gradsl
4769  REAL*8 temp, temp1, temp2, temp3
4770  REAL*8 v1, v2
4771 C
4772 c
4773  dimension yl(npro,nshl,ndof), shdrv(npro,nsd,nshl),
4774  & xlb(npro,nenl,nsd), shape(npro,nshl),
4775  & wdetjb(npro), bnorm(npro,nsd),
4776  & flux(npro)
4777 c
4778  dimension dxdxib(npro,nsd,nsd),
4779  & dxidxb(npro,nsd,nsd), temp(npro),
4780  & temp1(npro), temp2(npro),
4781  & temp3(npro),
4782  & v1(npro,nsd), v2(npro,nsd),
4783  & gradsl(npro,nsd), grads(npro,nsd)
4784 
4785  real*8 diffus(npro), dwl(npro,nshl)
4786 
4787  call getdiffsclr(shape,dwl,yl,diffus)
4788 c
4789 c.... ----------------------> Element Metrics <-----------------------
4790 c
4791 c.... compute the deformation gradient
4792 c
4793  dxdxib = zero
4794 c
4795  do n = 1, nenl
4796  dxdxib(:,1,1) = dxdxib(:,1,1) + xlb(:,n,1) * shdrv(:,1,n)
4797  dxdxib(:,1,2) = dxdxib(:,1,2) + xlb(:,n,1) * shdrv(:,2,n)
4798  dxdxib(:,1,3) = dxdxib(:,1,3) + xlb(:,n,1) * shdrv(:,3,n)
4799  dxdxib(:,2,1) = dxdxib(:,2,1) + xlb(:,n,2) * shdrv(:,1,n)
4800  dxdxib(:,2,2) = dxdxib(:,2,2) + xlb(:,n,2) * shdrv(:,2,n)
4801  dxdxib(:,2,3) = dxdxib(:,2,3) + xlb(:,n,2) * shdrv(:,3,n)
4802  dxdxib(:,3,1) = dxdxib(:,3,1) + xlb(:,n,3) * shdrv(:,1,n)
4803  dxdxib(:,3,2) = dxdxib(:,3,2) + xlb(:,n,3) * shdrv(:,2,n)
4804  dxdxib(:,3,3) = dxdxib(:,3,3) + xlb(:,n,3) * shdrv(:,3,n)
4805  enddo
4806 c
4807 c.... compute the normal to the boundary. This is achieved by taking
4808 c the cross product of two vectors in the plane of the 2-d
4809 c boundary face.
4810 c
4811  v1 = xlb(:,2,:) - xlb(:,1,:)
4812  v2 = xlb(:,3,:) - xlb(:,1,:)
4813 
4814 c
4815 c.....The following are done in order to correct temp1..3
4816 c based on the results from compressible code. This is done only
4817 c for wedges, depending on the bounary face.(tri or quad)
4818 c
4819  if (lcsyst .eq. 4) then
4820  temp1 = dxdxib(:,2,1) * dxdxib(:,3,3) -
4821  & dxdxib(:,2,3) * dxdxib(:,3,1)
4822  temp2 = dxdxib(:,3,1) * dxdxib(:,1,3) -
4823  & dxdxib(:,3,3) * dxdxib(:,1,1)
4824  temp3 = dxdxib(:,1,1) * dxdxib(:,2,3) -
4825  & dxdxib(:,1,3) * dxdxib(:,2,1)
4826 
4827  elseif (lcsyst .eq. 1) then
4828  temp1 = v1(:,2) * v2(:,3) - v2(:,2) * v1(:,3)
4829  temp2 = v2(:,1) * v1(:,3) - v1(:,1) * v2(:,3)
4830  temp3 = v1(:,1) * v2(:,2) - v2(:,1) * v1(:,2)
4831  else
4832  temp1 = - v1(:,2) * v2(:,3) + v2(:,2) * v1(:,3)
4833  temp2 = - v2(:,1) * v1(:,3) + v1(:,1) * v2(:,3)
4834  temp3 = - v1(:,1) * v2(:,2) + v2(:,1) * v1(:,2)
4835  endif
4836 c
4837  temp = one / sqrt( temp1**2 + temp2**2 + temp3**2 )
4838  bnorm(:,1) = temp1 * temp
4839  bnorm(:,2) = temp2 * temp
4840  bnorm(:,3) = temp3 * temp
4841 c
4842 
4843  if (lcsyst .eq. 3) then
4844  wdetjb = (1 - qwtb(lcsyst,intp)) / (four*temp)
4845  elseif (lcsyst .eq. 4) then
4846  wdetjb = qwtb(lcsyst,intp) / temp
4847  else
4848  wdetjb = qwtb(lcsyst,intp) / (four*temp)
4849  endif
4850 c
4851 c.... --------------------------> Grad-V <----------------------------
4852 c
4853 c.... compute grad-v for Navier-Stokes terms
4854 c
4855  if (navier .eq. 1) then
4856 c
4857 c.... compute the inverse of deformation gradient
4858 c
4859  dxidxb(:,1,1) = dxdxib(:,2,2) * dxdxib(:,3,3)
4860  & - dxdxib(:,3,2) * dxdxib(:,2,3)
4861  dxidxb(:,1,2) = dxdxib(:,3,2) * dxdxib(:,1,3)
4862  & - dxdxib(:,1,2) * dxdxib(:,3,3)
4863  dxidxb(:,1,3) = dxdxib(:,1,2) * dxdxib(:,2,3)
4864  & - dxdxib(:,1,3) * dxdxib(:,2,2)
4865  temp = one / ( dxidxb(:,1,1) * dxdxib(:,1,1)
4866  & + dxidxb(:,1,2) * dxdxib(:,2,1)
4867  & + dxidxb(:,1,3) * dxdxib(:,3,1) )
4868  dxidxb(:,1,1) = dxidxb(:,1,1) * temp
4869  dxidxb(:,1,2) = dxidxb(:,1,2) * temp
4870  dxidxb(:,1,3) = dxidxb(:,1,3) * temp
4871  dxidxb(:,2,1) = (dxdxib(:,2,3) * dxdxib(:,3,1)
4872  & - dxdxib(:,2,1) * dxdxib(:,3,3)) * temp
4873  dxidxb(:,2,2) = (dxdxib(:,1,1) * dxdxib(:,3,3)
4874  & - dxdxib(:,3,1) * dxdxib(:,1,3)) * temp
4875  dxidxb(:,2,3) = (dxdxib(:,2,1) * dxdxib(:,1,3)
4876  & - dxdxib(:,1,1) * dxdxib(:,2,3)) * temp
4877  dxidxb(:,3,1) = (dxdxib(:,2,1) * dxdxib(:,3,2)
4878  & - dxdxib(:,2,2) * dxdxib(:,3,1)) * temp
4879  dxidxb(:,3,2) = (dxdxib(:,3,1) * dxdxib(:,1,2)
4880  & - dxdxib(:,1,1) * dxdxib(:,3,2)) * temp
4881  dxidxb(:,3,3) = (dxdxib(:,1,1) * dxdxib(:,2,2)
4882  & - dxdxib(:,1,2) * dxdxib(:,2,1)) * temp
4883 c
4884 c.... compute local-grad-Y
4885 c
4886 c
4887  gradsl = zero
4888  isc=5+isclr
4889  do n = 1, nshl
4890  gradsl(:,1) = gradsl(:,1) + shdrv(:,1,n) * yl(:,n,isc)
4891  gradsl(:,2) = gradsl(:,2) + shdrv(:,2,n) * yl(:,n,isc)
4892  gradsl(:,3) = gradsl(:,3) + shdrv(:,3,n) * yl(:,n,isc)
4893  enddo
4894 c
4895 c.... convert local-grads to global-grads
4896 c
4897  grads(:,1) = dxidxb(:,1,1) * gradsl(:,1) +
4898  & dxidxb(:,2,1) * gradsl(:,2) +
4899  & dxidxb(:,3,1) * gradsl(:,3)
4900 
4901 c
4902  grads(:,2) = dxidxb(:,1,2) * gradsl(:,1) +
4903  & dxidxb(:,2,2) * gradsl(:,2) +
4904  & dxidxb(:,3,2) * gradsl(:,3)
4905 
4906  grads(:,3) = dxidxb(:,1,3) * gradsl(:,1) +
4907  & dxidxb(:,2,3) * gradsl(:,2) +
4908  & dxidxb(:,3,3) * gradsl(:,3)
4909 c
4910 c.... end grad-T
4911 c
4912  endif
4913 
4914  flux = diffus * ( grads(:,1) * bnorm(:,1)
4915  & + grads(:,2) * bnorm(:,2)
4916  & + grads(:,3) * bnorm(:,3) )
4917 c
4918 c.... return
4919 c
4920  return
4921  end
4922 
4924 
4925  subroutine rotatestiff(rKlocal, rotation,
4926  & rkglobal)
4927 
4928  include "global.h"
4929  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
4930 
4931 C Argument variables
4932 C
4933  REAL*8 rkglobal, rklocal, rotation
4934 C
4935 C Local variables
4936 C
4937  INTEGER i, j, k
4938 C
4939  REAL*8 tempm
4940 C
4941  dimension rklocal(npro,nsd,nsd), rotation(npro,nsd,nsd),
4942  & rkglobal(npro,nsd,nsd)
4943 
4944  dimension tempm(npro,nsd,nsd)
4945 
4946  tempm = zero
4947  do i = 1, 3
4948  do j = 1, 3
4949  do k = 1, 3
4950  tempm(:,i,j) = tempm(:,i,j)
4951  & + rklocal(:,i,k) * rotation(:,k,j)
4952  enddo
4953  enddo
4954  enddo
4955 
4956  rkglobal = zero
4957  do i = 1, 3
4958  do j = 1, 3
4959  do k = 1, 3
4960  rkglobal(:,i,j) = rkglobal(:,i,j)
4961  & + rotation(:,k,i) * tempm(:,k,j)
4962  enddo
4963  enddo
4964  enddo
4965 
4966  return
4967  end
4968 
4988 
4989  subroutine e3dcsclr ( gradS, giju, gGradS,
4990  & rls, taus, srcr,
4991  & dcfct)
4992  include "global.h"
4993  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
4994  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
4995  include "common_blocks/solpar.h"
4996  include "common_blocks/precis.h"
4997 c
4998 C Argument variables
4999 C
5000  REAL*8 dcfct, ggrads, giju, grads
5001  REAL*8 rls, srcr, taus
5002 C
5003 C Local variables
5004 C
5005  REAL*8 fact
5006 C
5007  dimension grads(npro,nsd), ggrads(npro,nsd),
5008  & rls(npro), taus(npro),
5009  & giju(npro,6), dcfct(npro),
5010  & srcr(npro)
5011 c
5012 c.... Form GijUp gradS and gradS . GijUp gradS (store in dcFct)
5013 c
5014 
5015  ggrads(:,1) = giju(:,1) * grads(:,1)
5016  1 + giju(:,4) * grads(:,2)
5017  2 + giju(:,6) * grads(:,3)
5018  ggrads(:,2) = giju(:,4) * grads(:,1)
5019  1 + giju(:,2) * grads(:,2)
5020  2 + giju(:,5) * grads(:,3)
5021  ggrads(:,3) = giju(:,6) * grads(:,1)
5022  1 + giju(:,5) * grads(:,2)
5023  2 + giju(:,3) * grads(:,3)
5024 c
5025  dcfct(:) = grads(:,1) * ggrads(:,1)
5026  1 + grads(:,2) * ggrads(:,2)
5027  2 + grads(:,3) * ggrads(:,3)
5028  3 + epsm
5029 
5030  dcfct(:) = 1.0/ dcfct(:)
5031 c
5032 c.... Form pdeRes 2-norm / gradT 2-norm
5033 c
5034 
5035  dcfct = dcfct * (rls - srcr) ** 2
5036 c
5037 c.... -------------------------> DC factor <------------------------
5038 c
5039 c.... DC-mallet
5040 c
5041  if (idcsclr(1) .eq. 1) then
5042 c
5043  fact = one
5044  if (ipord .eq. 2) fact = 0.9
5045  if (ipord .eq. 3) fact = 0.75
5046 c
5047 c$$$ dcFct(:)=dim((fact*sqrt(dcFct(:))),(tauS(:)*dcFct(:))) !not work
5048  !with all compilers
5049  dcfct(:)=max(0.0,(fact*sqrt(dcfct(:)))-(taus(:)*dcfct(:)))
5050 c
5051  endif
5052 c
5053 c
5054 c.... DC-quadratic
5055 c
5056  if (idcsclr(1) .eq. 2) then
5057 c
5058  dcfct(:) = two * taus(:) * dcfct(:)
5059 c
5060  endif
5061 c
5062 c.... DC-min
5063 c
5064  if (idcsclr(1) .eq. 3) then
5065 c
5066  fact = one
5067  if (ipord .eq. 2) fact = 0.9
5068 c
5069  dcfct(:) = min( max(0.0, (fact * sqrt(dcfct(:)) -
5070  & taus(:)*dcfct(:)) ), two * taus(:) * dcfct(:))
5071 c
5072  endif
5073 c
5074 c.... Scale the gGradT for residual formation
5075 c
5076  ggrads(:,1) = dcfct(:) * ggrads(:,1)
5077  ggrads(:,2) = dcfct(:) * ggrads(:,2)
5078  ggrads(:,3) = dcfct(:) * ggrads(:,3)
5079 
5080 
5081 
5082  return
5083  end
5084 
5115 
5116  subroutine e3ivar (yl, acl, shpfun,
5117  & shgl, xl,
5118  & aci, g1yi, g2yi,
5119  & g3yi, shg, dxidx,
5120  & wdetj, rho, pres,
5121  & u1, u2, u3,
5122  & ql, rlui, src,
5123  & rerrl, rlsl, rlsli,
5124  & dwl)
5125 
5126  include "global.h"
5127  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
5128  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
5129  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
5130  include "common_blocks/matdat.h"
5131  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
5132  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
5133  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
5134 
5135 
5136 c
5137 C Argument variables
5138 C
5139  REAL*8 aci, acl, dwl, dxidx
5140  REAL*8 g1yi, g2yi, g3yi, pres
5141  REAL*8 ql, rho, rlsl, rlsli
5142  REAL*8 rlui, shg, shgl, shpfun
5143  REAL*8 src, u1, u2, u3
5144  REAL*8 wdetj, xl, yl
5145 C
5146 C Local variables
5147 C
5148  INTEGER i, ia, idflow, n
5149 C
5150  REAL*8 dist2w, divqi, gradh
5151  REAL*8 gyti, sclr, sforce, temp
5152  REAL*8 tmp, weber, xx
5153 C
5154 c passed arrays
5155 c
5156  dimension yl(npro,nshl,ndof), dwl(npro,nenl),
5157  & acl(npro,nshl,ndof), shpfun(npro,nshl),
5158  & shgl(npro,nsd,nshl), xl(npro,nenl,nsd),
5159  & aci(npro,nsd), g1yi(npro,ndof),
5160  & g2yi(npro,ndof), g3yi(npro,ndof),
5161  & shg(npro,nshl,nsd), dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd),
5162  & wdetj(npro),
5163  & rho(npro), pres(npro),
5164  & u1(npro), u2(npro),
5165  & u3(npro), divqi(npro,nflow-1+isurf),
5166  & ql(npro,nshl,idflx), rlui(npro,nsd),
5167  & src(npro,nsd), temp(npro),xx(npro,nsd)
5168 c
5169  dimension tmp(npro), dist2w(npro)
5170 c
5171  dimension rlsl(npro,nshl,6), rlsli(npro,6)
5172 c
5173  real*8 rerrl(npro,nshl,6), omega(3), divu(npro)
5174  dimension gyti(npro,nsd), gradh(npro,nsd),
5175  & sforce(npro,3), weber(npro),
5176  & sclr(npro)
5177 c
5178 c.... -------------> Primitive variables at int. point <--------------
5179 c
5180 c.... compute primitive variables
5181 c
5182  pres = zero
5183  u1 = zero
5184  u2 = zero
5185  u3 = zero
5186 c
5187  do n = 1, nshl
5188  pres = pres + shpfun(:,n) * yl(:,n,1)
5189  u1 = u1 + shpfun(:,n) * yl(:,n,2)
5190  u2 = u2 + shpfun(:,n) * yl(:,n,3)
5191  u3 = u3 + shpfun(:,n) * yl(:,n,4)
5192  enddo
5193  if(matflg(5,1).eq.2) then ! boussinesq body force
5194  temp = zero
5195  do n = 1, nshl
5196  temp = temp + shpfun(:,n) * yl(:,n,5)
5197  enddo
5198  endif
5199  if(matflg(5,1).eq.3.or.matflg(6,1).eq.1) then
5200 c user-specified body force or coriolis force specified
5201  xx = zero
5202  do n = 1,nenl
5203  xx(:,1) = xx(:,1) + shpfun(:,n) * xl(:,n,1)
5204  xx(:,2) = xx(:,2) + shpfun(:,n) * xl(:,n,2)
5205  xx(:,3) = xx(:,3) + shpfun(:,n) * xl(:,n,3)
5206  enddo
5207  endif
5208 c
5209 c
5210 c.... Resolved Leonhard stress set to zero - no turbulence - DES
5211  rlsli = zero
5212 c
5213 c.... -----------------------> accel. at int. point <----------------------
5214 c
5215  aci = zero
5216  do n = 1, nshl
5217  aci(:,1) = aci(:,1) + shpfun(:,n) * acl(:,n,2)
5218  aci(:,2) = aci(:,2) + shpfun(:,n) * acl(:,n,3)
5219  aci(:,3) = aci(:,3) + shpfun(:,n) * acl(:,n,4)
5220  enddo
5221 c
5222 c.... ---------------------> Element Metrics <-----------------------
5223 c
5224  call e3metric( xl, shgl, dxidx,
5225  & shg, wdetj)
5226 c
5227 c.... compute the global gradient of u and P
5228 c
5229 c
5230  g1yi = zero
5231  g2yi = zero
5232  g3yi = zero
5233  do n = 1, nshl
5234  g1yi(:,1) = g1yi(:,1) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,1)
5235  g1yi(:,2) = g1yi(:,2) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,2)
5236  g1yi(:,3) = g1yi(:,3) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,3)
5237  g1yi(:,4) = g1yi(:,4) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,4)
5238 c
5239  g2yi(:,1) = g2yi(:,1) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,1)
5240  g2yi(:,2) = g2yi(:,2) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,2)
5241  g2yi(:,3) = g2yi(:,3) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,3)
5242  g2yi(:,4) = g2yi(:,4) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,4)
5243 c
5244  g3yi(:,1) = g3yi(:,1) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,1)
5245  g3yi(:,2) = g3yi(:,2) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,2)
5246  g3yi(:,3) = g3yi(:,3) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,3)
5247  g3yi(:,4) = g3yi(:,4) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,4)
5248  enddo
5249 
5250  divqi = zero
5251  idflow = 3
5252  if ( idiff >= 1 .or. isurf==1 ) then
5253 c
5254 c.... compute divergence of diffusive flux vector, qi,i
5255 c
5256  if(idiff >= 1) then
5257  do n=1, nshl
5258  divqi(:,1) = divqi(:,1) + shg(:,n,1)*ql(:,n,1 )
5259  & + shg(:,n,2)*ql(:,n,4 )
5260  & + shg(:,n,3)*ql(:,n,7 )
5261 
5262  divqi(:,2) = divqi(:,2) + shg(:,n,1)*ql(:,n,2 )
5263  & + shg(:,n,2)*ql(:,n,5 )
5264  & + shg(:,n,3)*ql(:,n,8)
5265 
5266  divqi(:,3) = divqi(:,3) + shg(:,n,1)*ql(:,n,3 )
5267  & + shg(:,n,2)*ql(:,n,6 )
5268  & + shg(:,n,3)*ql(:,n,9 )
5269 
5270  enddo
5271 
5272  endif !end of idiff
5273 c
5274  if (isurf .eq. 1) then
5275 c .... divergence of normal calculation (curvature)
5276  do n=1, nshl
5277  divqi(:,idflow+1) = divqi(:,idflow+1)
5278  & + shg(:,n,1)*ql(:,n,idflx-2)
5279  & + shg(:,n,2)*ql(:,n,idflx-1)
5280  & + shg(:,n,3)*ql(:,n,idflx)
5281  enddo
5282 c .... initialization of some variables
5283  sclr = zero
5284  gradh= zero
5285  gyti = zero
5286  sforce=zero
5287  do i = 1, npro
5288  do n = 1, nshl
5289  sclr(i) = sclr(i) + shpfun(i,n) * yl(i,n,6) !scalar
5290 c
5291 c .... compute the global gradient of Scalar variable
5292 c
5293  gyti(i,1) = gyti(i,1) + shg(i,n,1) * yl(i,n,6)
5294  gyti(i,2) = gyti(i,2) + shg(i,n,2) * yl(i,n,6)
5295  gyti(i,3) = gyti(i,3) + shg(i,n,3) * yl(i,n,6)
5296 c
5297  enddo
5298 
5299 c NMW - 2014-03-25: Not really sure what this is doing.
5300 c deleted since we don't have epsilon_ls anymore, but
5301 c not sure if this is correct.
5302 c if (abs (sclr(i)) .le. epsilon_ls) then
5303 c gradh(i,1) = 0.5/epsilon_ls * (1.0
5304 c & + cos(pi*Sclr(i)/epsilon_ls)) * gyti(i,1)
5305 c gradh(i,2) = 0.5/epsilon_ls * (1.0
5306 c & + cos(pi*Sclr(i)/epsilon_ls)) * gyti(i,2)
5307 c gradh(i,3) = 0.5/epsilon_ls * (1.0
5308 c & + cos(pi*Sclr(i)/epsilon_ls)) * gyti(i,3)
5309 c endif
5310  enddo !end of the loop over npro
5311 c
5312 c .. surface tension force calculation
5313 c .. divide by density now as it gets multiplied in e3res.f, as surface
5314 c tension force is already in the form of force per unit volume
5315 c
5316  weber(:) = bo
5317  sforce(:,1) = -(1.0/weber(:)) * divqi(:,idflow+1) !x-direction
5318  & *gradh(:,1) /rho(:)
5319  sforce(:,2) = -(1.0/weber(:)) * divqi(:,idflow+1) !y-direction
5320  & *gradh(:,2) /rho(:)
5321  sforce(:,3) = -(1.0/weber(:)) * divqi(:,idflow+1) !z-direction
5322  & *gradh(:,3) /rho(:)
5323 c
5324  endif ! end of the surface tension force calculation
5325  endif ! diffusive flux computation
5326 c
5327 c Calculate strong form of pde as well as the source term
5328 c
5329  call e3resstrongpde(
5330  & aci, u1, u2, u3, temp, rho, xx,
5331  & g1yi, g2yi, g3yi,
5332  & rlui, src, divqi)
5333 c
5334 c.... take care of the surface tension force term here
5335 c
5336  if (isurf .eq. 1) then ! note multiplied by density in e3res.f
5337  src(:,1) = src(:,1) + sforce(:,1)
5338  src(:,2) = src(:,2) + sforce(:,2)
5339  src(:,3) = src(:,3) + sforce(:,3)
5340  endif
5341 
5342  return
5343  end
5344 
5347 
5348  subroutine e3ivarsclr (yl, acl, shpfun,
5349  & shgl, xl, xmudmi,
5350  & sclr, sdot, grads,
5351  & shg, dxidx, wdetj,
5352  & u1, u2, u3,
5353  & ql, rls , srcr,
5354  & srcl, umod, dwl,
5355  & diffus, srcrat)
5356 c
5357  include "global.h"
5358  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
5359  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
5360  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
5361  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
5362  include "common_blocks/matdat.h"
5363  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
5364  include "common_blocks/sclrs.h"
5365  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
5366 c
5367 C Argument variables
5368 C
5369  REAL*8 acl, diffus, dwl, dxidx
5370  REAL*8 grads, ql, rls, sclr
5371  REAL*8 sdot, shg, shgl, shpfun
5372  REAL*8 srcl, srcr, srcrat, u1
5373  REAL*8 u2, u3, umod, wdetj
5374  REAL*8 xl, yl
5375 C
5376 C Local variables
5377 C
5378  INTEGER id, n
5379 C
5380  REAL*8 divqi, divs, temp, tmp
5381  REAL*8 x, xx
5382 C
5383 c passed arrays
5384 c
5385  dimension yl(npro,nshl,ndof), acl(npro,nshl,ndof),
5386  & sclr(npro), sdot(npro),
5387  & grads(npro,nsd), shpfun(npro,nshl),
5388  & shgl(npro,nsd,nshl), xl(npro,nenl,nsd),
5389  & shg(npro,nshl,nsd), dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd),
5390  & wdetj(npro),
5391  & u1(npro), u2(npro),
5392  & u3(npro), divs(npro),
5393  & ql(npro,nshl,nsd), rls(npro),
5394  & srcr(npro), srcl(npro),
5395  & dwl(npro,nshl), diffus(npro),
5396  & umod(npro,nsd), temp(npro),xx(npro,nsd),
5397  & divqi(npro)
5398 c
5399  dimension tmp(npro), srcrat(npro)
5400  real*8 rlui(npro,nsd), aci(npro,nsd),
5401  & g1yi(npro,nflow), g2yi(npro,nflow),
5402  & g3yi(npro,nflow),
5403  & src(npro,nsd), rho(npro),
5404  & rmu(npro)
5405  real*8 ubar(npro,nsd), xmudmi(npro,ngauss)
5406 
5407 c
5408 c.... -------------> Primitive variables at int. point <--------------
5409 c
5410 c.... compute primitive variables
5411 c
5412  u1 = zero
5413  u2 = zero
5414  u3 = zero
5415  sclr = zero
5416 c
5417  id=isclr+5
5418  do n = 1, nshl
5419  u1 = u1 + shpfun(:,n) * yl(:,n,2)
5420  u2 = u2 + shpfun(:,n) * yl(:,n,3)
5421  u3 = u3 + shpfun(:,n) * yl(:,n,4)
5422  sclr = sclr + shpfun(:,n) * yl(:,n,id)
5423  enddo
5424 c
5425 c
5426 c.... -----------------------> dS/dt at int. point <----------------------
5427 c
5428  sdot = zero
5429  do n = 1, nshl
5430  sdot = sdot + shpfun(:,n) * acl(:,n,id)
5431  enddo
5432 c
5433 c.... ---------------------> Element Metrics <-----------------------
5434 c
5435 
5436  call e3metric( xl, shgl, dxidx,
5437  & shg, wdetj)
5438 
5439 c
5440 c.... compute the global gradient of u and P
5441 c
5442 c
5443  grads = zero
5444  do n = 1, nshl
5445  grads(:,1) = grads(:,1) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,id)
5446  grads(:,2) = grads(:,2) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,id)
5447  grads(:,3) = grads(:,3) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,id)
5448  enddo
5449 
5450  divs = zero
5451  if ( idiff >= 1 ) then
5452 c
5453 c.... compute divergence of diffusive flux vector, qi,i
5454 c
5455  do n=1, nshl
5456  divs(:) = divs(:) + shg(:,n,1)*ql(:,n,1 )
5457  & + shg(:,n,2)*ql(:,n,2 )
5458  & + shg(:,n,3)*ql(:,n,3 )
5459  enddo
5460  endif ! diffusive flux computation
5461 
5462  if(consrv_sclr_conv_vel) then
5463 c Calculate uBar = u - TauM*L, where TauM is the momentum
5464 c stabilization factor and L is the momentum residual
5465 
5466  if(matflg(5,1).eq.2) then ! boussinesq body force
5467  temp = zero
5468  do n = 1, nshl
5469  temp = temp + shpfun(:,n) * yl(:,n,5)
5470  enddo
5471  endif
5472  if(matflg(5,1).eq.3.or.matflg(6,1).eq.1) then
5473 c user-specified body force or coriolis force specified
5474  xx = zero
5475  do n = 1,nenl
5476  xx(:,1) = xx(:,1) + shpfun(:,n) * xl(:,n,1)
5477  xx(:,2) = xx(:,2) + shpfun(:,n) * xl(:,n,2)
5478  xx(:,3) = xx(:,3) + shpfun(:,n) * xl(:,n,3)
5479  enddo
5480  endif
5481  aci = zero
5482  do n = 1, nshl
5483  aci(:,1) = aci(:,1) + shpfun(:,n) * acl(:,n,2)
5484  aci(:,2) = aci(:,2) + shpfun(:,n) * acl(:,n,3)
5485  aci(:,3) = aci(:,3) + shpfun(:,n) * acl(:,n,4)
5486  enddo
5487  g1yi = zero
5488  g2yi = zero
5489  g3yi = zero
5490  do n = 1, nshl
5491  g1yi(:,1) = g1yi(:,1) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,1)
5492  g1yi(:,2) = g1yi(:,2) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,2)
5493  g1yi(:,3) = g1yi(:,3) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,3)
5494  g1yi(:,4) = g1yi(:,4) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,4)
5495 c
5496  g2yi(:,1) = g2yi(:,1) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,1)
5497  g2yi(:,2) = g2yi(:,2) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,2)
5498  g2yi(:,3) = g2yi(:,3) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,3)
5499  g2yi(:,4) = g2yi(:,4) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,4)
5500 c
5501  g3yi(:,1) = g3yi(:,1) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,1)
5502  g3yi(:,2) = g3yi(:,2) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,2)
5503  g3yi(:,3) = g3yi(:,3) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,3)
5504  g3yi(:,4) = g3yi(:,4) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,4)
5505  enddo
5506 c
5507 
5508  rho = datmat(1,1,1)
5509  rmu = datmat(1,2,1)
5510 
5511  divqi=zero ! until we reconstruct q_flow for scalar solve
5512  call e3resstrongpde(
5513  & aci, u1, u2, u3, temp, rho, xx,
5514  & g1yi, g2yi, g3yi,
5515  & rlui, src, divqi)
5516  src(:,1)=u1 !
5517  src(:,2)=u2 ! store u in src memory
5518  src(:,3)=u3 !
5519 c e3uBar calculates Tau_M and assembles uBar
5520  call getdiff(dwl, yl, shpfun, xmudmi, xl, rmu, rho)
5521  call e3ubar(rho, src, dxidx, rlui, rmu, ubar)
5522  u1=ubar(:,1) ! the entire scalar residual
5523  u2=ubar(:,2) ! is based on the modified
5524  u3=ubar(:,3) ! velocity for conservation
5525  endif
5526 c
5527 c.... Initialize uMod, the modified velocity uMod
5528 c We initialize it to u_i and then calculate
5529 c the correction in e3sourcesclr
5530 c
5531 
5532  umod(:,1) = u1
5533  umod(:,2) = u2
5534  umod(:,3) = u3
5535 c
5536 c.... no source terms
5537 c
5538  srcrat = zero
5539  srcr = zero
5540  srcl = zero
5541 c
5542 c.... -------------------> Scalar residual <-----------------
5543 c
5544 
5545  rls(:) = ( sdot(:) + (u1*grads(:,1) +
5546  & u2*grads(:,2) +
5547  & u3*grads(:,3)) )
5548  & - divs(:)
5549 
5550 c
5551 c.... return
5552 c
5553  return
5554  end
5555 
5577 
5578  subroutine e3lhs ( u1, u2, u3,
5579  & ubar, wdetj, rho,
5580  & rlui, rmu,
5581  & tauc, taum, taubar,
5582  & shpfun, shg, xkebe,
5583  & xgoc )
5584 
5585  include "global.h"
5586  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
5587  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
5588  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
5589  include "common_blocks/solpar.h"
5590  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
5591 C
5592 C Argument variables
5593 C
5594  REAL*8 rho, rlui, rmu, shg
5595  REAL*8 shpfun, taubar, tauc, taum
5596  REAL*8 u1, u2, u3, ubar
5597  REAL*8 wdetj, xgoc, xkebe
5598 C
5599 C Local variables
5600 C
5601  REAL*8 t1, t2, t3, tlw
5602  REAL*8 tmp, tmp1, tmp2
5603  dimension u1(npro), u2(npro), u3(npro),
5604  & ubar(npro,3), wdetj(npro), rho(npro),
5605  & rlui(npro,3), rmu(npro),
5606  & tauc(npro), taum(npro), taubar(npro),
5607  & shpfun(npro,nshl),shg(npro,nshl,3)
5608 
5609  dimension xkebe(npro,9,nshl,nshl), xgoc(npro,4,nshl,nshl)
5610 c
5611 c.... local declarations
5612 c
5613  dimension t1(npro,3), t2(npro,3), t3(npro,3),
5614  & tmp1(npro), tmp2(npro),
5615  & tmp(npro), tlw(npro)
5616 
5617  integer aa, b
5618 
5619  real*8 lhmfct, lhsfct, tsfct(npro)
5620 
5621  lhsfct = alfi * gami * delt(itseq)
5622  lhmfct = almi * (one - flmpl)
5623 c
5624 c.... scale variables for efficiency
5625 c
5626  tlw = lhsfct * wdetj
5627  tmp1 = tlw * rho
5628  taum = tlw * taum
5629  tauc = tlw * tauc
5630  rmu = tlw * rmu
5631  tsfct = lhmfct * wdetj * rho
5632  if(iconvflow.eq.2) then ! 2 is ubar form 3 is cons form but ubar tang.
5633  taubar = lhsfct * wdetj * taubar
5634  ubar(:,1) = tmp1 * ubar(:,1)
5635  ubar(:,2) = tmp1 * ubar(:,2)
5636  ubar(:,3) = tmp1 * ubar(:,3)
5637  else
5638  taubar = zero !lazy tangent...if effective code it
5639  ubar(:,1) = tmp1 * u1(:)
5640  ubar(:,2) = tmp1 * u2(:)
5641  ubar(:,3) = tmp1 * u3(:)
5642  endif
5643 
5644 c
5645 c.... compute mass and convection terms
5646 c
5647  do b = 1, nshl
5648  t1(:,1) = ubar(:,1) * shg(:,b,1)
5649  & + ubar(:,2) * shg(:,b,2)
5650  & + ubar(:,3) * shg(:,b,3)
5651 c
5652 c t1=ubar_k N^b,k*rho*alpha_f*gamma*deltat*WdetJ
5653 c
5654  do aa = 1, nshl
5655  tmp1 = tsfct * shpfun(:,aa) * shpfun(:,b)
5656  tmp2 = tmp1 + t1(:,1) * shpfun(:,aa)
5657 c
5658 c tmp1=alpha_m*(1-lmp)*WdetJ*N^aN^b*rho the time term CORRECT
5659 c tmp2=tmp1+N^a*ubar_k N^b,k*rho*alpha_f*gamma*deltat*WdetJ the
5660 c second term is convective term CORRECT
5661 c
5662  xkebe(:,1,aa,b) = xkebe(:,1,aa,b) + tmp2
5663  xkebe(:,5,aa,b) = xkebe(:,5,aa,b) + tmp2
5664  xkebe(:,9,aa,b) = xkebe(:,9,aa,b) + tmp2
5665  enddo
5666  enddo
5667 c
5668 c.... compute the rest of K (symmetric terms)
5669 c
5670  do b = 1, nshl
5671 
5672  t1(:,1) = tauc * shg(:,b,1)
5673  t1(:,2) = tauc * shg(:,b,2)
5674  t1(:,3) = tauc * shg(:,b,3)
5675 
5676 c t1 is tauC*N^b_i,j*alpha_f*gamma*deltat*WdetJ
5677 
5678  t2(:,1) = rmu * shg(:,b,1)
5679  t2(:,2) = rmu * shg(:,b,2)
5680  t2(:,3) = rmu * shg(:,b,3)
5681 c t2 is mu*N^b_j,k*alpha_f*gamma*deltat*WdetJ
5682 
5683  tmp1 = taum * ( u1 * shg(:,b,1)
5684  & + u2 * shg(:,b,2)
5685  & + u3 * shg(:,b,3) )*rho
5686 c tmp1 is tauM*(rho u_m N^b_j,m)*alpha_f*gamma*deltat*WdetJ
5687 
5688  tmp2 = taubar * ( rlui(:,1) * shg(:,b,1)
5689  & + rlui(:,2) * shg(:,b,2)
5690  & + rlui(:,3) * shg(:,b,3) )
5691 c tmp2 is taubar*(L_m N^b_j,m)*alpha_f*gamma*deltat*WdetJ
5692  t3(:,1) = t2(:,1) + tmp1 * u1 + tmp2 * rlui(:,1)
5693  t3(:,2) = t2(:,2) + tmp1 * u2 + tmp2 * rlui(:,2)
5694  t3(:,3) = t2(:,3) + tmp1 * u3 + tmp2 * rlui(:,3)
5695 
5696 c t3 is (mu*N^b_j,k + u_k tauM*(rho u_m N^b_j,m)+ L_k*taubar*(L_mN^b_j,m )
5697 c *alpha_f*gamma*deltat*WdetJ which isline 2 page 40 of whiting
5698 c ALMOST (waiting to get hit with N^a_{i,k}
5699 c mu correct NOW (wrong before) and rho weight on tauM term
5700 c
5701 c.... first do the (nodal) diagonal blocks
5702 c
5703  aa = b
5704 
5705  tmp = t3(:,1) * shg(:,aa,1)
5706  & + t3(:,2) * shg(:,aa,2)
5707  & + t3(:,3) * shg(:,aa,3)
5708 c previous command is the N^a_{i,k} dot product with t3 defined above
5709 
5710  xkebe(:,1,aa,b) = xkebe(:,1,aa,b) + tmp
5711  & + t1(:,1) * shg(:,aa,1)
5712  & + t2(:,1) * shg(:,aa,1)
5713  xkebe(:,5,aa,b) = xkebe(:,5,aa,b) + tmp
5714  & + t1(:,2) * shg(:,aa,2)
5715  & + t2(:,2) * shg(:,aa,2)
5716  xkebe(:,9,aa,b) = xkebe(:,9,aa,b) + tmp
5717  & + t1(:,3) * shg(:,aa,3)
5718  & + t2(:,3) * shg(:,aa,3)
5719 c
5720  tmp1 = t1(:,1) * shg(:,aa,2)
5721  & + t2(:,2) * shg(:,aa,1)
5722  xkebe(:,2,aa,b) = xkebe(:,2,aa,b) + tmp1
5723  xkebe(:,4,b,aa) = xkebe(:,4,b,aa) + tmp1
5724 c
5725  tmp1 = t1(:,1) * shg(:,aa,3)
5726  & + t2(:,3) * shg(:,aa,1)
5727  xkebe(:,3,aa,b) = xkebe(:,3,aa,b) + tmp1
5728  xkebe(:,7,b,aa) = xkebe(:,7,b,aa) + tmp1
5729 c
5730  tmp1 = t1(:,2) * shg(:,aa,3)
5731  & + t2(:,3) * shg(:,aa,2)
5732  xkebe(:,6,aa,b) = xkebe(:,6,aa,b) + tmp1
5733  xkebe(:,8,b,aa) = xkebe(:,8,b,aa) + tmp1
5734 c
5735 c.... now the off-diagonal (nodal) blocks
5736 c
5737  do aa = b+1, nshl
5738  tmp = t3(:,1) * shg(:,aa,1)
5739  & + t3(:,2) * shg(:,aa,2)
5740  & + t3(:,3) * shg(:,aa,3)
5741 c
5742  tmp1 = tmp
5743  & + t1(:,1) * shg(:,aa,1)
5744  & + t2(:,1) * shg(:,aa,1)
5745  xkebe(:,1,aa,b) = xkebe(:,1,aa,b) + tmp1
5746  xkebe(:,1,b,aa) = xkebe(:,1,b,aa) + tmp1
5747 c
5748  tmp1 = tmp
5749  & + t1(:,2) * shg(:,aa,2)
5750  & + t2(:,2) * shg(:,aa,2)
5751  xkebe(:,5,aa,b) = xkebe(:,5,aa,b) + tmp1
5752  xkebe(:,5,b,aa) = xkebe(:,5,b,aa) + tmp1
5753 c
5754  tmp1 = tmp
5755  & + t1(:,3) * shg(:,aa,3)
5756  & + t2(:,3) * shg(:,aa,3)
5757  xkebe(:,9,aa,b) = xkebe(:,9,aa,b) + tmp1
5758  xkebe(:,9,b,aa) = xkebe(:,9,b,aa) + tmp1
5759 c
5760 c.... ( i != j )
5761 c
5762  tmp1 = t1(:,1) * shg(:,aa,2)
5763  & + t2(:,2) * shg(:,aa,1)
5764  xkebe(:,2,aa,b) = xkebe(:,2,aa,b) + tmp1
5765  xkebe(:,4,b,aa) = xkebe(:,4,b,aa) + tmp1
5766 c
5767  tmp1 = t1(:,1) * shg(:,aa,3)
5768  & + t2(:,3) * shg(:,aa,1)
5769  xkebe(:,3,aa,b) = xkebe(:,3,aa,b) + tmp1
5770  xkebe(:,7,b,aa) = xkebe(:,7,b,aa) + tmp1
5771 c
5772  tmp1 = t1(:,2) * shg(:,aa,1)
5773  & + t2(:,1) * shg(:,aa,2)
5774  xkebe(:,4,aa,b) = xkebe(:,4,aa,b) + tmp1
5775  xkebe(:,2,b,aa) = xkebe(:,2,b,aa) + tmp1
5776 c
5777  tmp1 = t1(:,2) * shg(:,aa,3)
5778  & + t2(:,3) * shg(:,aa,2)
5779  xkebe(:,6,aa,b) = xkebe(:,6,aa,b) + tmp1
5780  xkebe(:,8,b,aa) = xkebe(:,8,b,aa) + tmp1
5781 c
5782  tmp1 = t1(:,3) * shg(:,aa,1)
5783  & + t2(:,1) * shg(:,aa,3)
5784  xkebe(:,7,aa,b) = xkebe(:,7,aa,b) + tmp1
5785  xkebe(:,3,b,aa) = xkebe(:,3,b,aa) + tmp1
5786 c
5787  tmp1 = t1(:,3) * shg(:,aa,2)
5788  & + t2(:,2) * shg(:,aa,3)
5789  xkebe(:,8,aa,b) = xkebe(:,8,aa,b) + tmp1
5790  xkebe(:,6,b,aa) = xkebe(:,6,b,aa) + tmp1
5791 c
5792  enddo
5793  enddo
5794 c
5795 c.... compute G Nai Nbp,j
5796 c
5797 
5798  do b = 1, nshl
5799  t1(:,1) = tlw * shg(:,b,1)
5800  t1(:,2) = tlw * shg(:,b,2)
5801  t1(:,3) = tlw * shg(:,b,3)
5802  do aa = 1, nshl
5803  xgoc(:,1,aa,b) = xgoc(:,1,aa,b) + t1(:,1) * shpfun(:,aa)
5804  xgoc(:,2,aa,b) = xgoc(:,2,aa,b) + t1(:,2) * shpfun(:,aa)
5805  xgoc(:,3,aa,b) = xgoc(:,3,aa,b) + t1(:,3) * shpfun(:,aa)
5806  enddo
5807  enddo
5808 c
5809 c.... compute C
5810 c we divide by rho because the L on the weight space is density divided
5811 c form
5812 c
5813  taum=taum/rho
5814  do b = 1, nshl
5815  t1(:,1) = taum * shg(:,b,1)
5816  t1(:,2) = taum * shg(:,b,2)
5817  t1(:,3) = taum * shg(:,b,3)
5818  do aa = b, nshl
5819  xgoc(:,4,aa,b) = xgoc(:,4,aa,b)
5820  & + t1(:,1) * shg(:,aa,1)
5821  & + t1(:,2) * shg(:,aa,2)
5822  & + t1(:,3) * shg(:,aa,3)
5823  enddo
5824  enddo
5825 
5826 c
5827 c.... return
5828 c
5829  return
5830  end
5831 
5833 
5834  subroutine e3lhssclr ( uMod, giju, dcFct,
5835  & sclr, sdot, grads,
5836  & wdetj, rls, taus,
5837  & shpfun, shg, src,
5838  & diffus,
5839  & xsebe )
5840 
5841 c
5842  include "global.h"
5843  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
5844  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
5845  include "common_blocks/sclrs.h"
5846  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
5847  include "common_blocks/solpar.h"
5848  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
5849 C
5850 C Argument variables
5851 C
5852  REAL*8 dcfct, giju
5853 C
5854 C Local variables
5855 C
5856  REAL*8 t1, tmp, tmp1, tmp2
5857 C
5858  real*8 umod(npro,nsd),
5859  & sclr(npro), sdot(npro), grads(npro,nsd),
5860  & wdetj(npro), rls(npro), rho(npro),
5861  & taus(npro), shpfun(npro,nshl),
5862  & src(npro), shg(npro,nshl,3),
5863  & xsebe(npro,nshl,nshl)
5864 
5865  real*8 diffus(npro), cp, kptmp(npro),tauso(npro)
5866 
5867 c
5868 c.... local declarations
5869 c
5870  dimension t1(npro,3), tmp1(npro), tmp2(npro),
5871  & tmp(npro), dcfct(npro), giju(npro,6)
5872 
5873  integer aa, b
5874 
5875  real*8 lhsfct, tsfct(npro)
5876 
5877  lhsfct = alfi * gami * delt(itseq)
5878 c
5879 c.... scale variables for efficiency
5880 c
5881  tauso = taus
5882  taus = lhsfct * wdetj * taus
5883  kptmp = lhsfct * wdetj * diffus
5884  tsfct = almi * wdetj * (one - flmpl)
5885  src = src * wdetj * lhsfct
5886 c
5887 c.... compute mass and convection terms
5888 c
5889  do b = 1, nshl
5890  t1(:,1) = wdetj * ( umod(:,1) * shg(:,b,1)
5891  & + umod(:,2) * shg(:,b,2)
5892  & + umod(:,3) * shg(:,b,3) )
5893  t1(:,2) = t1(:,1) * tauso
5894  do aa = 1, nshl
5895  tmp1 = shpfun(:,aa) * shpfun(:,b)
5896  tmp2 = shpfun(:,aa) * lhsfct
5897  xsebe(:,aa,b) = xsebe(:,aa,b) + tmp1 * (tsfct + src)
5898  & + tmp2 * t1(:,1)
5899 c
5900 c.... compute mass term for stab u_j N_{a,j} tau N_b (note that a and b
5901 c flipped on both sides below)
5902 c
5903  xsebe(:,b,aa) = xsebe(:,b,aa) + t1(:,2)*shpfun(:,aa)
5904  enddo
5905  enddo
5906 c
5907 c.... compute the rest of S (symmetric terms)
5908 c
5909  do b = 1, nshl
5910  tmp = taus(:)
5911  & * ( umod(:,1) * shg(:,b,1)
5912  & + umod(:,2) * shg(:,b,2)
5913  & + umod(:,3) * shg(:,b,3) )
5914 
5915  t1(:,1) = kptmp * shg(:,b,1) + umod(:,1) * tmp
5916  t1(:,2) = kptmp * shg(:,b,2) + umod(:,2) * tmp
5917  t1(:,3) = kptmp * shg(:,b,3) + umod(:,3) * tmp
5918  if (idcsclr(1) .ne. 0) then
5919  if ((idcsclr(2).eq.1 .and. isclr.eq.1) .or.
