5920  & (idcsclr(2).eq.2 .and. isclr.eq.2)) then ! scalar with dc
5921 c
5922  tmp = wdetj * dcfct * lhsfct
5923 c
5924  giju(:,1) = tmp * giju(:,1)
5925  giju(:,2) = tmp * giju(:,2)
5926  giju(:,3) = tmp * giju(:,3)
5927  giju(:,4) = tmp * giju(:,4)
5928  giju(:,5) = tmp * giju(:,5)
5929  giju(:,6) = tmp * giju(:,6)
5930 c
5931  t1(:,1) = t1(:,1) + giju(:,1) * shg(:,b,1)
5932  2 + giju(:,4) * shg(:,b,2)
5933  3 + giju(:,6) * shg(:,b,3)
5934  t1(:,2) = t1(:,2) + giju(:,4) * shg(:,b,1)
5935  2 + giju(:,2) * shg(:,b,2)
5936  3 + giju(:,5) * shg(:,b,3)
5937  t1(:,3) = t1(:,3) + giju(:,6) * shg(:,b,1)
5938  2 + giju(:,5) * shg(:,b,2)
5939  3 + giju(:,3) * shg(:,b,3)
5940  endif
5941  endif !end of idcsclr
5942 c
5943 c.... first do the (nodal) diagonal blocks
5944 c
5945  aa = b
5946 
5947  xsebe(:,aa,b) = xsebe(:,aa,b) + t1(:,1) * shg(:,aa,1)
5948  & + t1(:,2) * shg(:,aa,2)
5949  & + t1(:,3) * shg(:,aa,3)
5950 
5951 c
5952 c.... now the off-diagonal (nodal) blocks
5953 c
5954  do aa = b+1, nshl
5955  tmp = t1(:,1) * shg(:,aa,1)
5956  & + t1(:,2) * shg(:,aa,2)
5957  & + t1(:,3) * shg(:,aa,3)
5958 c
5959  xsebe(:,aa,b) = xsebe(:,aa,b) + tmp
5960  xsebe(:,b,aa) = xsebe(:,b,aa) + tmp
5961 c
5962  enddo
5963  enddo
5964 
5965 c
5966 c.... return
5967 c
5968  return
5969  end
5970 
5974 
5975  subroutine e3metric( xl, shgl, dxidx,
5976  & shg, wdetj)
5977 
5978  include "global.h"
5979  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
5980  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
5981  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
5982  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
5983 C
5984 C Local variables
5985 C
5986  INTEGER n
5987 C
5988  real*8 xl(npro,nenl,nsd), shgl(npro,nsd,nshl),
5989  & dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd), shg(npro,nshl,nsd),
5990  & wdetj(npro)
5991 
5992  real*8 dxdxi(npro,nsd,nsd), tmp(npro)
5993 
5994 c
5995 c.... compute the deformation gradient
5996 c
5997  dxdxi = zero
5998 c
5999  do n = 1, nenl
6000  dxdxi(:,1,1) = dxdxi(:,1,1) + xl(:,n,1) * shgl(:,1,n)
6001  dxdxi(:,1,2) = dxdxi(:,1,2) + xl(:,n,1) * shgl(:,2,n)
6002  dxdxi(:,1,3) = dxdxi(:,1,3) + xl(:,n,1) * shgl(:,3,n)
6003  dxdxi(:,2,1) = dxdxi(:,2,1) + xl(:,n,2) * shgl(:,1,n)
6004  dxdxi(:,2,2) = dxdxi(:,2,2) + xl(:,n,2) * shgl(:,2,n)
6005  dxdxi(:,2,3) = dxdxi(:,2,3) + xl(:,n,2) * shgl(:,3,n)
6006  dxdxi(:,3,1) = dxdxi(:,3,1) + xl(:,n,3) * shgl(:,1,n)
6007  dxdxi(:,3,2) = dxdxi(:,3,2) + xl(:,n,3) * shgl(:,2,n)
6008  dxdxi(:,3,3) = dxdxi(:,3,3) + xl(:,n,3) * shgl(:,3,n)
6009  enddo
6010 c
6011 c.... compute the inverse of deformation gradient
6012 c
6013  dxidx(:,1,1) = dxdxi(:,2,2) * dxdxi(:,3,3)
6014  & - dxdxi(:,3,2) * dxdxi(:,2,3)
6015  dxidx(:,1,2) = dxdxi(:,3,2) * dxdxi(:,1,3)
6016  & - dxdxi(:,1,2) * dxdxi(:,3,3)
6017  dxidx(:,1,3) = dxdxi(:,1,2) * dxdxi(:,2,3)
6018  & - dxdxi(:,1,3) * dxdxi(:,2,2)
6019  tmp = one / ( dxidx(:,1,1) * dxdxi(:,1,1)
6020  & + dxidx(:,1,2) * dxdxi(:,2,1)
6021  & + dxidx(:,1,3) * dxdxi(:,3,1) )
6022  dxidx(:,1,1) = dxidx(:,1,1) * tmp
6023  dxidx(:,1,2) = dxidx(:,1,2) * tmp
6024  dxidx(:,1,3) = dxidx(:,1,3) * tmp
6025  dxidx(:,2,1) = (dxdxi(:,2,3) * dxdxi(:,3,1)
6026  & - dxdxi(:,2,1) * dxdxi(:,3,3)) * tmp
6027  dxidx(:,2,2) = (dxdxi(:,1,1) * dxdxi(:,3,3)
6028  & - dxdxi(:,3,1) * dxdxi(:,1,3)) * tmp
6029  dxidx(:,2,3) = (dxdxi(:,2,1) * dxdxi(:,1,3)
6030  & - dxdxi(:,1,1) * dxdxi(:,2,3)) * tmp
6031  dxidx(:,3,1) = (dxdxi(:,2,1) * dxdxi(:,3,2)
6032  & - dxdxi(:,2,2) * dxdxi(:,3,1)) * tmp
6033  dxidx(:,3,2) = (dxdxi(:,3,1) * dxdxi(:,1,2)
6034  & - dxdxi(:,1,1) * dxdxi(:,3,2)) * tmp
6035  dxidx(:,3,3) = (dxdxi(:,1,1) * dxdxi(:,2,2)
6036  & - dxdxi(:,1,2) * dxdxi(:,2,1)) * tmp
6037 c
6038  wdetj = qwt(lcsyst,intp) / tmp
6039 c
6040 c.... compute the global gradient of shape-functions
6041 c
6042  do n = 1, nshl
6043  shg(:,n,1) = shgl(:,1,n) * dxidx(:,1,1) +
6044  & shgl(:,2,n) * dxidx(:,2,1) +
6045  & shgl(:,3,n) * dxidx(:,3,1)
6046  shg(:,n,2) = shgl(:,1,n) * dxidx(:,1,2) +
6047  & shgl(:,2,n) * dxidx(:,2,2) +
6048  & shgl(:,3,n) * dxidx(:,3,2)
6049  shg(:,n,3) = shgl(:,1,n) * dxidx(:,1,3) +
6050  & shgl(:,2,n) * dxidx(:,2,3) +
6051  & shgl(:,3,n) * dxidx(:,3,3)
6052  enddo
6053 
6054  return
6055  end
6056 
6069 
6070  subroutine e3q (yl, dwl, shp, shgl,
6071  & xl, ql, rmassl,
6072  & xmudmi, sgn )
6073 c
6074  include "global.h"
6075  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
6076  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
6077  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
6078  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
6079  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
6080  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
6081 C
6082 C Argument variables
6083 C
6084  REAL*8 dwl, ql, rmassl, sgn
6085  REAL*8 shgl, shp, xl, xmudmi
6086  REAL*8 yl
6087 C
6088 C Local variables
6089 C
6090  INTEGER i, n
6091 C
6092  REAL*8 alph1, alph2, dxidx, g1yi
6093  REAL*8 g1yti, g2yi, g2yti, g3yi
6094  REAL*8 g3yti, qdi, rmu, shape
6095  REAL*8 shdrv, shg, shpsum, wdetj
6096 c
6097  dimension yl(npro,nshl,ndof), dwl(npro,nenl),
6098  & shp(nshl,ngauss), shgl(nsd,nshl,ngauss),
6099  & xl(npro,nenl,nsd),
6100  & ql(npro,nshl,idflx), rmassl(npro,nshl),
6101  & xmudmi(npro,ngauss)
6102 c
6103 c local arrays
6104 c
6105  dimension g1yi(npro,nflow), g2yi(npro,nflow),
6106  & g3yi(npro,nflow), shg(npro,nshl,nsd),
6107  & dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd), wdetj(npro),
6108  & rmu(npro)
6109 c
6110  dimension qdi(npro,idflx),alph1(npro),alph2(npro)
6111 c
6112  dimension sgn(npro,nshl), shape(npro,nshl),
6113  & shdrv(npro,nsd,nshl), shpsum(npro)
6114 
6115  real*8 tmp(npro)
6116 c
6117 c.... for surface tension
6118 c
6119  dimension g1yti(npro), g2yti(npro),
6120  & g3yti(npro)
6121  integer idflow
6122 c
6123 c.... loop through the integration points
6124 c
6125 
6126 
6127  alph1 = 0.d0
6128  alph2 = 0.d0
6129 
6130  do intp = 1, ngauss
6131  if (qwt(lcsyst,intp) .eq. zero) cycle ! precaution
6132 c
6133  call getshp(shp, shgl, sgn,
6134  & shape, shdrv)
6135 
6136 c
6137 c.... initialize
6138 c
6139  qdi = zero
6140 c
6141 c
6142 c.... calculate the integration variables necessary for the
6143 c formation of q
6144 c
6145 
6146  call e3qvar(yl, shdrv,
6147  & xl, g1yi,
6148  & g2yi, g3yi, shg,
6149  & dxidx, wdetj )
6150 c
6151  idflow = 9 ! we ALWAYS save space for tau_{ij} in q_i
6152  ! even if idiff is not greater than 1
6153 
6154  if(idiff >= 1) then !so taking care of all the idiff=1,3
6155 c
6156 c.... compute diffusive fluxes
6157 c
6158 c.... compute the viscosity
6159 c
6160  call getdiff(dwl, yl, shape, xmudmi, xl, rmu, tmp)
6161 c
6162 c.... diffusive flux in x1-direction
6163 c
6164  qdi(:,1) = two * rmu * g1yi(:,2)
6165  qdi(:,4) = rmu * (g1yi(:,3) + g2yi(:,2))
6166  qdi(:,7) = rmu * (g1yi(:,4) + g3yi(:,2))
6167 c
6168 c.... diffusive flux in x2-direction
6169 c
6170  qdi(:,2) = rmu * (g1yi(:,3) + g2yi(:,2))
6171  qdi(:,5) = two * rmu * g2yi(:,3)
6172  qdi(:,8) = rmu * (g2yi(:,4) + g3yi(:,3))
6173 c
6174 c.... diffusive flux in x3-direction
6175 c
6176  qdi(:,3) = rmu * (g1yi(:,4) + g3yi(:,2))
6177  qdi(:,6)= rmu * (g2yi(:,4) + g3yi(:,3))
6178  qdi(:,9)= two * rmu * g3yi(:,4)
6179 c
6180 c
6181 c.... assemble contribution of qdi to ql,i.e., contribution to
6182 c each element node
6183 c
6184  do i=1,nshl
6185  ql(:,i,1 ) = ql(:,i,1 )+ shape(:,i)*wdetj*qdi(:,1 )
6186  ql(:,i,2 ) = ql(:,i,2 )+ shape(:,i)*wdetj*qdi(:,2 )
6187  ql(:,i,3 ) = ql(:,i,3 )+ shape(:,i)*wdetj*qdi(:,3 )
6188 
6189  ql(:,i,4 ) = ql(:,i,4 )+ shape(:,i)*wdetj*qdi(:,4 )
6190  ql(:,i,5 ) = ql(:,i,5 )+ shape(:,i)*wdetj*qdi(:,5 )
6191  ql(:,i,6 ) = ql(:,i,6 )+ shape(:,i)*wdetj*qdi(:,6 )
6192 
6193  ql(:,i,7 ) = ql(:,i,7 )+ shape(:,i)*wdetj*qdi(:,7 )
6194  ql(:,i,8 ) = ql(:,i,8 )+ shape(:,i)*wdetj*qdi(:,8 )
6195  ql(:,i,9 ) = ql(:,i,9 )+ shape(:,i)*wdetj*qdi(:,9 )
6196 
6197  enddo
6198 c
6199 c.... compute and assemble the element contribution to the lumped
6200 c mass matrix
6201 c
6202 c
6203 c.... row sum technique
6204 c
6205  if ( idiff == 1 ) then
6206  do i=1,nshl
6207  rmassl(:,i) = rmassl(:,i) + shape(:,i)*wdetj
6208  enddo
6209  endif
6210 c
6211 c.... "special lumping technique" (Hughes p. 445)
6212 c
6213  if ( idiff == 3 ) then
6214  shpsum = zero
6215  do i=1,nshl
6216  shpsum = shpsum + shape(:,i)*shape(:,i)
6217  rmassl(:,i)=rmassl(:,i)+shape(:,i)*shape(:,i)*wdetj
6218  enddo
6219  alph1 = alph1+wdetj
6220  alph2 = alph2+shpsum*wdetj
6221  endif
6222  endif ! end of idiff=1 .or. 3
6223 c
6224  if(isurf .eq. 1) then
6225 c
6226 c.... initialize
6227 c
6228  g1yti = zero
6229  g2yti = zero
6230  g3yti = zero
6231 c
6232 c.... calculate the integration variables necessary for the
6233 c formation of q
6234 c
6235 c.... compute the global gradient of Yt-variables, assuming 6th entry as
6236 c.... the phase indicator function
6237 c
6238 c Yt_{,x_i}=SUM_{a=1}^nshl (N_{a,x_i}(int) Yta)
6239 c
6240  do n = 1, nshl
6241  g1yti(:) = g1yti(:) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,6)
6242  g2yti(:) = g2yti(:) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,6)
6243  g3yti(:) = g3yti(:) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,6)
6244  enddo
6245 c
6246 c computing N_{b}*N_{a,x_i)*yta*WdetJ
6247 c
6248  do i=1,nshl
6249  ql(:,i,idflow+1) = ql(:,i,idflow+1)
6250  & + shape(:,i)*wdetj*g1yti
6251  ql(:,i,idflow+2) = ql(:,i,idflow+2)
6252  & + shape(:,i)*wdetj*g2yti
6253  ql(:,i,idflow+3) = ql(:,i,idflow+3)
6254  & + shape(:,i)*wdetj*g3yti
6255  rmassl(:,i) = rmassl(:,i) + shape(:,i)*wdetj
6256  enddo
6257  endif !end of the isurf
6258 c
6259 c.... end of the loop over integration points
6260 c
6261  enddo
6262 c
6263 c.... normalize the mass matrix for idiff == 3
6264 c
6265  if ( idiff == 3 ) then
6266  do i=1,nshl
6267  rmassl(:,i) = rmassl(:,i)*alph1/alph2
6268  enddo
6269  endif
6270 
6271 
6272 c
6273 c.... return
6274 c
6275  return
6276  end
6277 
6280 
6281  subroutine e3qsclr (yl, dwl, shp, shgl,
6282  & xl, ql, rmassl,
6283  & sgn )
6284 c
6285  include "global.h"
6286  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
6287  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
6288  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
6289  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
6290  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
6291  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
6292 C
6293 C Argument variables
6294 C
6295  REAL*8 dwl, ql, rmassl, sgn
6296  REAL*8 shgl, shp, xl, yl
6297 C
6298 C Local variables
6299 C
6300  INTEGER i
6301 C
6302  REAL*8 alph1, alph2, dxidx, gradt
6303  REAL*8 qdi, shape, shdrv, shpsum
6304  REAL*8 wdetj
6305 c
6306  dimension yl(npro,nshl,ndof), dwl(npro,nshl),
6307  & shp(nshl,ngauss), shgl(nsd,nshl,ngauss),
6308  & xl(npro,nenl,nsd),
6309  & ql(npro,nshl,nsd), rmassl(npro,nshl)
6310 c
6311 c local arrays
6312 c
6313  dimension gradt(npro,nsd),
6314  & dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd), wdetj(npro)
6315 c
6316  dimension qdi(npro,nsd),alph1(npro),alph2(npro)
6317 c
6318  dimension sgn(npro,nshl), shape(npro,nshl),
6319  & shdrv(npro,nsd,nshl), shpsum(npro)
6320 
6321  real*8 diffus(npro)
6322 c
6323 c.... loop through the integration points
6324 c
6325 
6326 
6327  alph1 = 0.d0
6328  alph2 = 0.d0
6329 
6330  do intp = 1, ngauss
6331  if (qwt(lcsyst,intp) .eq. zero) cycle ! precaution
6332 c
6333  call getshp(shp, shgl, sgn,
6334  & shape, shdrv)
6335 
6336 c
6337 c.... initialize
6338 c
6339  qdi = zero
6340 c
6341 c
6342 c.... calculate the integration variables necessary for the
6343 c formation of q
6344 c
6345  call e3qvarsclr(yl, shdrv,
6346  & xl, gradt,
6347  & dxidx, wdetj )
6348 
6349 c
6350 c.... compute diffusive flux vector at this integration point
6351 c
6352  call getdiffsclr(shape, dwl, yl, diffus)
6353 
6354 c
6355 c.... diffusive flux
6356 c
6357  qdi(:,1) = diffus * gradt(:,1)
6358  qdi(:,2) = diffus * gradt(:,2)
6359  qdi(:,3) = diffus * gradt(:,3)
6360 c
6361 c
6362 c.... assemble contribution of qdi to ql,i.e., contribution to
6363 c each element node
6364 c
6365  do i=1,nshl
6366  ql(:,i,1 ) = ql(:,i,1 )+ shape(:,i)*wdetj*qdi(:,1 )
6367  ql(:,i,2 ) = ql(:,i,2 )+ shape(:,i)*wdetj*qdi(:,2 )
6368  ql(:,i,3 ) = ql(:,i,3 )+ shape(:,i)*wdetj*qdi(:,3 )
6369 
6370  enddo
6371 c
6372 c.... compute and assemble the element contribution to the lumped
6373 c mass matrix
6374 c
6375 c
6376 c.... row sum technique
6377 c
6378  if ( idiff == 1 ) then
6379  do i=1,nshl
6380  rmassl(:,i) = rmassl(:,i) + shape(:,i)*wdetj
6381  enddo
6382  endif
6383 c
6384 c.... "special lumping technique" (Hughes p. 445)
6385 c
6386  if ( idiff == 3 ) then
6387  shpsum = zero
6388  do i=1,nshl
6389  shpsum = shpsum + shape(:,i)*shape(:,i)
6390  rmassl(:,i)=rmassl(:,i)+shape(:,i)*shape(:,i)*wdetj
6391  enddo
6392  alph1 = alph1+wdetj
6393  alph2 = alph2+shpsum*wdetj
6394  endif
6395 c
6396 c.... end of the loop over integration points
6397 c
6398  enddo
6399 c
6400 c.... normalize the mass matrix for idiff == 3
6401 c
6402  if ( idiff == 3 ) then
6403  do i=1,nshl
6404  rmassl(:,i) = rmassl(:,i)*alph1/alph2
6405  enddo
6406  endif
6407 c
6408 c.... return
6409 c
6410  return
6411  end
6412 
6425 
6426  subroutine e3ql (yl, dwl, shp, shgl,
6427  & xl, ql, xmudmi,
6428  & sgn )
6429  use local_mass
6430 
6431  include "global.h"
6432  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
6433  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
6434  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
6435  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
6436  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
6437  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
6438 c
6439 C Argument variables
6440 C
6441  REAL*8 dwl, ql, sgn, shgl
6442  REAL*8 shp, xl, xmudmi, yl
6443 C
6444 C Local variables
6445 C
6446  INTEGER i, iel, indx
6447  INTEGER j
6448 C
6449  REAL*8 dxidx, g1yi, g2yi, g3yi
6450  REAL*8 qdi, qrl, d
6451  REAL*8 rmass, rminv, rmu, shape
6452  REAL*8 shdrv, shg
6453  REAL*8 wdetj
6454 C
6455  dimension yl(npro,nshl,ndof), dwl(npro,nshl),
6456  & shp(nshl,ngauss), shgl(nsd,nshl,ngauss),
6457  & xl(npro,nenl,nsd), sgn(npro,nshl),
6458  & ql(npro,nshl,idflx), xmudmi(npro,ngauss)
6459 c
6460 c local arrays
6461 c
6462  dimension g1yi(npro,ndof), g2yi(npro,ndof),
6463  & g3yi(npro,ndof), shg(npro,nshl,nsd),
6464  & dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd), wdetj(npro),
6465  & rmu(npro),
6466  & rminv(npro,nshl,nshl),
6467  & qrl(npro,nshl,nsd*nsd)
6468 c
6469  dimension qdi(npro,nsd*nsd), shape(npro,nshl),
6470  & shdrv(npro,nsd,nshl), indx(nshl),
6471  & rmass(npro,nshl,nshl)
6472 
6473 
6474  real*8 tmp(npro)
6475 c
6476 c.... loop through the integration points
6477 c
6478  rminv = zero
6479  rmass = zero
6480  qrl = zero
6481 
6482  do intp = 1, ngauss
6483 
6484  call getshp(shp, shgl, sgn, shape, shdrv)
6485 
6486  qdi = zero
6487 c
6488 c.... calculate the integration variables
6489 c
6490 c
6491  call e3qvar(yl, shdrv,
6492  & xl, g1yi,
6493  & g2yi, g3yi, shg,
6494  & dxidx, wdetj )
6495 
6496  call getdiff(dwl, yl, shape, xmudmi, xl,rmu, tmp)
6497 c
6498 c.... diffusive flux in x1-direction
6499 c
6500  qdi(:,1) = two * rmu * g1yi(:,2)
6501  qdi(:,4) = rmu * (g1yi(:,3) + g2yi(:,2))
6502  qdi(:,7) = rmu * (g1yi(:,4) + g3yi(:,2))
6503 c
6504 c.... diffusive flux in x2-direction
6505 c
6506  qdi(:,2) = rmu * (g1yi(:,3) + g2yi(:,2))
6507  qdi(:,5) = two * rmu * g2yi(:,3)
6508  qdi(:,8) = rmu * (g2yi(:,4) + g3yi(:,3))
6509 c
6510 c.... diffusive flux in x3-direction
6511 c
6512  qdi(:,3) = rmu * (g1yi(:,4) + g3yi(:,2))
6513  qdi(:,6)= rmu * (g2yi(:,4) + g3yi(:,3))
6514  qdi(:,9)= two * rmu * g3yi(:,4)
6515 c
6516 c
6517 c.... assemble contribution of qdi to qrl,i.e., contribution to
6518 c each element shape function
6519 c
6520  tmp = qwt(lcsyst,intp)
6521  if (lcsyst .eq. 1) then
6522  tmp = tmp*(three/four)
6523  endif
6524 c
6525 c reconsider this when hierarchic wedges come into code WDGCHECK
6526 c
6527 
6528  do i=1,nshl
6529  qrl(:,i,1 ) = qrl(:,i,1 )+ shape(:,i)*tmp*qdi(:,1 )
6530  qrl(:,i,2 ) = qrl(:,i,2 )+ shape(:,i)*tmp*qdi(:,2 )
6531  qrl(:,i,3 ) = qrl(:,i,3 )+ shape(:,i)*tmp*qdi(:,3 )
6532 
6533  qrl(:,i,4 ) = qrl(:,i,4 )+ shape(:,i)*tmp*qdi(:,4 )
6534  qrl(:,i,5 ) = qrl(:,i,5 )+ shape(:,i)*tmp*qdi(:,5 )
6535  qrl(:,i,6 ) = qrl(:,i,6 )+ shape(:,i)*tmp*qdi(:,6 )
6536 
6537  qrl(:,i,7 ) = qrl(:,i,7 )+ shape(:,i)*tmp*qdi(:,7 )
6538  qrl(:,i,8 ) = qrl(:,i,8 )+ shape(:,i)*tmp*qdi(:,8 )
6539  qrl(:,i,9 ) = qrl(:,i,9 )+ shape(:,i)*tmp*qdi(:,9 )
6540  enddo
6541 c
6542 c.... add contribution to local mass matrix
6543 c
6544 
6545  if (have_local_mass .eq. 0) then
6546  do i=1,nshl
6547  do j=1,nshl
6548  rmass(:,i,j) = rmass(:,i,j)+shape(:,i)*shape(:,j)*tmp
6549  enddo
6550  enddo
6551  endif
6552 c
6553 c.... end of the loop over integration points
6554 c
6555  enddo
6556 
6557 c
6558 c.... find the inverse of the local mass matrix for each element
6559 
6560 
6561  if (have_local_mass .eq. 0) then
6562  allocate (lmassinv(iblock)%p(npro,nshl,nshl))
6563 
6564  do iel=1,npro
6565  do i=1,nshl ! form the identy matrix
6566  do j=1,nshl
6567  lmassinv(iblock)%p(iel,i,j) = 0.0
6568  enddo
6569  lmassinv(iblock)%p(iel,i,i)=1.0
6570  enddo
6571 c
6572 c.... LU factor the mass matrix
6573 c
6574 c call ludcmp(rmass(iel,:,:),nshl,nshl,indx,d)
6575 c
6576 c.... back substitute with the identy matrix to find the
6577 c matrix inverse
6578 c
6579  do j=1,nshl
6580 c call lubksb(rmass(iel,:,:),nshl,nshl,indx,
6581 c & lmassinv(iblock)%p(iel,:,j))
6582  enddo
6583  enddo
6584  rminv(:,:,:) = lmassinv(iblock)%p(:,:,:)
6585  else
6586  rminv(:,:,:) = lmassinv(iblock)%p(:,:,:)
6587  endif
6588 c
6589 c.... find the modal coefficients of ql by multiplying by the inverse of
6590 c the local mass matrix
6591 c
6592  do iel=1,npro
6593  do j=1,9
6594 c do j=1, 3*nsd
6595  ql(iel,:,j) = matmul( rminv(iel,:,:),qrl(iel,:,j) )
6596  enddo
6597  enddo
6598 c
6599 c.... return
6600 c
6601  return
6602  end
6603 
6607 
6608  subroutine e3qlsclr (yl, dwl, shp, shgl,
6609  & xl, ql, sgn )
6610 
6611  use local_mass
6612 
6613  include "global.h"
6614  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
6615  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
6616  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
6617  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
6618  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
6619 c
6620 C Argument variables
6621 C
6622  REAL*8 dwl, ql, sgn, shgl
6623  REAL*8 shp, xl, yl
6624 C
6625 C Local variables
6626 C
6627  INTEGER i, iel, indx
6628  INTEGER j
6629 C
6630  REAL*8 diffus, dxidx, eviscv, gradt
6631  REAL*8 qdi, qrl, d
6632  REAL*8 rmass, rminv, shape, shdrv
6633  REAL*8 tmp, wdetj
6634 C
6635  dimension yl(npro,nshl,ndof), dwl(npro,nshl),
6636  & shp(nshl,ngauss), shgl(nsd,nshl,ngauss),
6637  & xl(npro,nenl,nsd), sgn(npro,nshl),
6638  & ql(npro,nshl,nsd)
6639 c
6640 c local arrays
6641 c
6642  dimension dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd), wdetj(npro),
6643  & diffus(npro),
6644  & rminv(npro,nshl,nshl),
6645  & qrl(npro,nshl,nsd)
6646 c
6647  dimension qdi(npro,nsd), shape(npro,nshl),
6648  & shdrv(npro,nsd,nshl), indx(nshl),
6649  & rmass(npro,nshl,nshl), gradt(npro,nsd),
6650  & eviscv(npro)
6651 
6652 c
6653 c.... loop through the integration points
6654 c
6655  rminv = zero
6656  rmass = zero
6657  qrl = zero
6658 
6659  do intp = 1, ngauss
6660 
6661  call getshp(shp, shgl, sgn, shape, shdrv)
6662 
6663  qdi = zero
6664 c
6665 c.... calculate the integration variables
6666 c
6667 c
6668  call e3qvarsclr(yl, shdrv, xl,
6669  & gradt, dxidx, wdetj )
6670 c
6671 c.... call function to sort out diffusivity (at end of this file)
6672 c
6673  call getdiffsclr(dwl,shape,yl, diffus)
6674 c
6675 c.... diffusive flux in x1-direction
6676 c
6677  qdi(:,1) = diffus * gradt(:,1)
6678  qdi(:,2) = diffus * gradt(:,2)
6679  qdi(:,3) = diffus * gradt(:,3)
6680 
6681 c
6682 c.... assemble contribution of qdi to qrl,i.e., contribution to
6683 c each element shape function
6684 c
6685  tmp = qwt(lcsyst,intp)
6686  if (lcsyst .eq. 1) then
6687  tmp = tmp*(three/four)
6688  endif
6689 
6690  do i=1,nshl
6691  qrl(:,i,1 ) = qrl(:,i,1 )+ shape(:,i)*tmp*qdi(:,1 )
6692  qrl(:,i,2 ) = qrl(:,i,2 )+ shape(:,i)*tmp*qdi(:,2 )
6693  qrl(:,i,3 ) = qrl(:,i,3 )+ shape(:,i)*tmp*qdi(:,3 )
6694  enddo
6695 c
6696 c.... add contribution to local mass matrix
6697 c
6698  if (have_local_mass .eq. 0) then
6699  do i=1,nshl
6700  do j=1,nshl
6701  rmass(:,i,j)=rmass(:,i,j)+shape(:,i)*shape(:,j)*tmp
6702  enddo
6703  enddo
6704  endif
6705 
6706 c.... end of the loop over integration points
6707 c
6708  enddo
6709 
6710 c
6711 c.... find the inverse of the local mass matrix for each element
6712 c
6713  qrl = qrl/6.d0
6714 c
6715 c.... Assuming that lmassinv was already computed for flow equations
6716 c
6717  rmass = rmass/6.0
6718 c
6719 c.... for cubics, it cannot be precomputed, so compute and
6720 c save it the first time it is needed
6721 c
6722  if (have_local_mass .eq. 0) then
6723  allocate (lmassinv(iblock)%p(npro,nshl,nshl))
6724 
6725  do iel=1,npro
6726  do i=1,nshl ! form the identy matrix
6727  do j=1,nshl
6728  lmassinv(iblock)%p(iel,i,j) = 0.0
6729  enddo
6730  lmassinv(iblock)%p(iel,i,i)=1.0
6731  enddo
6732 c
6733 c.... LU factor the mass matrix
6734 c
6735 c call ludcmp(rmass(iel,:,:),nshl,nshl,indx,d)
6736 c
6737 c.... back substitute with the identy matrix to find the
6738 c matrix inverse
6739 c
6740  do j=1,nshl
6741 c call lubksb(rmass(iel,:,:),nshl,nshl,indx,
6742 c & lmassinv(iblock)%p(iel,:,j))
6743  enddo
6744  enddo
6745  rminv(:,:,:) = lmassinv(iblock)%p(:,:,:)
6746  else
6747  rminv(:,:,:) = lmassinv(iblock)%p(:,:,:)
6748  endif
6749 c
6750 c.... find the modal coefficients of ql by multiplying by the inverse of
6751 c the local mass matrix
6752 c
6753  do iel=1,npro
6754  do j=1,nsd
6755  ql(iel,:,j) = matmul( rminv(iel,:,:),qrl(iel,:,j) )
6756  enddo
6757  enddo
6758 c
6759 c.... return
6760 c
6761  return
6762  end
6763 
6782 
6783  subroutine e3qvar (yl, shgl,
6784  & xl, g1yi,
6785  & g2yi, g3yi, shg,
6786  & dxidx, wdetj )
6787 c
6788  include "global.h"
6789  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
6790  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
6791  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
6792  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
6793  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
6794 c
6795 C Argument variables
6796 C
6797  REAL*8 dxidx, g1yi, g2yi, g3yi
6798  REAL*8 shg, shgl, wdetj, xl
6799  REAL*8 yl
6800 C
6801 C Local variables
6802 C
6803  INTEGER n
6804 C
6805  REAL*8 dxdxi, tmp
6806 C
6807 c passed arrays
6808 c
6809  dimension yl(npro,nshl,ndof),
6810  & shgl(npro,nsd,nshl), xl(npro,nenl,nsd),
6811  & g1yi(npro,nflow), g2yi(npro,nflow),
6812  & g3yi(npro,nflow), shg(npro,nshl,nsd),
6813  & dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd), wdetj(npro)
6814 c
6815 c local arrays
6816 c
6817  dimension tmp(npro), dxdxi(npro,nsd,nsd)
6818 
6819 c
6820 c.... compute the deformation gradient
6821 c
6822  dxdxi = zero
6823 c
6824  do n = 1, nenl
6825  dxdxi(:,1,1) = dxdxi(:,1,1) + xl(:,n,1) * shgl(:,1,n)
6826  dxdxi(:,1,2) = dxdxi(:,1,2) + xl(:,n,1) * shgl(:,2,n)
6827  dxdxi(:,1,3) = dxdxi(:,1,3) + xl(:,n,1) * shgl(:,3,n)
6828  dxdxi(:,2,1) = dxdxi(:,2,1) + xl(:,n,2) * shgl(:,1,n)
6829  dxdxi(:,2,2) = dxdxi(:,2,2) + xl(:,n,2) * shgl(:,2,n)
6830  dxdxi(:,2,3) = dxdxi(:,2,3) + xl(:,n,2) * shgl(:,3,n)
6831  dxdxi(:,3,1) = dxdxi(:,3,1) + xl(:,n,3) * shgl(:,1,n)
6832  dxdxi(:,3,2) = dxdxi(:,3,2) + xl(:,n,3) * shgl(:,2,n)
6833  dxdxi(:,3,3) = dxdxi(:,3,3) + xl(:,n,3) * shgl(:,3,n)
6834  enddo
6835 c
6836 c.... compute the inverse of deformation gradient
6837 c
6838  dxidx(:,1,1) = dxdxi(:,2,2) * dxdxi(:,3,3)
6839  & - dxdxi(:,3,2) * dxdxi(:,2,3)
6840  dxidx(:,1,2) = dxdxi(:,3,2) * dxdxi(:,1,3)
6841  & - dxdxi(:,1,2) * dxdxi(:,3,3)
6842  dxidx(:,1,3) = dxdxi(:,1,2) * dxdxi(:,2,3)
6843  & - dxdxi(:,1,3) * dxdxi(:,2,2)
6844  tmp = one / ( dxidx(:,1,1) * dxdxi(:,1,1)
6845  & + dxidx(:,1,2) * dxdxi(:,2,1)
6846  & + dxidx(:,1,3) * dxdxi(:,3,1) )
6847  dxidx(:,1,1) = dxidx(:,1,1) * tmp
6848  dxidx(:,1,2) = dxidx(:,1,2) * tmp
6849  dxidx(:,1,3) = dxidx(:,1,3) * tmp
6850  dxidx(:,2,1) = (dxdxi(:,2,3) * dxdxi(:,3,1)
6851  & - dxdxi(:,2,1) * dxdxi(:,3,3)) * tmp
6852  dxidx(:,2,2) = (dxdxi(:,1,1) * dxdxi(:,3,3)
6853  & - dxdxi(:,3,1) * dxdxi(:,1,3)) * tmp
6854  dxidx(:,2,3) = (dxdxi(:,2,1) * dxdxi(:,1,3)
6855  & - dxdxi(:,1,1) * dxdxi(:,2,3)) * tmp
6856  dxidx(:,3,1) = (dxdxi(:,2,1) * dxdxi(:,3,2)
6857  & - dxdxi(:,2,2) * dxdxi(:,3,1)) * tmp
6858  dxidx(:,3,2) = (dxdxi(:,3,1) * dxdxi(:,1,2)
6859  & - dxdxi(:,1,1) * dxdxi(:,3,2)) * tmp
6860  dxidx(:,3,3) = (dxdxi(:,1,1) * dxdxi(:,2,2)
6861  & - dxdxi(:,1,2) * dxdxi(:,2,1)) * tmp
6862 c
6863  wdetj = qwt(lcsyst,intp)/ tmp
6864 
6865 c
6866 c.... ---------------------> Global Gradients <-----------------------
6867 c
6868  g1yi = zero
6869  g2yi = zero
6870  g3yi = zero
6871 c
6872 c
6873  do n = 1, nshl
6874 c
6875 c.... compute the global gradient of shape-function
6876 c
6877 c ! N_{a,x_i}= N_{a,xi_i} xi_{i,x_j}
6878 c
6879  shg(:,n,1) = shgl(:,1,n) * dxidx(:,1,1) +
6880  & shgl(:,2,n) * dxidx(:,2,1) +
6881  & shgl(:,3,n) * dxidx(:,3,1)
6882  shg(:,n,2) = shgl(:,1,n) * dxidx(:,1,2) +
6883  & shgl(:,2,n) * dxidx(:,2,2) +
6884  & shgl(:,3,n) * dxidx(:,3,2)
6885  shg(:,n,3) = shgl(:,1,n) * dxidx(:,1,3) +
6886  & shgl(:,2,n) * dxidx(:,2,3) +
6887  & shgl(:,3,n) * dxidx(:,3,3)
6888 c
6889 c.... compute the global gradient of Y-variables
6890 c
6891 c
6892 c Y_{,x_i}=SUM_{a=1}^nenl (N_{a,x_i}(int) Ya)
6893 c
6894  g1yi(:,2) = g1yi(:,2) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,2)
6895  g1yi(:,3) = g1yi(:,3) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,3)
6896  g1yi(:,4) = g1yi(:,4) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,4)
6897 c
6898  g2yi(:,2) = g2yi(:,2) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,2)
6899  g2yi(:,3) = g2yi(:,3) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,3)
6900  g2yi(:,4) = g2yi(:,4) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,4)
6901 c
6902  g3yi(:,2) = g3yi(:,2) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,2)
6903  g3yi(:,3) = g3yi(:,3) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,3)
6904  g3yi(:,4) = g3yi(:,4) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,4)
6905 
6906  enddo
6907 
6908 c
6909 c.... return
6910 c
6911 
6912  return
6913  end
6914 
6916 
6917  subroutine e3qvarsclr (yl, shgl, xl,
6918  & gradt, dxidx, wdetj )
6919 
6920  include "global.h"
6921  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
6922  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
6923  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
6924  include "common_blocks/sclrs.h"
6925  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
6926 c
6927 C Local variables
6928 C
6929  INTEGER id, n
6930 C
6931 c passed arrays
6932 c
6933  real*8 yl(npro,nshl,ndof), shp(npro,nshl),
6934  & shgl(npro,nsd,nshl), xl(npro,nenl,nsd),
6935  & dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd), wdetj(npro),
6936  & gradt(npro,nsd)
6937 c
6938 c local arrays
6939 c
6940  real*8 shg(npro,nshl,nsd)
6941 
6942 
6943  call e3metric( xl, shgl, dxidx,
6944  & shg, wdetj)
6945 
6946  gradt = zero
6947  id=5+isclr
6948 c
6949 c later, when there are more models than SA we will need a
6950 c more general function to calculate evisc at a quadrature point
6951 c
6952  do n = 1, nshl
6953  gradt(:,1) = gradt(:,1) + shg(:,n,1) * yl(:,n,id)
6954  gradt(:,2) = gradt(:,2) + shg(:,n,2) * yl(:,n,id)
6955  gradt(:,3) = gradt(:,3) + shg(:,n,3) * yl(:,n,id)
6956  enddo
6957 c
6958 c.... return
6959 c
6960 
6961  return
6962  end
6963 
6990 
6991  subroutine e3res ( u1, u2, u3,
6992  & ubar, aci, wdetj,
6993  & g1yi, g2yi, g3yi,
6994  & rlui, rmu, rho,
6995  & tauc, taum, taubar,
6996  & shpfun, shg, src,
6997  & rl, pres, acl,
6998  & rlsli)
6999 c
7000  include "global.h"
7001  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
7002  include "common_blocks/matdat.h"
7003  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
7004  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
7005  include "common_blocks/solpar.h"
7006  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
7007 
7008 C
7009 C Argument variables
7010 C
7011  REAL*8 aci, acl, g1yi, g2yi
7012  REAL*8 g3yi, pres, rho, rl
7013  REAL*8 rlsli, rlui, rmu, shg
7014  REAL*8 shpfun, src, taubar, tauc
7015  REAL*8 taum, u1, u2, u3
7016  REAL*8 ubar, wdetj
7017 C
7018 C Local variables
7019 C
7020  REAL*8 tmps
7021 C
7022  dimension u1(npro), u2(npro), u3(npro),
7023  & ubar(npro,nsd), aci(npro,nsd), wdetj(npro),
7024  & g1yi(npro,nflow), g2yi(npro,nflow), g3yi(npro,nflow),
7025  & rlui(npro,nsd), rmu(npro), rho(npro),
7026  & tauc(npro), taum(npro), taubar(npro),
7027  & shpfun(npro,nshl),shg(npro,nshl,nsd), src(npro,nsd),
7028  & pres(npro)
7029 
7030  dimension rl(npro,nshl,nflow),
7031  & acl(npro,nshl,ndof),
7032  & rlsli(npro,6)
7033 c
7034 c.... local declarations
7035 c
7036  real*8 tmp1(npro), tmp2(npro), tmp3(npro),
7037  & tmp(npro), rgna(npro,nsd,nsd), rna(npro,nsd),
7038  & locmass(npro,nshl),omega(3)
7039 
7040  integer aa
7041 c
7042 c.... initialize multipliers for Na and Na_{,i}
7043 c
7044  rna = zero
7045  rgna = zero
7046 c
7047 c.... compute the Na multiplier
7048 c
7049  tmps = one-flmpr ! consistant mass factor
7050 
7051 c
7052 c no density yet...it comes later
7053 c
7054  rna(:,1) = aci(:,1) * tmps
7055  & - src(:,1)
7056  rna(:,2) = aci(:,2) * tmps
7057  & - src(:,2)
7058  rna(:,3) = aci(:,3) * tmps
7059  & - src(:,3)
7060 
7061 c
7062 c.... rotating frame terms if needed
7063 c
7064 
7065  if(matflg(6,1).eq.1) then ! rotation
7066 
7067  omega(1)=datmat(1,6,1)
7068  omega(2)=datmat(2,6,1)
7069  omega(3)=datmat(3,6,1)
7070 c
7071 c no density yet...it comes later
7072 c
7073 
7074  rna(:,1) = rna(:,1) + (omega(2)-omega(3)) * taum * rlui(:,1)
7075  rna(:,2) = rna(:,2) + (omega(3)-omega(1)) * taum * rlui(:,2)
7076  rna(:,3) = rna(:,3) + (omega(1)-omega(2)) * taum * rlui(:,3)
7077  endif
7078 
7079 
7080 c
7081 c.... compute the Na,i multiplier
7082 c
7083  tmp = -pres + tauc * (g1yi(:,2) + g2yi(:,3) + g3yi(:,4))
7084  tmp1 = rmu * ( g2yi(:,2) + g1yi(:,3) )
7085  tmp2 = rmu * ( g3yi(:,3) + g2yi(:,4) )
7086  tmp3 = rmu * ( g1yi(:,4) + g3yi(:,2) )
7087 
7088 
7089  if(iconvflow.eq.2) then ! advective form (NO IBP either)
7090 c
7091 c no density yet...it comes later
7092 c
7093  rna(:,1) = rna(:,1)
7094  & + ubar(:,1) * g1yi(:,2)
7095  & + ubar(:,2) * g2yi(:,2)
7096  & + ubar(:,3) * g3yi(:,2)
7097  rna(:,2) = rna(:,2)
7098  & + ubar(:,1) * g1yi(:,3)
7099  & + ubar(:,2) * g2yi(:,3)
7100  & + ubar(:,3) * g3yi(:,3)
7101  rna(:,3) = rna(:,3)
7102  & + ubar(:,1) * g1yi(:,4)
7103  & + ubar(:,2) * g2yi(:,4)
7104  & + ubar(:,3) * g3yi(:,4)
7105 
7106  rgna(:,1,1) = two * rmu * g1yi(:,2) + tmp
7107  rgna(:,1,2) = tmp1
7108  rgna(:,1,3) = tmp3
7109  rgna(:,2,1) = tmp1
7110  rgna(:,2,2) = two * rmu * g2yi(:,3) + tmp
7111  rgna(:,2,3) = tmp2
7112  rgna(:,3,1) = tmp3
7113  rgna(:,3,2) = tmp2
7114  rgna(:,3,3) = two * rmu * g3yi(:,4) + tmp
7115  else ! conservative form (with IBP)
7116 
7117 c IBP conservative convection
7118 c |||||
7119 c vvvvv
7120  rgna(:,1,1) = two * rmu * g1yi(:,2) + tmp - u1(:)*u1(:)*rho(:)
7121  rgna(:,1,2) = tmp1 - u1(:)*u2(:)*rho(:)
7122  rgna(:,1,3) = tmp3 - u1(:)*u3(:)*rho(:)
7123  rgna(:,2,1) = tmp1 - u1(:)*u2(:)*rho(:)
7124  rgna(:,2,2) = two * rmu * g2yi(:,3) + tmp - u2(:)*u2(:)*rho(:)
7125  rgna(:,2,3) = tmp2 - u3(:)*u2(:)*rho(:)
7126  rgna(:,3,1) = tmp3 - u1(:)*u3(:)*rho(:)
7127  rgna(:,3,2) = tmp2 - u3(:)*u2(:)*rho(:)
7128  rgna(:,3,3) = two * rmu * g3yi(:,4) + tmp - u3(:)*u3(:)*rho(:)
7129  endif
7130 
7131  tmp1 = taum * rlui(:,1)
7132  tmp2 = taum * rlui(:,2)
7133  tmp3 = taum * rlui(:,3)
7134 
7135  rgna(:,1,1) = rgna(:,1,1) + tmp1 * u1
7136  rgna(:,1,2) = rgna(:,1,2) + tmp1 * u2
7137  rgna(:,1,3) = rgna(:,1,3) + tmp1 * u3
7138  rgna(:,2,1) = rgna(:,2,1) + tmp2 * u1
7139  rgna(:,2,2) = rgna(:,2,2) + tmp2 * u2
7140  rgna(:,2,3) = rgna(:,2,3) + tmp2 * u3
7141  rgna(:,3,1) = rgna(:,3,1) + tmp3 * u1
7142  rgna(:,3,2) = rgna(:,3,2) + tmp3 * u2
7143  rgna(:,3,3) = rgna(:,3,3) + tmp3 * u3
7144 
7145  if(iconvflow.eq.1) then
7146 c
7147 c... get the u_j w_{i,i} term in there to match A_j^T w_{i,j} tau L_i
7148 c to match the SUPG of incompressible limit
7149 c
7150  rgna(:,1,1) = rgna(:,1,1) + tmp1 * u1
7151  rgna(:,1,2) = rgna(:,1,2) + tmp2 * u1
7152  rgna(:,1,3) = rgna(:,1,3) + tmp3 * u1
7153  rgna(:,2,1) = rgna(:,2,1) + tmp1 * u2
7154  rgna(:,2,2) = rgna(:,2,2) + tmp2 * u2
7155  rgna(:,2,3) = rgna(:,2,3) + tmp3 * u2
7156  rgna(:,3,1) = rgna(:,3,1) + tmp1 * u3
7157  rgna(:,3,2) = rgna(:,3,2) + tmp2 * u3
7158  rgna(:,3,3) = rgna(:,3,3) + tmp3 * u3
7159  endif
7160 
7161  if(iconvflow.eq.2) then ! advective form has a taubar term to restore con
7162  tmp1 = taubar
7163  & * ( rlui(:,1) * g1yi(:,2)
7164  & + rlui(:,2) * g2yi(:,2)
7165  & + rlui(:,3) * g3yi(:,2) )
7166  tmp2 = taubar
7167  & * ( rlui(:,1) * g1yi(:,3)
7168  & + rlui(:,2) * g2yi(:,3)
7169  & + rlui(:,3) * g3yi(:,3) )
7170  tmp3 = taubar
7171  & * ( rlui(:,1) * g1yi(:,4)
7172  & + rlui(:,2) * g2yi(:,4)
7173  & + rlui(:,3) * g3yi(:,4) )
7174 
7175  rgna(:,1,1) = rgna(:,1,1) + tmp1 * rlui(:,1)
7176  rgna(:,1,2) = rgna(:,1,2) + tmp1 * rlui(:,2)
7177  rgna(:,1,3) = rgna(:,1,3) + tmp1 * rlui(:,3)
7178  rgna(:,2,1) = rgna(:,2,1) + tmp2 * rlui(:,1)
7179  rgna(:,2,2) = rgna(:,2,2) + tmp2 * rlui(:,2)
7180  rgna(:,2,3) = rgna(:,2,3) + tmp2 * rlui(:,3)
7181  rgna(:,3,1) = rgna(:,3,1) + tmp3 * rlui(:,1)
7182  rgna(:,3,2) = rgna(:,3,2) + tmp3 * rlui(:,2)
7183  rgna(:,3,3) = rgna(:,3,3) + tmp3 * rlui(:,3)
7184  endif ! end of advective form
7185 c
7186 c.... everything that gets multiplied by rNa was supposed
7187 c to have density multiplying it. Do it now.
7188 
7189  rna(:,1) = rna(:,1) * rho
7190  rna(:,2) = rna(:,2) * rho
7191  rna(:,3) = rna(:,3) * rho
7192 
7193 c
7194 c
7195 c.... multiply the residual pieces by the weight space
7196 c
7197  do aa = 1,nshl
7198 c
7199 c.... continuity
7200 c
7201  rl(:,aa,4) = rl(:,aa,4) + wdetj
7202  & * ( shg(:,aa,1) * ubar(:,1)
7203  & + shg(:,aa,2) * ubar(:,2)
7204  & + shg(:,aa,3) * ubar(:,3) )
7205 c
7206 c.... momentum
7207 c
7208  rl(:,aa,1) = rl(:,aa,1) - wdetj
7209  & * ( shpfun(:,aa) * rna(:,1)
7210  & + shg(:,aa,1) * rgna(:,1,1)
7211  & + shg(:,aa,2) * rgna(:,1,2)
7212  & + shg(:,aa,3) * rgna(:,1,3) )
7213  rl(:,aa,2) = rl(:,aa,2) - wdetj
7214  & * ( shpfun(:,aa) * rna(:,2)
7215  & + shg(:,aa,1) * rgna(:,2,1)
7216  & + shg(:,aa,2) * rgna(:,2,2)
7217  & + shg(:,aa,3) * rgna(:,2,3) )
7218  rl(:,aa,3) = rl(:,aa,3) - wdetj
7219  & * ( shpfun(:,aa) * rna(:,3)
7220  & + shg(:,aa,1) * rgna(:,3,1)
7221  & + shg(:,aa,2) * rgna(:,3,2)
7222  & + shg(:,aa,3) * rgna(:,3,3) )
7223 
7224  enddo
7225 c
7226 c.... return
7227 c
7228  return
7229  end
7230 
7232 
7233  subroutine e3ressclr ( uMod, gGradS,
7234  & sclr, sdot, grads,
7235  & wdetj, rls, taus,
7236  & shpfun, shg, src,
7237  & diffus,
7238  & rl )
7239 c
7240  include "global.h"
7241  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
7242  include "common_blocks/sclrs.h"
7243  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
7244  include "common_blocks/solpar.h"
7245  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
7246 C
7247 C Local variables
7248 C
7249  REAL*8 tmps
7250 C
7251  real*8 umod(npro,nsd), ggrads(npro, nsd),
7252  & sclr(npro), sdot(npro), grads(npro,nsd),
7253  & wdetj(npro), rls(npro), rho(npro),
7254  & taus(npro), shpfun(npro,nshl), src(npro),
7255  & shg(npro,nshl,3), rl(npro,nshl)
7256 
7257  real*8 diffus(npro)
7258 c
7259 c.... local declarations
7260 c
7261  real*8 rgna(npro,nsd), rna(npro), rcp(npro), tmp(npro)
7262 
7263  integer aa
7264 c
7265 c.... initialize multipliers for Na and Na_{,i}
7266 c
7267  rna = zero
7268  rgna = zero
7269 c
7270 c.... Na multiplier
7271 c
7272  tmps = one-flmpr ! consistant mass factor
7273  rcp = one ! rho * cp
7274 
7275 
7276  rna = rcp*(tmps*sdot + umod(:,1) * grads(:,1)
7277  & + umod(:,2) * grads(:,2)
7278  & + umod(:,3) * grads(:,3) )
7279  & - src
7280 
7281 
7282 
7283  tmp = rcp * taus * (rls -src)
7284 c
7285 c.... Na,i multiplier
7286 c
7287  rgna(:,1) = diffus * grads(:,1) + umod(:,1) * tmp
7288  rgna(:,2) = diffus * grads(:,2) + umod(:,2) * tmp
7289  rgna(:,3) = diffus * grads(:,3) + umod(:,3) * tmp
7290 c
7291  if (idcsclr(1) .ne. 0) then
7292  if ((idcsclr(2).eq.1 .and. isclr.eq.1) .or.
7293  & (idcsclr(2).eq.2 .and. isclr.eq.2)) then ! scalar with dc
7294 c
7295 c.... add the contribution of DC to residual
7296 c
7297  rgna(:,1) = rgna(:,1) + ggrads(:,1) ! gGradS is
7298  rgna(:,2) = rgna(:,2) + ggrads(:,2) ! g^{ij}*Y_{j}*dcFct
7299  rgna(:,3) = rgna(:,3) + ggrads(:,3) ! calculated in e3dc.f
7300 c
7301  endif
7302  endif ! end of idcsclr
7303 c
7304 c.... multiply the residual pieces by the weight space
7305 c
7306  do aa = 1,nshl
7307 c
7308  rl(:,aa) = rl(:,aa) - wdetj
7309  & * ( shpfun(:,aa) * rna(:)
7310  & + shg(:,aa,1) * rgna(:,1)
7311  & + shg(:,aa,2) * rgna(:,2)
7312  & + shg(:,aa,3) * rgna(:,3) )
7313 
7314  enddo
7315 c
7316 c.... return
7317 c
7318  return
7319  end
7320 
7322 
7323  subroutine e3resstrongpde(
7324  & aci, u1, u2, u3, temp, rho, xx,
7325  & g1yi, g2yi, g3yi,
7326  & rlui, src, divqi)
7327 
7328  include "global.h"
7329  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
7330  include "common_blocks/matdat.h"
7331  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
7332  include "common_blocks/solpar.h"
7333 C
7334 C Local variables
7335 C
7336  REAL*8 bfx, bfy, bfz, tref
7337 C
7338 
7339 c INPUTS
7340  double precision aci(npro,nsd)
7341  double precision xx(npro,nsd)
7342  double precision g1yi(npro,nflow)
7343  double precision g2yi(npro,nflow)
7344  double precision g3yi(npro,nflow)
7345  double precision u1(npro)
7346  double precision u2(npro)
7347  double precision u3(npro)
7348  double precision temp(npro)
7349  double precision rho(npro)
7350 
7351 c OUTPUTS
7352  double precision rlui(npro,nsd)
7353  double precision src(npro,nsd)
7354 
7355 c LOCALS
7356  double precision divu(npro)
7357  double precision divqi(npro,nsd)
7358  double precision omega(nsd)
7359 
7360 c.... compute source term
7361  src = zero
7362  if(matflg(5,1) .ge. 1) then
7363 c body force contribution to src
7364  bfx = datmat(1,5,1) ! Boussinesq, g*alfap
7365  bfy = datmat(2,5,1)
7366  bfz = datmat(3,5,1)
7367  select case ( matflg(5,1) )
7368  case ( 1 ) ! standard linear body force
7369  src(:,1) = bfx
7370  src(:,2) = bfy
7371  src(:,3) = bfz
7372  case ( 2 ) ! boussinesq body force
7373  tref = datmat(2,2,1)
7374  src(:,1) = bfx * (temp(:)-tref)
7375  src(:,2) = bfy * (temp(:)-tref)
7376  src(:,3) = bfz * (temp(:)-tref)
7377  case ( 3 ) ! user specified f(x,y,z)
7378  call e3source(xx, src)
7379  end select
7380  endif
7381 c
7382  if(matflg(6,1).eq.1) then
7383 c coriolis force contribution to src
7384  omega(1)=datmat(1,6,1)
7385  omega(2)=datmat(2,6,1)
7386  omega(3)=datmat(3,6,1)
7387 c note that we calculate f as if it contains the usual source
7388 c plus the Coriolis and the centrifugal forces taken to the rhs (sign change)
7389 c as long as we are doing SUPG with no accounting for these terms in the
7390 c LHS this is the only change (which will find its way to the RHS momentum
7391 c equation (both Galerkin and SUPG parts)).
7392 c
7393 c uncomment later if you want rotation always about z axis
7394 c orig_src - om x om x r - two om x u
7395 c
7396 c$$$ src(:,1)=src(:,1)+omega(3)*omega(3)*xx(:,1)+two*omega(3)*u2
7397 c$$$ src(:,2)=src(:,2)+omega(3)*omega(3)*xx(:,2)-two*omega(3)*u1
7398 c
7399 c more general for testing
7400 c
7401  src(:,1)=src(:,1)
7402  & -omega(2)*(omega(1)*xx(:,2)-omega(2)*xx(:,1))
7403  & -omega(3)*(omega(1)*xx(:,3)-omega(3)*xx(:,1))
7404  & -two*(omega(2)*u3-omega(3)*u2)
7405  src(:,2)=src(:,2)
7406  & -omega(1)*(omega(2)*xx(:,1)-omega(1)*xx(:,2))
7407  & -omega(3)*(omega(2)*xx(:,3)-omega(3)*xx(:,2))
7408  & -two*(omega(3)*u1-omega(1)*u3)
7409  src(:,3)=src(:,3)
7410  & -omega(1)*(omega(3)*xx(:,1)-omega(1)*xx(:,3))
7411  & -omega(2)*(omega(3)*xx(:,2)-omega(2)*xx(:,3))
7412  & -two*(omega(1)*u2-omega(2)*u1)
7413  endif
7414 c calculate momentum residual
7415  rlui(:,1) =(aci(:,1) + u1 * g1yi(:,2)
7416  & + u2 * g2yi(:,2)
7417  & + u3 * g3yi(:,2) - src(:,1) ) * rho
7418  & + g1yi(:,1)
7419  & - divqi(:,1)
7420  rlui(:,2) =(aci(:,2) + u1 * g1yi(:,3)
7421  & + u2 * g2yi(:,3)
7422  & + u3 * g3yi(:,3) - src(:,2) ) * rho
7423  & + g2yi(:,1)
7424  & - divqi(:,2)
7425  rlui(:,3) =(aci(:,3) + u1 * g1yi(:,4)
7426  & + u2 * g2yi(:,4)
7427  & + u3 * g3yi(:,4) - src(:,3) ) * rho
7428  & + g3yi(:,1)
7429  & - divqi(:,3)
7430  if(iconvflow.eq.1) then
7431  divu(:) = (g1yi(:,2) + g2yi(:,3) + g3yi(:,4))*rho
7432  rlui(:,1)=rlui(:,1)+u1(:)*divu(:)
7433  rlui(:,2)=rlui(:,2)+u2(:)*divu(:)
7434  rlui(:,3)=rlui(:,3)+u3(:)*divu(:)
7435  endif
7436 c
7437  return
7438  end subroutine e3resstrongpde
7439 
7443 
7444  subroutine e3source(xx, src)
7445 
7446  include "global.h"
7447  include "common_blocks/matdat.h"
7448  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
7449 C
7450 C Local variables
7451 C
7452  INTEGER iel
7453 C
7454  REAL*8 bigr, re, t13, t2
7455  REAL*8 t20, t21, t26, t3
7456  REAL*8 t30, t37, t4, t54
7457  REAL*8 t7, t8, x, y
7458  REAL*8 z
7459 C
7460 
7461  real*8 xx(npro,nsd), src(npro,nsd)
7462 
7463  real*8 nu
7464 
7465  real*8 r, stheta, dpdz, rp5
7466  if(datmat(2,5,1).eq. 0) then ! calc swirl
7467 c
7468 c This is the body force which will drive a swirl in a pipe flow
7469 c
7470  bigr = 0.5d0
7471  dpdz = datmat(1,5,1)
7472  do iel = 1, npro
7473 
7474  r = sqrt( xx(iel,1)**2 + xx(iel,2)**2)
7475  rp5 = (r/bigr)**5
7476 
7477  stheta = dpdz * sin(0.5*pi*rp5)
7478 
7479  src(iel,1) = -xx(iel,2)/r * stheta
7480  src(iel,2) = xx(iel,1)/r * stheta
7481  src(iel,3) = dpdz
7482  enddo
7483  else ! contrived test problem
7484 
7485  do iel = 1, npro
7486  x = xx(iel,1)
7487  y = xx(iel,2)
7488  z = xx(iel,3)
7489  re = 1.0/datmat(1,2,1)
7490 c
7491 c The following are MAPLE generated forcing functions for
7492 c a Lid Driven cavity flow with an analytic solution
7493 c
7494  t2 = x**2
7495  t3 = t2**2
7496  t4 = t3*x
7497  t7 = t2*x
7498  t8 = 8*t7
7499  t13 = y**2
7500  t20 = t13**2
7501  t21 = t20-t13
7502  t26 = t3**2
7503  t30 = t3*t2
7504  t37 = t13*y
7505  t54 = -8/re*(24.e0/5.e0*t4-12*t3+t8+2*(4*t7-6*t2+2*x)*(12
7506  & *t13-2)+(24*x-12)*t21)-64*(t26/2-2*t3*t7+3*t30-2*t4+t3
7507  & /2)*(-24*t20*y+8*t37-4*y)+64*t21*(4*t37-2*y)*(-4*t30+12
7508  & *t4-14*t3+t8-2*t2)
7509 
7510  src(iel,1) = 0.0
7511  src(iel,2) = t54
7512  src(iel,3) = 0.0
7513  enddo
7514 
7515  endif
7516  return
7517  end
7518 
7533 
7534  subroutine e3stab (rho, u1, u2,
7535  & u3, dxidx, rlui,
7536  & rmu, tauc, taum,
7537  & taubar, ubar )
7538 c
7539  include "global.h"
7540  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
7541  include "common_blocks/matdat.h"
7542  include "common_blocks/outpar.h"
7543  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
7544  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
7545 C
7546 C Argument variables
7547 C
7548  REAL*8 dxidx, rho, rlui, rmu
7549  REAL*8 taubar, tauc, taum, u1
7550  REAL*8 u2, u3, ubar
7551 C
7552 C Local variables
7553 C
7554  REAL*8 dt, dts, dtsfsq, dtsi
7555  REAL*8 fact, ff, fff
7556  REAL*8 gijd, omegasq, rhoinv, rnu
7557  REAL*8 unorm, velsq
7558 C
7559  dimension rho(npro), u1(npro),
7560  & u2(npro), u3(npro),
7561  & dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd),
7562  & rlui(npro,nsd),
7563  & tauc(npro), taum(npro), taubar(npro),
7564  & rmu(npro), ubar(npro,3), unorm(npro)
7565 
7566 c
7567  dimension gijd(npro,6), fact(npro), rnu(npro),
7568  & rhoinv(npro)
7569 c
7570 c
7571 c.... get the metric tensor
7572 c
7573  call e3gijd( dxidx, gijd )
7574 c
7575 c... higher order element diffusive correction
7576 c
7577  if (ipord == 1) then
7578  fff = 36.0d0
7579  else if (ipord == 2) then
7580  fff = 60.0d0
7581 c fff = 36.0d0
7582  else if (ipord == 3) then
7583  fff = 128.0d0
7584 c fff = 144.0d0
7585  endif
7586 
7587  omegasq=zero
7588  if(matflg(6,1).eq.1) omegasq = datmat(1,6,1)**2
7589  . +datmat(2,6,1)**2
7590  . +datmat(3,6,1)**2
7591  rhoinv=one/rho
7592  rnu=rmu*rhoinv
7593 
7594  if(itau.eq.0) then ! original tau
7595 c
7596 c... momentum tau
7597 c
7598  dts= dtgl*dtsfct ! Dtgl = (time step)^-1
7599  taum = ( (two*dts)**2
7600  3 + ( u1 * ( gijd(:,1) * u1
7601  4 + gijd(:,4) * u2
7602  5 + gijd(:,6) * u3 )
7603  6 + u2 * ( gijd(:,4) * u1
7604  7 + gijd(:,2) * u2
7605  8 + gijd(:,5) * u3 )
7606  9 + u3 * ( gijd(:,6) * u1
7607  a + gijd(:,5) * u2
7608  1 + gijd(:,3) * u3 ) ) )
7609  2 + fff * rnu** 2
7610  3 * ( gijd(:,1) ** 2
7611  4 + gijd(:,2) ** 2
7612  5 + gijd(:,3) ** 2
7613  6 + 2.
7614  7 * ( gijd(:,4) ** 2
7615  8 + gijd(:,5) ** 2
7616  9 + gijd(:,6) ** 2 )
7617  b +omegasq)
7618 
7619  fact = sqrt(taum)
7620  dtsi=one/dts
7621  ff=taucfct/dtsfct
7622  tauc =rho* pt125*fact/(gijd(:,1)+gijd(:,2)+gijd(:,3))*ff
7623  taum = one/fact
7624  else if(itau.eq.1) then ! new tau
7625 
7626 c
7627 c determinant of gijd
7628 c
7629  fact = gijd(:,1) * gijd(:,2) * gijd(:,3)
7630  & - gijd(:,2) * gijd(:,6) * gijd(:,6)
7631  & - gijd(:,1) * gijd(:,5) * gijd(:,5)
7632  & - gijd(:,3) * gijd(:,4) * gijd(:,4)
7633  & + gijd(:,6) * gijd(:,4) * gijd(:,5) * two
7634 
7635 c
7636 c put 1/2u*h1 = sqrt(u_i g^{ij} u_j) into tau_M note inverse is calculated
7637 c on the fly here from cofactors over the determinent dotted from left and
7638 c right with u
7639 c
7640 
7641  taum =
7642  1 u1 * ( (gijd(:,2)*gijd(:,3)-gijd(:,5)*gijd(:,5)) * u1
7643  2 + two * (gijd(:,5)*gijd(:,6)-gijd(:,4)*gijd(:,3)) * u2
7644  3 + two * (gijd(:,4)*gijd(:,5)-gijd(:,6)*gijd(:,2)) * u3)
7645  1 + u2 * ( (gijd(:,1)*gijd(:,3)-gijd(:,6)*gijd(:,6)) * u2
7646  3 + two * (gijd(:,4)*gijd(:,6)-gijd(:,1)*gijd(:,5)) * u3)
7647  1 + u3 * ( (gijd(:,1)*gijd(:,2)-gijd(:,4)*gijd(:,4)) * u3)
7648  taum=fact/taum ! here we have (u_i g^{ij} u^j)^{-1} approx 4/u^2h^2
7649 c
7650 c we can calculate tauC more efficiently now
7651 c
7652  tauc=taum*(one+taum*rmu*rmu)
7653  tauc=one/tauc
7654  tauc=taucfct*sqrt(tauc)
7655 c
7656 c
7657 c... momentum tau
7658 c
7659 c
7660 c this tau needs a u/h instead of a u*h so we contract with g_{ij} as
7661 c follows (i.e. u_i g_{ij} u_j approx u^2/(h^2)/4)
7662 c
7663  fact =
7664  3 u1 * ( gijd(:,1) * u1
7665  4 + gijd(:,4) * u2
7666  5 + gijd(:,6) * u3 )
7667  6 + u2 * ( gijd(:,4) * u1
7668  7 + gijd(:,2) * u2
7669  8 + gijd(:,5) * u3 )
7670  9 + u3 * ( gijd(:,6) * u1
7671  a + gijd(:,5) * u2
7672  1 + gijd(:,3) * u3 )
7673 c
7674 c first limit dt effect on tau from causing trouble if user drops CFL below
7675 c .05 (this could cause loss of spatial stability)
7676 c
7677  velsq=vel*vel
7678  unorm = (u1*u1+u2*u2+u3*u3)/velsq
7679  dtsfsq=dtsfct*dtsfct
7680  dt=one/dtgl
7681  taubar= dtsfsq/( dt*dt + .01*unorm/fact) ! never gets above (C_1 20*u_inf/h)^2
7682 c
7683 c this means tau will never get below h/(20*C_1*u) no matter what time step
7684 c you choose. The 0.01 constant comes from minCFL=.05=> .05*.05*4 (where the
7685 c 4 comes from the bi-unit mapping). If you want to limit sooner the formula
7686 c would be ".01-factor"=minCFL^2*4
7687 c
7688 
7689  taum = rho ** 2
7690  1 * ( four*taubar + fact
7691  2 + fff * rmu** 2
7692  3 * ( gijd(:,1) ** 2
7693  4 + gijd(:,2) ** 2
7694  5 + gijd(:,3) ** 2
7695  6 + 2.
7696  7 * ( gijd(:,4) ** 2
7697  8 + gijd(:,5) ** 2
7698  9 + gijd(:,6) ** 2 ) )
7699  b +omegasq)
7700  fact=sqrt(taum)
7701 cdebugcheck tauBar = pt125*fact/(gijd(:,1)+gijd(:,2)+gijd(:,3)) !*dtsi
7702 
7703  taum=one/fact ! turn it right side up.
7704  else if(itau.eq.2) then ! new tau different continuity h
7705 
7706  unorm = (u1*u1+u2*u2+u3*u3)
7707 
7708  taum=(gijd(:,1)+gijd(:,2)+gijd(:,3))/unorm ! here we have 4/u^2h^2
7709 c
7710 c we can calculate tauC more efficiently now
7711 c
7712  tauc=taum*(one+taum*rmu*rmu)
7713  tauc=one/tauc
7714  tauc=sqrt(tauc)*taucfct
7715 c
7716 c
7717 c... momentum tau
7718 c
7719 c
7720 c this tau needs a u/h instead of a u*h so we contract with g_{ij} as
7721 c follows (i.e. u_i g_{ij} u_j approx u^2/(h^2)/4)
7722 c
7723  fact =
7724  3 u1 * ( gijd(:,1) * u1
7725  4 + gijd(:,4) * u2
7726  5 + gijd(:,6) * u3 )
7727  6 + u2 * ( gijd(:,4) * u1
7728  7 + gijd(:,2) * u2
7729  8 + gijd(:,5) * u3 )
7730  9 + u3 * ( gijd(:,6) * u1
7731  a + gijd(:,5) * u2
7732  1 + gijd(:,3) * u3 )
7733 c
7734 c first limit dt effect on tau from causing trouble if user drops CFL below
7735 c .05 (this could cause loss of spatial stability)
7736 c
7737  velsq=vel*vel
7738  dtsfsq=dtsfct*dtsfct
7739  dt=one/dtgl
7740  unorm=unorm/velsq
7741  taubar= dtsfsq/( dt*dt + .01*unorm/fact) ! never gets above (C_1 20*u_inf/h)^2
7742 c
7743 c this means tau will never get below h/(20*C_1*u) no matter what time step
7744 c you choose. The 0.01 constant comes from minCFL=.05=> .05*.05*4 (where the
7745 c 4 comes from the bi-unit mapping). If you want to limit sooner the formula
7746 c would be ".01-factor"=minCFL^2*4
7747 c
7748 
7749  taum = rho ** 2
7750  1 * ( four*taubar + fact
7751  2 + fff * rmu** 2
7752  3 * ( gijd(:,1) ** 2
7753  4 + gijd(:,2) ** 2
7754  5 + gijd(:,3) ** 2
7755  6 + 2.
7756  7 * ( gijd(:,4) ** 2
7757  8 + gijd(:,5) ** 2
7758  9 + gijd(:,6) ** 2 ) )
7759  b +omegasq)
7760  fact=sqrt(taum)
7761 c tauBar = pt125*fact/(gijd(:,1)+gijd(:,2)+gijd(:,3)) !*dtsi
7762 
7763  taum=one/fact ! turn it right side up.
7764  else if(itau.eq.3) then ! compressible tau
7765 
7766 c
7767 c determinant of gijd
7768 c
7769  fact = gijd(:,1) * gijd(:,2) * gijd(:,3)
7770  & - gijd(:,2) * gijd(:,6) * gijd(:,6)
7771  & - gijd(:,1) * gijd(:,5) * gijd(:,5)
7772  & - gijd(:,3) * gijd(:,4) * gijd(:,4)
7773  & + gijd(:,6) * gijd(:,4) * gijd(:,5) * two
7774 
7775 c
7776 c put 1/2u*h1 = sqrt(u_i g^{ij} u_j) into tau_M note inverse is calculated
7777 c on the fly here from cofactors over the determinent dotted from left and
7778 c right with u
7779 c
7780 
7781  taum =
7782  1 u1 * ( (gijd(:,2)*gijd(:,3)-gijd(:,5)*gijd(:,5)) * u1
7783  2 + two * (gijd(:,5)*gijd(:,6)-gijd(:,4)*gijd(:,3)) * u2
7784  3 + two * (gijd(:,4)*gijd(:,5)-gijd(:,6)*gijd(:,2)) * u3)
7785  1 + u2 * ( (gijd(:,1)*gijd(:,3)-gijd(:,6)*gijd(:,6)) * u2
7786  3 + two * (gijd(:,4)*gijd(:,6)-gijd(:,1)*gijd(:,5)) * u3)
7787  1 + u3 * ( (gijd(:,1)*gijd(:,2)-gijd(:,4)*gijd(:,4)) * u3)
7788 c
7789 c we can calculate tauC more efficiently now
7790 c
7791  taum=sqrt(taum/fact)*two
7792  tauc=pt5*taum*min(one,pt5*taum/rmu)*taucfct
7793 c
7794 c
7795 c... momentum tau
7796 c
7797 c
7798 c this tau needs a u/h instead of a u*h so we contract with g_{ij} as
7799 c follows (i.e. u_i g_{ij} u_j approx u^2/(h^2)/4)
7800 c
7801  fact =
7802  3 u1 * ( gijd(:,1) * u1
7803  4 + gijd(:,4) * u2
7804  5 + gijd(:,6) * u3 )
7805  6 + u2 * ( gijd(:,4) * u1
7806  7 + gijd(:,2) * u2
7807  8 + gijd(:,5) * u3 )
7808  9 + u3 * ( gijd(:,6) * u1
7809  a + gijd(:,5) * u2
7810  1 + gijd(:,3) * u3 )
7811  fact=one/sqrt(fact)
7812 
7813  unorm = (u1*u1+u2*u2+u3*u3)
7814 
7815  dts= one/( dtgl*dtsfct)
7816  taum =min(dts,min(fact,fact*fact*unorm*pt33/rmu))
7817  endif
7818 c
7819 c.... calculate tauBar
7820 c
7821  taubar = rlui(:,1) * ( gijd(:,1) * rlui(:,1)
7822  & + gijd(:,4) * rlui(:,2)
7823  & + gijd(:,6) * rlui(:,3) )
7824  & + rlui(:,2) * ( gijd(:,4) * rlui(:,1)
7825  & + gijd(:,2) * rlui(:,2)
7826  & + gijd(:,5) * rlui(:,3) )
7827  & + rlui(:,3) * ( gijd(:,6) * rlui(:,1)
7828  & + gijd(:,5) * rlui(:,2)
7829  & + gijd(:,3) * rlui(:,3) )
7830  where ( taubar .ne. 0.0 )
7831  taubar = taum / sqrt(taubar)
7832  endwhere
7833 
7834 c
7835 c.... compute the modified velocity, uBar
7836 c
7837  ubar(:,1) = u1 - taum * rlui(:,1)*rhoinv
7838  ubar(:,2) = u2 - taum * rlui(:,2)*rhoinv
7839  ubar(:,3) = u3 - taum * rlui(:,3)*rhoinv
7840 c
7841 c.... return
7842 c
7843  return
7844  end
7845 
7847 
7848  subroutine e3ubar (rho, ui, dxidx,
7849  & rlui, rmu, ubar )
7850 
7851  include "global.h"
7852  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
7853  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
7854  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
7855 C
7856 C Local variables
7857 C
7858  REAL*8 dts, fff
7859 C
7860  real*8 rho(npro), ui(npro,nsd),
7861  & dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd), rlui(npro,nsd),
7862  & rmu(npro), ubar(npro,nsd)
7863 
7864  real*8 gijd(npro,6), taum(npro)
7865 
7866 c
7867 c.... get the metric tensor
7868 c
7869  call e3gijd( dxidx, gijd )
7870 c
7871 c.... higher order element diffusive correction
7872 c
7873  if (ipord == 1) then
7874  fff = 36.0d0
7875  else if (ipord == 2) then
7876  fff = 60.0d0
7877  else if (ipord == 3) then
7878  fff = 128.0d0
7879  endif
7880 
7881  dts = (dtgl*dtsfct)
7882  taum = rho ** 2
7883  1 * ( (two*dts)**2
7884  3 + ( ui(:,1) * ( gijd(:,1) * ui(:,1)
7885  4 + gijd(:,4) * ui(:,2)
7886  5 + gijd(:,6) * ui(:,3) )
7887  6 + ui(:,2) * ( gijd(:,4) * ui(:,1)
7888  7 + gijd(:,2) * ui(:,2)
7889  8 + gijd(:,5) * ui(:,3) )
7890  9 + ui(:,3) * ( gijd(:,6) * ui(:,1)
7891  a + gijd(:,5) * ui(:,2)
7892  1 + gijd(:,3) * ui(:,3) ) ) )
7893  2 + fff * rmu** 2
7894  3 * ( gijd(:,1) ** 2
7895  4 + gijd(:,2) ** 2
7896  5 + gijd(:,3) ** 2
7897  6 + 2.
7898  7 * ( gijd(:,4) ** 2
7899  8 + gijd(:,5) ** 2
7900  9 + gijd(:,6) ** 2 ) )
7901 
7902  taum = one/sqrt(taum)
7903 c
7904 c.... compute the modified velocity, uBar
7905 c
7906  ubar(:,1) = ui(:,1) - taum * rlui(:,1)
7907  ubar(:,2) = ui(:,2) - taum * rlui(:,2)
7908  ubar(:,3) = ui(:,3) - taum * rlui(:,3)
7909 
7910  return
7911  end
7912 
7914 
7915  subroutine e3gijd( dxidx, gijd )
7916 
7917  include "global.h"
7918  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
7919  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
7920 C
7921 C Local variables
7922 C
7923  REAL*8 c1, c2
7924 C
7925  real*8 dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd), gijd(npro,6),
7926  & tmp1(npro), tmp2(npro),
7927  & tmp3(npro)
7928 c
7929 c form metric tensor g_{ij}=xi_{k,i} xi_{k,j}. It is a symmetric
7930 c tensor so we only form 6 components and use symmetric matrix numbering.
7931 c
7932  if (lcsyst .ge. 2) then ! note this makes wedges like hexs..should
7933 c be corrected later
7934 
7935  gijd(:,1) = dxidx(:,1,1) * dxidx(:,1,1)
7936  & + dxidx(:,2,1) * dxidx(:,2,1)
7937  & + dxidx(:,3,1) * dxidx(:,3,1)
7938 c
7939  gijd(:,4) = dxidx(:,1,1) * dxidx(:,1,2)
7940  & + dxidx(:,2,1) * dxidx(:,2,2)
7941  & + dxidx(:,3,1) * dxidx(:,3,2)
7942 c
7943  gijd(:,2) = dxidx(:,1,2) * dxidx(:,1,2)
7944  & + dxidx(:,2,2) * dxidx(:,2,2)
7945  & + dxidx(:,3,2) * dxidx(:,3,2)
7946 c
7947  gijd(:,5) = dxidx(:,1,2) * dxidx(:,1,3)
7948  & + dxidx(:,2,2) * dxidx(:,2,3)
7949  & + dxidx(:,3,2) * dxidx(:,3,3)
7950 c
7951  gijd(:,6) = dxidx(:,1,1) * dxidx(:,1,3)
7952  & + dxidx(:,2,1) * dxidx(:,2,3)
7953  & + dxidx(:,3,1) * dxidx(:,3,3)
7954 c
7955  gijd(:,3) = dxidx(:,1,3) * dxidx(:,1,3)
7956  & + dxidx(:,2,3) * dxidx(:,2,3)
7957  & + dxidx(:,3,3) * dxidx(:,3,3)
7958 c
7959  else if (lcsyst .eq. 1) then
7960 c
7961 c There is an invariance problem with tets
7962 c It is fixed by the following modifications to gijd
7963 c
7964 
7965  c1 = 1.259921049894873d+00
7966  c2 = 6.299605249474365d-01
7967 c
7968  tmp1(:) = c1 * dxidx(:,1,1)+c2 *(dxidx(:,2,1)+dxidx(:,3,1))
7969  tmp2(:) = c1 * dxidx(:,2,1)+c2 *(dxidx(:,1,1)+dxidx(:,3,1))
7970  tmp3(:) = c1 * dxidx(:,3,1)+c2 *(dxidx(:,1,1)+dxidx(:,2,1))
7971  gijd(:,1) = dxidx(:,1,1) * tmp1
7972  1 + dxidx(:,2,1) * tmp2
7973  2 + dxidx(:,3,1) * tmp3
7974 c
7975  tmp1(:) = c1 * dxidx(:,1,2)+c2 *(dxidx(:,2,2)+dxidx(:,3,2))
7976  tmp2(:) = c1 * dxidx(:,2,2)+c2 *(dxidx(:,1,2)+dxidx(:,3,2))
7977  tmp3(:) = c1 * dxidx(:,3,2)+c2 *(dxidx(:,1,2)+dxidx(:,2,2))
7978  gijd(:,2) = dxidx(:,1,2) * tmp1
7979  1 + dxidx(:,2,2) * tmp2
7980  2 + dxidx(:,3,2) * tmp3
7981 c
7982  gijd(:,4) = dxidx(:,1,1) * tmp1
7983  1 + dxidx(:,2,1) * tmp2
7984  2 + dxidx(:,3,1) * tmp3
7985 c
7986  tmp1(:) = c1 * dxidx(:,1,3)+c2 *(dxidx(:,2,3)+dxidx(:,3,3))
7987  tmp2(:) = c1 * dxidx(:,2,3)+c2 *(dxidx(:,1,3)+dxidx(:,3,3))
7988  tmp3(:) = c1 * dxidx(:,3,3)+c2 *(dxidx(:,1,3)+dxidx(:,2,3))
7989  gijd(:,3) = dxidx(:,1,3) * tmp1
7990  1 + dxidx(:,2,3) * tmp2
7991  2 + dxidx(:,3,3) * tmp3
7992 c
7993  gijd(:,5) = dxidx(:,1,2) * tmp1
7994  1 + dxidx(:,2,2) * tmp2
7995  2 + dxidx(:,3,2) * tmp3
7996 c
7997  gijd(:,6) = dxidx(:,1,1) * tmp1
7998  1 + dxidx(:,2,1) * tmp2
7999  2 + dxidx(:,3,1) * tmp3
8000 c
8001  else
8002  write(*,*) 'lcsyst eq',lcsyst,'not supported'
8003  stop
8004  endif
8005 
8006  return
8007  end
8008 
8010 
8011  subroutine e3stabsclr (uMod, dxidx, tauT, diffus, srcP, giju,
8012  & srcrat )
8013 c
8014 c
8015  include "global.h"
8016  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
8017  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
8018  include "common_blocks/sclrs.h"
8019  include "common_blocks/solpar.h"
8020  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
8021 
8022 C
8023 C Local variables
8024 C
8025  REAL*8 dts
8026 C
8027  real*8 rho(npro), umod(npro,nsd),
8028  & dxidx(npro,nsd,nsd), diffus(npro),
8029  & taut(npro), srcp(npro)
8030 
8031 c
8032  real*8 gijd(npro,6), giju(npro,6),
8033  & tmp1(npro), tmp2(npro),
8034  & tmp3(npro), fact(npro),
8035  & srcrat(npro)
8036 
8037  real*8 fff
8038  if(ivart.eq.1) then
8039  taut=zero
8040  return
8041  endif
8042 c
8043 c.... get the metric tensor
8044 c
8045  call e3gijd( dxidx, gijd )
8046 c
8047 c... momentum tau
8048 c
8049 c
8050 c... higher order element diffusive correction
8051 c
8052  if (ipord == 1) then
8053  fff = 9.0d0
8054  else if (ipord == 2) then
8055  fff = 36.0d0
8056  else if (ipord == 3) then
8057  fff = 64.0d0
8058  endif
8059 
8060  dts= (dtgl*dtsfct)
8061 c DES - MODIFIED AFTER NATHAN TURBULENCE CLEANUP
8062  srcrat=srcp
8063  taut =
8064  1 (two*dts)**2
8065  2 + srcrat ** 2
8066  3 + umod(:,1) * ( gijd(:,1) * umod(:,1)
8067  4 + gijd(:,4) * umod(:,2)
8068  5 + gijd(:,6) * umod(:,3) )
8069  6 + umod(:,2) * ( gijd(:,4) * umod(:,1)
8070  7 + gijd(:,2) * umod(:,2)
8071  8 + gijd(:,5) * umod(:,3) )
8072  9 + umod(:,3) * ( gijd(:,6) * umod(:,1)
8073  a + gijd(:,5) * umod(:,2)
8074  1 + gijd(:,3) * umod(:,3) )
8075  2 + fff * diffus(:)** 2
8076  3 * ( gijd(:,1) ** 2
8077  4 + gijd(:,2) ** 2
8078  5 + gijd(:,3) ** 2
8079  6 + 2.
8080  7 * ( gijd(:,4) ** 2
8081  8 + gijd(:,5) ** 2
8082  9 + gijd(:,6) ** 2 ) )
8083 
8084  taut = one/sqrt(taut)
8085 c
8086  if(idcsclr(1) .ne. 0) then
8087  if ((idcsclr(2).eq.1 .and. isclr.eq.1) .or.
8088  & (idcsclr(2).eq.2 .and. isclr.eq.2)) then ! scalar with dc
8089 c
8090 c determinant of gijd
8091 c
8092  fact = one/(gijd(:,1) * gijd(:,2) * gijd(:,3)
8093  & - gijd(:,2) * gijd(:,6) * gijd(:,6)
8094  & - gijd(:,1) * gijd(:,5) * gijd(:,5)
8095  & - gijd(:,3) * gijd(:,4) * gijd(:,4)
8096  & + gijd(:,6) * gijd(:,4) * gijd(:,5) * two)
8097 c
8098 c ... note between compressible and incompressible 5 and 6 of giju
8099 c are switched
8100 c
8101  giju(:,1) = fact * (gijd(:,2)*gijd(:,3)
8102  & - gijd(:,5)**2)
8103  giju(:,2) = fact * (gijd(:,1)*gijd(:,3)
8104  & - gijd(:,6)**2)
8105  giju(:,3) = fact * (gijd(:,1)*gijd(:,2)
8106  & - gijd(:,4)**2)
8107  giju(:,4) = fact * (gijd(:,5)*gijd(:,6)
8108  & - gijd(:,4)*gijd(:,3) )
8109  giju(:,5) = fact * (gijd(:,4)*gijd(:,6)
8110  & - gijd(:,1)*gijd(:,5) )
8111  giju(:,6) = fact * (gijd(:,4)*gijd(:,5)
8112  & - gijd(:,6)*gijd(:,2) )
8113 
8114 c
8115  endif
8116  endif ! end of idcsclr.ne.0
8117 c
8118 c.... return
8119 c
8120  return
8121  end
8122 
8125 
8126  subroutine e3stslhs( xl, lStsVec )
8127 
8128  use stats
8129 
8130  include "global.h"
8131  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
8132  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
8133  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
8134 C
8135  integer i
8136  real*8 ldir(npro,nshl,3), lstsvec(npro,nshl,nresdims),
8137  & xl(npro,nenl,3)
8138 
8139  call e3stsdir( xl, ldir )
8140 
8141  do i = 1, nshl
8142  lstsvec(:,i,1) = ldir(:,i,1) * ldir(:,i,1)
8143  lstsvec(:,i,2) = ldir(:,i,2) * ldir(:,i,2)
8144  lstsvec(:,i,3) = ldir(:,i,3) * ldir(:,i,3)
8145 
8146  lstsvec(:,i,4) = ldir(:,i,1) * ldir(:,i,2)
8147  lstsvec(:,i,5) = ldir(:,i,2) * ldir(:,i,3)
8148  lstsvec(:,i,6) = ldir(:,i,3) * ldir(:,i,1)
8149 
8150  lstsvec(:,i,7) = 0.0
8151  lstsvec(:,i,8) = 0.0
8152  lstsvec(:,i,9) = 0.0
8153  lstsvec(:,i,10) = 0.0
8154  lstsvec(:,i,11) = 0.0
8155  enddo
8156 
8157  return
8158  end
8159 
8161 
8162  subroutine e3stsres( xl, rl, lStsVec )
8163 
8164  use stats
8165 
8166  include "global.h"
8167  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
8168  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
8169  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
8170  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
8171 C
8172 C Local variables
8173 C
8174  INTEGER i
8175 
8176 C
8177  real*8 xl(npro,nenl,3), rl(npro,nshl,ndof)
8178  real*8 ldir(npro,nshl,3), lstsvec(npro,nshl,nresdims)
8179 
8180  call e3stsdir( xl, ldir )
8181 
8182  do i = 1, nshl
8183  lstsvec(:,i,1) = ldir(:,i,1) * rl(:,i,4)
8184  lstsvec(:,i,2) = ldir(:,i,2) * rl(:,i,4)
8185  lstsvec(:,i,3) = ldir(:,i,3) * rl(:,i,4)
8186 
8187  lstsvec(:,i,4) = ldir(:,i,1) * rl(:,i,1)
8188  lstsvec(:,i,5) = ldir(:,i,2) * rl(:,i,2)
8189  lstsvec(:,i,6) = ldir(:,i,3) * rl(:,i,3)
8190 
8191  lstsvec(:,i,7) = ldir(:,i,1) * rl(:,i,2)
8192  & + ldir(:,i,2) * rl(:,i,1)
8193  lstsvec(:,i,8) = ldir(:,i,2) * rl(:,i,3)
8194  & + ldir(:,i,3) * rl(:,i,2)
8195  lstsvec(:,i,9) = ldir(:,i,3) * rl(:,i,1)
8196  & + ldir(:,i,1) * rl(:,i,3)
8197  lstsvec(:,i,10) = 0
8198  lstsvec(:,i,11) = 0
8199  enddo
8200 
8201 
8202  return
8203  end
8204 
8206 
8207  subroutine e3stsdir( xl, lDir )
8208 
8209  include "global.h"
8210  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
8211  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
8212  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
8213 C
8214 C Local variables
8215 C
8216  REAL*8 fct, x12, x13, x14
8217  REAL*8 x16, x18, x23, x24
8218  REAL*8 x25, x27, x31, x34
8219  REAL*8 x36, x38, x42, x45
8220  REAL*8 x47, x52, x54, x57
8221  REAL*8 x61, x63, x68, x72
8222  REAL*8 x74, x75, x81, x83
8223  REAL*8 x86, y12, y13, y14
8224  REAL*8 y16, y18, y23, y24
8225  REAL*8 y25, y27, y31, y34
8226  REAL*8 y36, y38, y42, y45
8227  REAL*8 y47, y52, y54, y57
8228  REAL*8 y61, y63, y68, y72
8229  REAL*8 y74, y75, y81, y83
8230  REAL*8 y86, z12, z13, z14
8231  REAL*8 z16, z18, z23, z24
8232  REAL*8 z25, z27, z31, z34
8233  REAL*8 z36, z38, z42, z45
8234  REAL*8 z47, z52, z54, z57
8235  REAL*8 z61, z63, z68, z72
8236  REAL*8 z74, z75, z81, z83
8237  REAL*8 z86
8238 C
8239  real*8 xl(npro,nenl,3), ldir(npro,nshl,3)
8240  integer e
8241 
8242 c
8243 c.... linear tets
8244 c
8245  if (nshl .eq. 4 ) then
8246  fct = 1.d0 / 6.d0
8247  do e = 1, npro
8248 
8249  x12 = xl(e,2,1) - xl(e,1,1)
8250  x13 = xl(e,3,1) - xl(e,1,1)
8251  x14 = xl(e,4,1) - xl(e,1,1)
8252  x23 = xl(e,3,1) - xl(e,2,1)
8253  x24 = xl(e,4,1) - xl(e,2,1)
8254  x34 = xl(e,4,1) - xl(e,3,1)
8255 
8256  y12 = xl(e,2,2) - xl(e,1,2)
8257  y13 = xl(e,3,2) - xl(e,1,2)
8258  y14 = xl(e,4,2) - xl(e,1,2)
8259  y23 = xl(e,3,2) - xl(e,2,2)
8260  y24 = xl(e,4,2) - xl(e,2,2)
8261  y34 = xl(e,4,2) - xl(e,3,2)
8262 
8263  z12 = xl(e,2,3) - xl(e,1,3)
8264  z13 = xl(e,3,3) - xl(e,1,3)
8265  z14 = xl(e,4,3) - xl(e,1,3)
8266  z23 = xl(e,3,3) - xl(e,2,3)
8267  z24 = xl(e,4,3) - xl(e,2,3)
8268  z34 = xl(e,4,3) - xl(e,3,3)
8269 
8270 c
8271 c.. The calculation of the direction of a vertex is based on the average of
8272 c.. the normals of the neighbor faces(3); And the calculation of the direction
8273 c.. of the edge is based on the neighbor faces(2);
8274 c
8275  ldir(e,1,1) = fct * (y14*(z12 - z13) + y12*(z13 - z14)
8276  & + y13*(-z12 + z14))
8277  ldir(e,1,2) = fct * ( x14*(-z12 + z13) + x13*(z12 - z14)
8278  & + x12*(-z13 + z14))
8279  ldir(e,1,3) = fct * ( x14*(y12 - y13)
8280  & + x12*(y13 - y14) + x13*(-y12 + y14))
8281 c
8282  ldir(e,2,1) = fct * (-(y13*z12) + y14*z12 + y12*z13
8283  & - y12*z14 + y24*z23 - y23*z24)
8284  ldir(e,2,2) = fct * (x13*z12 - x14*z12-x12*z13 + x12*z14
8285  & - x24*z23 + x23*z24 )
8286  ldir(e,2,3) = fct * (-(x13*y12) + x14*y12 + x12*y13
8287  & - x12*y14 + x24*y23 - x23*y24)
8288 c
8289  ldir(e,3,1) = fct * (y12*z13 - y14*z13 + y13*(-z12 + z14)
8290  & + y24*z23 - y23*z24)
8291  ldir(e,3,2) = fct * (-(x12*z13) + x14*z13 + x13*(z12 - z14)
8292  & - x24*z23 + x23*z24)
8293  ldir(e,3,3) = fct * (x12*y13 - x14*y13 + x13*(-y12 + y14)
8294  & + x24*y23 - x23*y24)
8295 c
8296  ldir(e,4,1) = fct * (y14*(z12 - z13) - y12*z14 + y13*z14
8297  & + y24*z23 - y23*z24)
8298  ldir(e,4,2) = fct * (x14*(-z12 + z13) + x12*z14 - x13*z14
8299  & - x24*z23 + x23*z24)
8300  ldir(e,4,3) = fct * (x14*(y12 - y13) - x12*y14 + x13*y14
8301  & + x24*y23 - x23*y24)
8302 c
8303  enddo
8304 c
8305 c.... quadratic tets
8306 c
8307  else if (nshl .eq. 10 ) then
8308  fct = 1.d0 / 6.d0
8309  do e = 1, npro
8310 
8311  x12 = xl(e,2,1) - xl(e,1,1)
8312  x13 = xl(e,3,1) - xl(e,1,1)
8313  x14 = xl(e,4,1) - xl(e,1,1)
8314  x23 = xl(e,3,1) - xl(e,2,1)
8315  x24 = xl(e,4,1) - xl(e,2,1)
8316  x34 = xl(e,4,1) - xl(e,3,1)
8317 
8318  y12 = xl(e,2,2) - xl(e,1,2)
8319  y13 = xl(e,3,2) - xl(e,1,2)
8320  y14 = xl(e,4,2) - xl(e,1,2)
8321  y23 = xl(e,3,2) - xl(e,2,2)
8322  y24 = xl(e,4,2) - xl(e,2,2)
8323  y34 = xl(e,4,2) - xl(e,3,2)
8324 
8325  z12 = xl(e,2,3) - xl(e,1,3)
8326  z13 = xl(e,3,3) - xl(e,1,3)
8327  z14 = xl(e,4,3) - xl(e,1,3)
8328  z23 = xl(e,3,3) - xl(e,2,3)
8329  z24 = xl(e,4,3) - xl(e,2,3)
8330  z34 = xl(e,4,3) - xl(e,3,3)
8331 
8332 c
8333 c.... vertex modes
8334 c
8335  ldir(e,1,1) = fct * (y14*(z12 - z13) + y12*(z13 - z14)
8336  & + y13*(-z12 + z14))
8337  ldir(e,1,2) = fct * ( x14*(-z12 + z13) + x13*(z12 - z14)
8338  & + x12*(-z13 + z14))
8339  ldir(e,1,3) = fct * ( x14*(y12 - y13)
8340  & + x12*(y13 - y14) + x13*(-y12 + y14))
8341 c
8342  ldir(e,2,1) = fct * (-(y13*z12) + y14*z12 + y12*z13
8343  & - y12*z14 + y24*z23 - y23*z24)
8344  ldir(e,2,2) = fct * (x13*z12 - x14*z12-x12*z13 + x12*z14
8345  & - x24*z23 + x23*z24 )
8346  ldir(e,2,3) = fct * (-(x13*y12) + x14*y12 + x12*y13
8347  & - x12*y14 + x24*y23 - x23*y24)
8348 c
8349  ldir(e,3,1) = fct * (y12*z13 - y14*z13 + y13*(-z12 + z14)
8350  & + y24*z23 - y23*z24)
8351  ldir(e,3,2) = fct * (-(x12*z13) + x14*z13 + x13*(z12 - z14)
8352  & - x24*z23 + x23*z24)
8353  ldir(e,3,3) = fct * (x12*y13 - x14*y13 + x13*(-y12 + y14)
8354  & + x24*y23 - x23*y24)
8355 c
8356  ldir(e,4,1) = fct * (y14*(z12 - z13) - y12*z14 + y13*z14
8357  & + y24*z23 - y23*z24)
8358  ldir(e,4,2) = fct * (x14*(-z12 + z13) + x12*z14 - x13*z14
8359  & - x24*z23 + x23*z24)
8360  ldir(e,4,3) = fct * (x14*(y12 - y13) - x12*y14 + x13*y14
8361  & + x24*y23 - x23*y24)
8362 c
8363 c.... edge modes (quadratic)
8364 c
8365  ldir(e,5,1) = pt25*(-(y13*z12) + y14*z12 + y12*(z13-z14))
8366  ldir(e,5,2) = pt25*(x13*z12 - x14*z12 + x12*(-z13 + z14))
8367  ldir(e,5,3) = pt25*(-(x13*y12) + x14*y12 + x12*(y13 - y14))
8368 
8369  ldir(e,6,1) = pt25*(-(y13*z12) + y12*z13 + y24*z23-y23*z24)
8370  ldir(e,6,2) = pt25*(x13*z12 - x12*z13 - x24*z23 + x23*z24)
8371  ldir(e,6,3) = pt25*(-(x13*y12) + x12*y13 + x24*y23-x23*y24)
8372 
8373  ldir(e,7,1) = pt25*((y12 - y14)*z13 + y13*(-z12 + z14))
8374  ldir(e,7,2) = pt25*((-x12 + x14)*z13 + x13*(z12 - z14))
8375  ldir(e,7,3) = pt25*((x12 - x14)*y13 + x13*(-y12 + y14))
8376 
8377  ldir(e,8,1) = pt25*(y14*(z12 - z13) + (-y12 + y13)*z14)
8378  ldir(e,8,2) = pt25*(x14*(-z12 + z13) + (x12 - x13)*z14)
8379  ldir(e,8,3) = pt25*(x14*(y12 - y13) + (-x12 + x13)*y14)
8380 
8381  ldir(e,9,1) = pt25*(y14*z12 - y12*z14 + y24*z23 - y23*z24)
8382  ldir(e,9,2) = pt25*(-(x14*z12) + x12*z14 - x24*z23+x23*z24)
8383  ldir(e,9,3) = pt25*(x14*y12 - x12*y14 + x24*y23 - x23*y24)
8384 
8385  ldir(e,10,1) = pt25*(-(y14*z13) + y13*z14+y24*z23-y23*z24)
8386  ldir(e,10,2) = pt25*(x14*z13 - x13*z14-x24*z23 + x23*z24)
8387  ldir(e,10,3) = pt25*(-(x14*y13) + x13*y14+x24*y23-x23*y24)
8388 
8389 
8390  enddo
8391 c
8392 c.... cubic tets
8393 c
8394  else if (nshl .eq. 20 ) then
8395  fct = 1.d0 / 6.d0
8396  do e = 1, npro
8397 
8398  x12 = xl(e,2,1) - xl(e,1,1)
8399  x13 = xl(e,3,1) - xl(e,1,1)
8400  x14 = xl(e,4,1) - xl(e,1,1)
8401  x23 = xl(e,3,1) - xl(e,2,1)
8402  x24 = xl(e,4,1) - xl(e,2,1)
8403 c$$$ x34 = xl(e,4,1) - xl(e,3,1)
8404 
8405  y12 = xl(e,2,2) - xl(e,1,2)
8406  y13 = xl(e,3,2) - xl(e,1,2)
8407  y14 = xl(e,4,2) - xl(e,1,2)
8408  y23 = xl(e,3,2) - xl(e,2,2)
8409  y24 = xl(e,4,2) - xl(e,2,2)
8410 c$$$ y34 = xl(e,4,2) - xl(e,3,2)
8411 
8412  z12 = xl(e,2,3) - xl(e,1,3)
8413  z13 = xl(e,3,3) - xl(e,1,3)
8414  z14 = xl(e,4,3) - xl(e,1,3)
8415  z23 = xl(e,3,3) - xl(e,2,3)
8416  z24 = xl(e,4,3) - xl(e,2,3)
8417 c$$$ z34 = xl(e,4,3) - xl(e,3,3)
8418 
8419 c
8420 c.... vertex modes
8421 c
8422  ldir(e,1,1) = fct * (y14*(z12 - z13) + y12*(z13 - z14)
8423  & + y13*(-z12 + z14))
8424  ldir(e,1,2) = fct * ( x14*(-z12 + z13) + x13*(z12 - z14)
8425  & + x12*(-z13 + z14))
8426  ldir(e,1,3) = fct * ( x14*(y12 - y13)
8427  & + x12*(y13 - y14) + x13*(-y12 + y14))
8428 c
8429  ldir(e,2,1) = fct * (-(y13*z12) + y14*z12 + y12*z13
8430  & - y12*z14 + y24*z23 - y23*z24)
8431  ldir(e,2,2) = fct * (x13*z12 - x14*z12-x12*z13 + x12*z14
8432  & - x24*z23 + x23*z24 )
8433  ldir(e,2,3) = fct * (-(x13*y12) + x14*y12 + x12*y13
8434  & - x12*y14 + x24*y23 - x23*y24)
8435 c
8436  ldir(e,3,1) = fct * (y12*z13 - y14*z13 + y13*(-z12 + z14)
8437  & + y24*z23 - y23*z24)
8438  ldir(e,3,2) = fct * (-(x12*z13) + x14*z13 + x13*(z12 - z14)
8439  & - x24*z23 + x23*z24)
8440  ldir(e,3,3) = fct * (x12*y13 - x14*y13 + x13*(-y12 + y14)
8441  & + x24*y23 - x23*y24)
8442 c
8443  ldir(e,4,1) = fct * (y14*(z12 - z13) - y12*z14 + y13*z14
8444  & + y24*z23 - y23*z24)
8445  ldir(e,4,2) = fct * (x14*(-z12 + z13) + x12*z14 - x13*z14
8446  & - x24*z23 + x23*z24)
8447  ldir(e,4,3) = fct * (x14*(y12 - y13) - x12*y14 + x13*y14
8448  & + x24*y23 - x23*y24)
8449 c
8450 c.... edge modes (quadratic and cubic)
8451 c
8452  ldir(e,5,1) = pt25*(-(y13*z12) + y14*z12 + y12*(z13-z14))
8453  ldir(e,5,2) = pt25*(x13*z12 - x14*z12 + x12*(-z13 + z14))
8454  ldir(e,5,3) = pt25*(-(x13*y12) + x14*y12 + x12*(y13 - y14))
8455  ldir(e,6,1) = ldir(e,5,1)
8456  ldir(e,6,2) = ldir(e,5,2)
8457  ldir(e,6,3) = ldir(e,5,3)
8458 
8459  ldir(e,7,1) = pt25*(-(y13*z12) + y12*z13 + y24*z23-y23*z24)
8460  ldir(e,7,2) = pt25*(x13*z12 - x12*z13 - x24*z23 + x23*z24)
8461  ldir(e,7,3) = pt25*(-(x13*y12) + x12*y13 + x24*y23-x23*y24)
8462  ldir(e,8,1) = ldir(e,7,1)
8463  ldir(e,8,2) = ldir(e,7,2)
8464  ldir(e,8,3) = ldir(e,7,3)
8465 
8466  ldir(e,9,1) = pt25*((y12 - y14)*z13 + y13*(-z12 + z14))
8467  ldir(e,9,2) = pt25*((-x12 + x14)*z13 + x13*(z12 - z14))
8468  ldir(e,9,3) = pt25*((x12 - x14)*y13 + x13*(-y12 + y14))
8469  ldir(e,10,1) = ldir(e,9,1)
8470  ldir(e,10,2) = ldir(e,9,2)
8471  ldir(e,10,3) = ldir(e,9,3)
8472 
8473  ldir(e,11,1) = pt25*(y14*(z12 - z13) + (-y12 + y13)*z14)
8474  ldir(e,11,2) = pt25*(x14*(-z12 + z13) + (x12 - x13)*z14)
8475  ldir(e,11,3) = pt25*(x14*(y12 - y13) + (-x12 + x13)*y14)
8476  ldir(e,12,1) = ldir(e,11,1)
8477  ldir(e,12,2) = ldir(e,11,2)
8478  ldir(e,12,3) = ldir(e,11,3)
8479 
8480 
8481  ldir(e,13,1) = pt25*(y14*z12 - y12*z14 + y24*z23 - y23*z24)
8482  ldir(e,13,2) = pt25*(-(x14*z12) + x12*z14-x24*z23+x23*z24)
8483  ldir(e,13,3) = pt25*(x14*y12 - x12*y14 + x24*y23 - x23*y24)
8484  ldir(e,14,1) = ldir(e,13,1)
8485  ldir(e,14,2) = ldir(e,13,2)
8486  ldir(e,14,3) = ldir(e,13,3)
8487 
8488  ldir(e,15,1) = pt25*(-(y14*z13) + y13*z14+y24*z23-y23*z24)
8489  ldir(e,15,2) = pt25*(x14*z13 - x13*z14-x24*z23 + x23*z24)
8490  ldir(e,15,3) = pt25*(-(x14*y13) + x13*y14+x24*y23-x23*y24)
8491  ldir(e,16,1) = ldir(e,15,1)
8492  ldir(e,16,2) = ldir(e,15,2)
8493  ldir(e,16,3) = ldir(e,15,3)
8494 c
8495 c.... face modes (cubic)
8496 c
8497  ldir(e,17,1) = pt5*(-(y13*z12) + y12*z13)
8498  ldir(e,17,2) = pt5*(x13*z12 - x12*z13)
8499  ldir(e,17,3) = pt5*(-(x13*y12) + x12*y13)
8500 
8501  ldir(e,18,1) = pt5*(y14*z12 - y12*z14)
8502  ldir(e,18,2) = pt5*(-(x14*z12) + x12*z14)
8503  ldir(e,18,3) = pt5*(x14*y12 - x12*y14)
8504 
8505  ldir(e,19,1) = pt5*(y24*z23 - y23*z24)
8506  ldir(e,19,2) = pt5*(-(x24*z23) + x23*z24)
8507  ldir(e,19,3) = pt5*(x24*y23 - x23*y24)
8508 
8509  ldir(e,20,1) = pt5*(-(y14*z13) + y13*z14)
8510  ldir(e,20,2) = pt5*(x14*z13 - x13*z14)
8511  ldir(e,20,3) = pt5*(-(x14*y13) + x13*y14)
8512 
8513  enddo
8514 c
8515 c.... hexes
8516 c
8517  else if (nenl .eq. 8) then
8518  fct = 1.d0 / 12.d0
8519  do e = 1, npro
8520  x13 = xl(e,1,1) - xl(e,3,1)
8521  x16 = xl(e,1,1) - xl(e,6,1)
8522  x18 = xl(e,1,1) - xl(e,8,1)
8523  x24 = xl(e,2,1) - xl(e,4,1)
8524  x25 = xl(e,2,1) - xl(e,5,1)
8525  x27 = xl(e,2,1) - xl(e,7,1)
8526  x36 = xl(e,3,1) - xl(e,6,1)
8527  x38 = xl(e,3,1) - xl(e,8,1)
8528  x45 = xl(e,4,1) - xl(e,5,1)
8529  x47 = xl(e,4,1) - xl(e,7,1)
8530  x57 = xl(e,5,1) - xl(e,7,1)
8531  x68 = xl(e,6,1) - xl(e,8,1)
8532 c
8533  y13 = xl(e,1,2) - xl(e,3,2)
8534  y16 = xl(e,1,2) - xl(e,6,2)
8535  y18 = xl(e,1,2) - xl(e,8,2)
8536  y24 = xl(e,2,2) - xl(e,4,2)
8537  y25 = xl(e,2,2) - xl(e,5,2)
8538  y27 = xl(e,2,2) - xl(e,7,2)
8539  y36 = xl(e,3,2) - xl(e,6,2)
8540  y38 = xl(e,3,2) - xl(e,8,2)
8541  y45 = xl(e,4,2) - xl(e,5,2)
8542  y47 = xl(e,4,2) - xl(e,7,2)
8543  y57 = xl(e,5,2) - xl(e,7,2)
8544  y68 = xl(e,6,2) - xl(e,8,2)
8545 c
8546  z13 = xl(e,1,3) - xl(e,3,3)
8547  z16 = xl(e,1,3) - xl(e,6,3)
8548  z18 = xl(e,1,3) - xl(e,8,3)
8549  z24 = xl(e,2,3) - xl(e,4,3)
8550  z25 = xl(e,2,3) - xl(e,5,3)
8551  z27 = xl(e,2,3) - xl(e,7,3)
8552  z36 = xl(e,3,3) - xl(e,6,3)
8553  z38 = xl(e,3,3) - xl(e,8,3)
8554  z45 = xl(e,4,3) - xl(e,5,3)
8555  z47 = xl(e,4,3) - xl(e,7,3)
8556  z57 = xl(e,5,3) - xl(e,7,3)
8557  z68 = xl(e,6,3) - xl(e,8,3)
8558 c
8559  x31= -x13
8560  x61= -x16
8561  x81= -x18
8562  x42= -x24
8563  x52= -x25
8564  x72= -x27
8565  x63= -x36
8566  x83= -x38
8567  x54= -x45
8568  x74= -x47
8569  x75= -x57
8570  x86= -x68
8571  y31= -y13
8572  y61= -y16
8573  y81= -y18
8574  y42= -y24
8575  y52= -y25
8576  y72= -y27
8577  y63= -y36
8578  y83= -y38
8579  y54= -y45
8580  y74= -y47
8581  y75= -y57
8582  y86= -y68
8583  z31= -z13
8584  z61= -z16
8585  z81= -z18
8586  z42= -z24
8587  z52= -z25
8588  z72= -z27
8589  z63= -z36
8590  z83= -z38
8591  z54= -z45
8592  z74= -z47
8593  z75= -z57
8594  z86= -z68
8595 
8596  ldir(e,1,1) = fct * (-y24 * z45 + y36 * z24 - y68 * z45
8597  1 + z24 * y45 - z36 * y24 + z68 * y45 )
8598  ldir(e,2,1) = fct * (-y16 * z63 + y54 * z16 - y47 * z63
8599  1 + z16 * y63 - z54 * y16 + z47 * y63 )
8600  ldir(e,3,1) = fct * (-y42 * z27 + y18 * z42 - y86 * z27
8601  1 + z42 * y27 - z18 * y42 + z86 * y27 )
8602  ldir(e,4,1) = fct * (-y38 * z81 + y72 * z38 - y25 * z81
8603  1 + z38 * y81 - z72 * y38 + z25 * y81 )
8604  ldir(e,5,1) = fct * (-y61 * z18 + y27 * z61 - y74 * z18
8605  1 + z61 * y18 - z27 * y61 + z74 * y18 )
8606  ldir(e,6,1) = fct * (-y57 * z72 + y81 * z57 - y13 * z72
8607  1 + z57 * y72 - z81 * y57 + z13 * y72 )
8608  ldir(e,7,1) = fct * (-y83 * z36 + y45 * z83 - y52 * z36
8609  1 + z83 * y36 - z45 * y83 + z52 * y36 )
8610  ldir(e,8,1) = fct * (-y75 * z54 + y63 * z75 - y31 * z54
8611  1 + z75 * y54 - z63 * y75 + z31 * y54 )
8612 c
8613  ldir(e,1,2) = fct * (-z24 * x45 + z36 * x24 - z68 * x45
8614  1 + x24 * z45 - x36 * z24 + x68 * z45 )
8615  ldir(e,2,2) = fct * (-z16 * x63 + z54 * x16 - z47 * x63
8616  1 + x16 * z63 - x54 * z16 + x47 * z63 )
8617  ldir(e,3,2) = fct * (-z42 * x27 + z18 * x42 - z86 * x27
8618  1 + x42 * z27 - x18 * z42 + x86 * z27 )
8619  ldir(e,4,2) = fct * (-z38 * x81 + z72 * x38 - z25 * x81
8620  1 + x38 * z81 - x72 * z38 + x25 * z81 )
8621  ldir(e,5,2) = fct * (-z61 * x18 + z27 * x61 - z74 * x18
8622  1 + x61 * z18 - x27 * z61 + x74 * z18 )
8623  ldir(e,6,2) = fct * (-z57 * x72 + z81 * x57 - z13 * x72
8624  1 + x57 * z72 - x81 * z57 + x13 * z72 )
8625  ldir(e,7,2) = fct * (-z83 * x36 + z45 * x83 - z52 * x36
8626  1 + x83 * z36 - x45 * z83 + x52 * z36 )
8627  ldir(e,8,2) = fct * (-z75 * x54 + z63 * x75 - z31 * x54
8628  1 + x75 * z54 - x63 * z75 + x31 * z54 )
8629 c
8630  ldir(e,1,3) = fct * (-x24 * y45 + x36 * y24 - x68 * y45
8631  1 + y24 * x45 - y36 * x24 + y68 * x45 )
8632  ldir(e,2,3) = fct * (-x16 * y63 + x54 * y16 - x47 * y63
8633  1 + y16 * x63 - y54 * x16 + y47 * x63 )
8634  ldir(e,3,3) = fct * (-x42 * y27 + x18 * y42 - x86 * y27
8635  1 + y42 * x27 - y18 * x42 + y86 * x27 )
8636  ldir(e,4,3) = fct * (-x38 * y81 + x72 * y38 - x25 * y81
8637  1 + y38 * x81 - y72 * x38 + y25 * x81 )
8638  ldir(e,5,3) = fct * (-x61 * y18 + x27 * y61 - x74 * y18
8639  1 + y61 * x18 - y27 * x61 + y74 * x18 )
8640  ldir(e,6,3) = fct * (-x57 * y72 + x81 * y57 - x13 * y72
8641  1 + y57 * x72 - y81 * x57 + y13 * x72 )
8642  ldir(e,7,3) = fct * (-x83 * y36 + x45 * y83 - x52 * y36
8643  1 + y83 * x36 - y45 * x83 + y52 * x36 )
8644  ldir(e,8,3) = fct * (-x75 * y54 + x63 * y75 - x31 * y54
8645  1 + y75 * x54 - y63 * x75 + y31 * x54 )
8646 c
8647  enddo
8648  else
8649  write(*,*) 'Error in e3sts: elt type not impl.'
8650  stop
8651  endif
8652 
8653  return
8654  end
8655 
8658 
8659  subroutine elmstatslhs( x, iBC, iper, ilwork )
8660 
8661  use stats
8662  use pointer_data
8663 
8664  include "global.h"
8665  include "common_blocks/blkdat.h"
8666  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
8667  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
8668  include "common_blocks/fronts.h"
8669  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
8670  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
8671  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
8672 C
8673 C Local variables
8674 C
8675  INTEGER i, iblk, iel, j
8676 C
8677  real*8 x(numnp,3)
8678  integer ibc(nshg), iper(nshg), ilwork(nlwork)
8679 
8680  real*8, allocatable :: xl(:,:,:)
8681  real*8, allocatable :: lstsvec(:,:,:)
8682 
8683 c
8684 c.... loop over element blocks
8685 c
8686  stsvec = zero
8687 
8688  do iblk = 1, nelblk
8689  iel = lcblk(1,iblk)
8690  lcsyst = lcblk(3,iblk)
8691  nenl = lcblk(5,iblk) ! no. of vertices per element
8692  nshl = lcblk(10,iblk)
8693  ndofl = lcblk(8,iblk)
8694  npro = lcblk(1,iblk+1) - iel
8695 
8696  allocate ( xl(npro,nenl,3) )
8697  allocate ( lstsvec(npro,nshl,nresdims) )
8698 c
8699 c.... localize needed data
8700 c
8701  call localx( x, xl, mien(iblk)%p, nsd, 'gather ' )
8702 c
8703 c.... form the Lhs
8704 c
8705  call e3stslhs( xl, lstsvec )
8706 c
8707 c.... assemble
8708 c
8709  call local(stsvec, lstsvec, mien(iblk)%p,
8710  & nresdims, 'scatter ' )
8711 
8712  deallocate ( xl )
8713  deallocate ( lstsvec )
8714 c
8715 c.... end loop over element blocks
8716 c
8717  enddo
8718 
8719  if (numpe > 1) then
8720  call commu(stsvec, ilwork, nresdims , 'in ')
8721  endif
8722 c
8723 c.... local periodic boundary conditions (no communications)
8724 c
8725  do j = 1,nshg
8726  if (btest(ibc(j),10)) then
8727  i = iper(j)
8728  stsvec(i,:) = stsvec(i,:) + stsvec(j,:)
8729  endif
8730  enddo
8731 c
8732  do i = 1,nshg
8733  stsvec(i,:) = stsvec(iper(i),:)
8734  enddo
8735  if (numpe > 1) then
8736  call commu(stsvec, ilwork, nresdims , 'out')
8737  endif
8738 
8739  return
8740  end
8741 
8743 
8744  subroutine elmstatsres( y, ac, x, shp, shgl,
8745  & shpb, shglb, ibc, bc,
8746  & iper, ilwork, rowp, colm,
8747  & lhsk, lhsp )
8748 
8749  use stats
8750 
8751  include "global.h"
8752  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
8753  include "common_blocks/fronts.h"
8754  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
8755 
8756 C
8757 C Local variables
8758 C
8759  INTEGER ierrcalctmp
8760 C
8761  REAL*8 rjunk
8762 C
8763  real*8 y(nshg,ndof), ac(nshg,ndof), x(numnp,nsd),
8764  & shp(maxtop,maxsh,maxqpt), shgl(maxtop,nsd,maxsh,maxqpt),
8765  & shpb(maxtop,maxsh,maxqpt),
8766  & shglb(maxtop,nsd,maxsh,maxqpt),
8767  & bc(nshg,ndofbc), lhsk(9,nnz_tot),
8768  & lhsp(4,nnz_tot), res(nshg,ndof)
8769 
8770  integer ibc(nshg), iper(nshg),
8771  & ilwork(nlwork), rowp(nshg,nnz),
8772  & colm(nshg+1)
8773 
8774 
8775  lhs = 0
8776  stsvec = zero
8777 
8778  stsresflg = 1
8779 
8780  call elmgmr(y, ac, x,
8781  & shp, shgl, ibc,
8782  & bc, shpb, shglb,
8783  & res, iper, ilwork,
8784  & rowp, colm, lhsk,
8785  & lhsp, rjunk )
8786 
8787  stsresflg = 0
8788 
8789  return
8790  end
8791 
8798 
8799  subroutine error (routin, variab, num)
8800 c
8801  include "global.h"
8802  include "mpif.h"
8803  include "common_blocks/mio.h"
8804  include "common_blocks/mioname.h"
8805  include "common_blocks/timer4.h"
8806  include "common_blocks/title.h"
8807  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
8808 C
8809 C Argument variables
8810 C
8811  INTEGER num
8812 C
8813 C Local variables
8814 C
8815  INTEGER ierchk
8816 C
8817 c
8818  character*8 routin, variab
8819 c
8820  data ierchk /0/
8821 c
8822 c.... check for redundant error
8823 c
8824  if (ierchk .eq. 1) stop
8825  ierchk = 1
8826 c
8827 c.... open file
8828 c
8829  open (unit=ierror, file=ferror, status='unknown')
8830 c
8831 c.... print the error
8832 c
8833  write (*,1000) title, routin, variab, num
8834  if (num .ne. 0) write (ierror,1000) title, routin, variab, num
8835  if (num .eq. 0) write (ierror,1000) title, routin, variab
8836 c
8837 c.... halt the process
8838 c
8839  close (ierror)
8840 
8841 
8842  WRITE(6,'(A,G14.6)') 'Life: ',death - birth
8843  if (numpe > 1) then
8844  call mpi_abort(mpi_comm_world)
8845  endif
8846 
8847 
8848 1000 format(' ',a80,//,
8849  & ' ****** Error occurred in routine <',a8,'>',/,
8850  & ' Error code :',a8,:,' : ',i8,//)
8851  end
8852
