12030  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
12031  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
12032 C
12033 C Local variables
12034 C
12035  REAL*8 fct, fct1, fct2, fct3
12036 C
12037  real*8 y(nshg,ndof), ac(nshg,ndof),
12038  & u(nshg,nsd), yold(nshg,ndof),
12039  & acold(nshg,ndof), uold(nshg,nsd)
12040 
12041 
12042  if ( ipred.eq.1) then ! yn+1_pred=yn
12043  fct = (gami-one)/gami
12044  y = yold
12045  ac = acold * fct
12046  if(ideformwall.eq.1)
12047  & u(:,1:3) = uold(:,1:3) + delt(itseq)*yold(:,1:3) +
12048  & pt5*((gami-two*betai)/gami)*
12049  & delt(itseq)*delt(itseq)*acold(:,1:3)
12050  endif
12051 c
12052  if ( ipred.eq.2) then ! an+1_pred=0
12053  y = yold + (one - gami)/dtgl * acold
12054  ac = 0.0
12055  endif
12056 c
12057  if(ipred.eq.3 ) then ! an+1_pred=an
12058  y = yold+alfi*delt(itseq)*acold
12059  ac = acold
12060  endif
12061 c
12062  if ( ipred.eq.4 ) then ! protect from DC=4 rho=0, same dV
12063  fct1 = alfi/(one-alfi)
12064  fct2 = one-almi/gami
12065  fct3 = almi/gami/alfi*dtgl
12066  y = yold+fct1*(yold-y)
12067  ac = acold*fct2+(y-yold)*fct3
12068  endif
12069 c
12070  if (lagrange .gt. 0) then
12071  lag = lagold
12072  endif
12073 
12074  return
12075  end
12076 
12078 
12079  subroutine itrcorrect ( y, ac, u, solinc )
12080 
12081  use lagrangemultipliers
12082 
12083  include "global.h"
12084  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
12085  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
12086  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
12087  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
12088 C
12089 C Local variables
12090 C
12091  REAL*8 fct1, fct2
12092 C
12093  real*8 y(nshg,ndof), ac(nshg,ndof),
12094  & u(nshg,nsd), solinc(nshg,4)
12095 
12096  fct1 = gami*delt(itseq)
12097  fct2 = gami*alfi*delt(itseq)
12098 
12099  y(:,1:3) = y(:,1:3) + fct1 * solinc(:,1:3)
12100  y(:,4 ) = y(:,4 ) + fct2 * solinc(:,4 )
12101  ac(:,1:3) = ac(:,1:3) + solinc(:,1:3)
12102 
12103  if(ideformwall.eq.1)
12104  & u(:,1:3) = u(:,1:3) +
12105  & delt(itseq)*delt(itseq)*betai*solinc(:,1:3)
12106 c
12107  if (lagrange .gt. 0) then
12108  lag(:,1:3) = lag(:,1:3) + fct2 * lagincr(:,1:3)
12109  endif
12110  return
12111  end
12112 
12114 
12115  subroutine itrcorrectsclr ( y, ac, solinc )
12116 
12117  include "global.h"
12118  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
12119  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
12120  include "common_blocks/sclrs.h"
12121  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
12122 C
12123 C Local variables
12124 C
12125  INTEGER is
12126 C
12127  REAL*8 fct1
12128 C
12129  real*8 y(nshg,ndof), ac(nshg,ndof),
12130  & solinc(nshg)
12131 
12132  fct1 = gami*delt(itseq)
12133  is=5+isclr
12134  y(:,is) = y(:,is) + fct1 * solinc(:)
12135  ac(:,is) = ac(:,is) + solinc(:)
12136 c
12137  return
12138  end
12139 
12141 
12142  subroutine itryalpha ( uold, yold, acold,
12143  & u, y, ac,
12144  & ualpha, yalpha, acalpha )
12145 
12146 c use readarrays !reads in uold and acold
12147  use lagrangemultipliers
12148 
12149  include "global.h"
12150  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
12151  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
12152  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
12153 
12154  real*8 yold(nshg,ndof), acold(nshg,ndof),
12155  & y(nshg,ndof), ac(nshg,ndof),
12156  & yalpha(nshg,ndof), acalpha(nshg,ndof),
12157  & u(nshg,nsd), uold(nshg,nsd),
12158  & ualpha(nshg,nsd)
12159 
12160  acalpha(:,4) = zero !pressure acceleration is never used but....
12161 
12162  yalpha(:,1:3) = yold(:,1:3)
12163  & + alfi * (y(:,1:3) - yold(:,1:3))
12164 
12165  acalpha(:,1:3) = acold(:,1:3)
12166  & + almi * (ac(:,1:3) - acold(:,1:3))
12167 
12168  yalpha(:,4 ) = y(:,4)
12169 
12170  if(ideformwall.eq.1) ualpha(:,1:3) = uold(:,1:3)
12171  & + alfi * (u(:,1:3) - uold(:,1:3))
12172 
12173  if(ndof.ge.5) then
12174 c
12175 c Now take care of temperature, turbulence, what have you
12176 c
12177 
12178 
12179  yalpha(:,5:ndof ) = yold(:,5:ndof)
12180  & + alfi * (y(:,5:ndof) - yold(:,5:ndof))
12181  acalpha(:,5:ndof ) = acold(:,5:ndof)
12182  & + almi * (ac(:,5:ndof) - acold(:,5:ndof))
12183 
12184  endif
12185 
12186  if (lagrange .gt. 0) then
12187  lagalpha(:,1:3) = lag(:,1:3)
12188  endif
12189  return
12190  end
12191 
12193 
12194  subroutine itrupdate( yold, acold, uold,
12195  & y, ac, u )
12196 
12197 c use readarrays !reads in uold and acold
12198  use lagrangemultipliers
12199 
12200  include "global.h"
12201  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
12202  include "common_blocks/sclrs.h"
12203  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
12204 
12205  real*8 yold(nshg,ndof), acold(nshg,ndof),
12206  & y(nshg,ndof), ac(nshg,ndof),
12207  & u(nshg,nsd), uold(nshg,nsd)
12208 
12209  yold = y
12210 
12211  acold = ac
12212 
12213  if(ideformwall.eq.1) uold = u
12214 
12215  if (lagrange .gt. 0) then
12216  lagold = lag
12217  endif
12218 
12219  return
12220  end
12221 
12233 
12234  subroutine local (global, rlocal, ientmp, n, code)
12235 c
12236  include "global.h"
12237  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
12238  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
12239  include "common_blocks/mtimer2.h"
12240  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
12241  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
12242 C
12243 C Argument variables
12244 C
12245  INTEGER ientmp, n
12246 C
12247  REAL*8 global, rlocal
12248 C
12249 C Local variables
12250 C
12251  INTEGER i, ien, j, nel
12252 C
12253  dimension global(nshg,n), rlocal(npro,nshl,n),
12254  & ien(npro,nshl), ientmp(npro,nshl)
12255 c
12256  character*8 code
12257 
12258 c
12259 c.... cubic basis has negatives in ien
12260 c
12261  if (ipord > 2) then
12262  ien = abs(ientmp)
12263  else
12264  ien = ientmp
12265  endif
12266 c
12267 c.... ------------------------> 'localization ' <--------------------
12268 c
12269  if (code .eq. 'gather ') then
12270 c
12271 c.... gather the data
12272 c
12273 
12274  do j = 1, n
12275  do i = 1, nshl
12276  rlocal(:,i,j) = global(ien(:,i),j)
12277  enddo
12278  enddo
12279 
12280 
12281 c
12282 c.... transfer count
12283 c
12284  gbytes = gbytes + n*nshl*npro
12285 c
12286 c.... return
12287 c
12288  return
12289  endif
12290 c
12291 c.... -------------------------> 'assembling ' <----------------------
12292 c
12293  if (code .eq. 'scatter ') then
12294 c
12295 c.... scatter the data (possible collisions)
12296 c
12297  do j = 1, n
12298  do i = 1, nshl
12299  do nel = 1,npro
12300  global(ien(nel,i),j) = global(ien(nel,i),j)
12301  & + rlocal(nel,i,j)
12302  enddo
12303  enddo
12304  enddo
12305 
12306 c
12307 c.... transfer and flop counts
12308 c
12309  sbytes = sbytes + n*nshl*npro
12310  flops = flops + n*nshl*npro
12311 c
12312 c.... return
12313 c
12314  return
12315  endif
12316 c
12317 c.... -------------------------> 'globalizing ' <----------------------
12318 c
12319  if (code .eq. 'globaliz') then
12320 c
12321 c.... scatter the data (possible collisions)
12322 c
12323  do j = 1, n
12324  do i = 1, nshl
12325  do nel = 1,npro
12326  global(ien(nel,i),j) = rlocal(nel,i,j)
12327  enddo
12328  enddo
12329  enddo
12330 c
12331 c.... return
12332 c
12333  return
12334  endif
12335 c
12336 c.... ---------------------------> error <---------------------------
12337 c
12338  call error('local ', code, 0)
12339 c
12340 c.... end
12341 c
12342  end
12343 c
12356 
12357  subroutine localx (global, rlocal, ien, n, code)
12358 c
12359  include "global.h"
12360  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
12361  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
12362  include "common_blocks/mtimer2.h"
12363  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
12364  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
12365 C
12366 C Argument variables
12367 C
12368  INTEGER ien, n
12369 C
12370  REAL*8 global, rlocal
12371 C
12372 C Local variables
12373 C
12374  INTEGER i, j, nel
12375 C
12376  dimension global(numnp,n), rlocal(npro,nenl,n),
12377  & ien(npro,nshl)
12378 c
12379  character*8 code
12380 c
12381 c.... ------------------------> 'localization ' <--------------------
12382 c
12383  if (code .eq. 'gather ') then
12384 c
12385 c.... gather the data
12386 c
12387  do j = 1, n
12388  do i = 1, nenl
12389  rlocal(:,i,j) = global(ien(:,i),j)
12390  enddo
12391  enddo
12392 
12393 
12394 c
12395 c.... transfer count
12396 c
12397  gbytes = gbytes + n*nenl*npro
12398 c
12399 c.... return
12400 c
12401  return
12402  endif
12403 c
12404 c.... -------------------------> 'assembling ' <----------------------
12405 c
12406  if (code .eq. 'scatter ') then
12407 c
12408 c.... scatter the data (possible collisions)
12409 c
12410 
12411  do j = 1, n
12412  do i = 1, nenl
12413  do nel = 1,npro
12414  global(ien(nel,i),j) = global(ien(nel,i),j)
12415  & + rlocal(nel,i,j)
12416  enddo
12417  enddo
12418  enddo
12419 
12420 
12421 c
12422 c.... transfer and flop counts
12423 c
12424  sbytes = sbytes + n*nenl*npro
12425  flops = flops + n*nenl*npro
12426 c
12427 c.... return
12428 c
12429  return
12430  endif
12431 c
12432 c.... ---------------------------> error <---------------------------
12433 c
12434  call error('local ', code, 0)
12435 c
12436 c.... end
12437 c
12438  end
12439 c
12440 
12444 
12445  subroutine localsum (global, rlocal, ientmp, nHits, n)
12446 c
12447  include "global.h"
12448  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
12449  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
12450  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
12451  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
12452 C
12453 C Argument variables
12454 C
12455  INTEGER ientmp, n, nhits
12456 C
12457  REAL*8 global, rlocal
12458 C
12459 C Local variables
12460 C
12461  INTEGER i, idg, ien, j
12462  INTEGER nel
12463 C
12464  dimension global(nshg,n), rlocal(npro,nshl,n),
12465  & ien(npro,nshl), ientmp(npro,nshl),
12466  & nhits(nshg)
12467 c
12468 c.... cubic basis has negatives in ien
12469 c
12470  if (ipord > 2) then
12471  ien = abs(ientmp)
12472  else
12473  ien = ientmp
12474  endif
12475 c
12476 c.... -------------------------> 'assembling ' <----------------------
12477 c
12478  do j = 1, n
12479  do i = 1, nshl
12480  do nel = 1,npro
12481  idg = ien(nel,i)
12482  global(idg,j) = global(idg,j) + rlocal(nel,i,j)
12483  enddo
12484  enddo
12485  enddo
12486  do i = 1, nshl
12487  do nel = 1,npro
12488  idg = ien(nel,i)
12489  nhits(idg) = nhits(idg) + 1
12490  enddo
12491  enddo
12492 c
12493 c.... end
12494 c
12495  end
12496 
12508 
12509  subroutine localb (global, rlocal, ientmp, n, code)
12510 c
12511  include "global.h"
12512  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
12513  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
12514  include "common_blocks/mtimer2.h"
12515  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
12516  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
12517 C
12518 C Argument variables
12519 C
12520  INTEGER ientmp, n
12521 C
12522  REAL*8 global, rlocal
12523 C
12524 C Local variables
12525 C
12526  INTEGER i, ien, j, nel
12527 C
12528  dimension global(nshg,n), rlocal(npro,nshlb,n),
12529  & ien(npro,nshl), ientmp(npro,nshl)
12530 c
12531  character*8 code
12532 
12533 c
12534 c.... cubic basis has negatives in ien
12535 c
12536  if (ipord > 2) then
12537  ien = abs(ientmp)
12538  else
12539  ien = ientmp
12540  endif
12541 c
12542 c.... ------------------------> 'localization ' <--------------------
12543 c
12544  if (code .eq. 'gather ') then
12545 c
12546 c.... set timer
12547 c
12548 cad call timer ('Gather ')
12549 c
12550 c.... gather the data
12551 c
12552 
12553  do j = 1, n
12554  do i = 1, nshlb
12555  rlocal(:,i,j) = global(ien(:,i),j)
12556  enddo
12557  enddo
12558 
12559 
12560 c
12561 c.... transfer count
12562 c
12563  gbytes = gbytes + n*nshl*npro
12564 c
12565 c.... return
12566 c
12567 cad call timer ('Back ')
12568  return
12569  endif
12570 c
12571 c.... -------------------------> 'assembling ' <----------------------
12572 c
12573  if (code .eq. 'scatter ') then
12574 c
12575 c.... set timer
12576 c
12577 cad call timer ('Scatter ')
12578 c
12579 c.... scatter the data (possible collisions)
12580 c
12581  do j = 1, n
12582  do i = 1, nshlb
12583  do nel = 1,npro
12584  global(ien(nel,i),j) = global(ien(nel,i),j)
12585  & + rlocal(nel,i,j)
12586  enddo
12587  enddo
12588  enddo
12589 
12590 c
12591 c.... transfer and flop counts
12592 c
12593  sbytes = sbytes + n*nshlb*npro
12594  flops = flops + n*nshlb*npro
12595 c
12596 c.... return
12597 c
12598 CAD call timer ('Back ')
12599  return
12600  endif
12601 c
12602 c.... -------------------------> 'globalizing ' <----------------------
12603 c
12604  if (code .eq. 'globaliz') then
12605 c
12606 c.... scatter the data (possible collisions)
12607 c
12608  do j = 1, n
12609  do i = 1, nshlb
12610  do nel = 1,npro
12611  global(ien(nel,i),j) = rlocal(nel,i,j)
12612  enddo
12613  enddo
12614  enddo
12615 c
12616 c.... return
12617 c
12618 cad call timer ('Back ')
12619  return
12620  endif
12621 c
12622 c.... ---------------------------> error <---------------------------
12623 c
12624  call error('local ', code, 0)
12625 c
12626 c.... end
12627 c
12628  end
12629 c
12630 
12643 
12644  subroutine localy (global, rlocal, ientmp, n, code)
12645 c
12646  include "global.h"
12647  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
12648  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
12649  include "common_blocks/mtimer2.h"
12650  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
12651  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
12652 C
12653 C Argument variables
12654 C
12655  INTEGER ientmp, n
12656 C
12657  REAL*8 global, rlocal
12658 C
12659 C Local variables
12660 C
12661  INTEGER i, ien, j
12662 C
12663  dimension global(nshg,n), rlocal(npro,nshl,n),
12664  & ien(npro,nshl), ientmp(npro,nshl)
12665 c
12666  character*8 code
12667 
12668 c
12669 c.... cubic basis has negatives in ien
12670 c
12671  if (ipord > 2) then
12672  ien = abs(ientmp)
12673  else
12674  ien = ientmp
12675  endif
12676 c
12677 c.... ------------------------> 'localization ' <--------------------
12678 c
12679  if (code .eq. 'gather ') then
12680 c
12681 c.... set timer
12682 c
12683 c call timer ('Gather ')
12684 c
12685 c.... gather the data to the current block
12686 c
12687 
12688 CAD rlocal = yl={P, u, v, w, T, scalar1, ...}
12689 CAD global = y = {u, v, w, P, T, scalar1, ...}
12690 
12691 CAD Put u,v,w in the slots 2,3,4 of yl
12692 
12693  do j = 1, 3
12694  do i = 1, nshl
12695  rlocal(:,i,j+1) = global(ien(:,i),j)
12696  enddo
12697  enddo
12698 
12699 CAD Put Pressure in the first slot of yl
12700 
12701  do i = 1, nshl
12702  rlocal(:,i,1) = global(ien(:,i),4)
12703  enddo
12704 
12705 CAD Fill in the remaining slots with T, and additional scalars
12706 
12707  if(n.gt.4) then
12708  do j = 5, n
12709  do i = 1, nshl
12710  rlocal(:,i,j) = global(ien(:,i),j)
12711  enddo
12712  enddo
12713  endif
12714 c
12715 c.... transfer count
12716 c
12717  gbytes = gbytes + n*nshl*npro
12718 c
12719 c.... return
12720 c
12721 c call timer ('Back ')
12722  return
12723  endif
12724 c
12725 c.... -------------------------> 'assembling ' <----------------------
12726 c
12727  if (code .eq. 'scatter ') then
12728  write(*,*) 'do not use localy here'
12729  endif
12730 c
12731 c.... -------------------------> 'globalizing ' <----------------------
12732 c
12733  if (code .eq. 'globaliz') then
12734  write(*,*) 'do not use localy here'
12735  endif
12736 c
12737 c.... ---------------------------> error <---------------------------
12738 c
12739  call error('local ', code, 0)
12740 c
12741 c.... end
12742 c
12743  end
12744 
12745 c
12746 c--------------
12747 c drvAllreduce
12748 c--------------
12749 c
12750  subroutine drvallreduce ( eachproc, result, m )
12751 c
12752  include "global.h"
12753  include "mpif.h"
12754  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
12755 c
12756 C Argument variables
12757 C
12758  INTEGER m
12759 C
12760  REAL*8 eachproc, result
12761 C
12762 C Local variables
12763 C
12764  INTEGER ierr
12765 
12766 C
12767  dimension eachproc(m), result(m)
12768 c
12769  if (numpe > 1) then
12770  call mpi_allreduce( eachproc, result, m,
12771  & mpi_double_precision, mpi_sum, mpi_comm_world, ierr )
12772  else
12773  result = eachproc
12774  endif
12775 c
12776  return
12777  end
12778 
12780 
12781  subroutine sumgat (u, n, summed)
12782 
12783  include "global.h"
12784  include "mpif.h"
12785  include "auxmpi.h"
12786  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
12787  include "common_blocks/fronts.h"
12788  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
12789 C
12790 C Argument variables
12791 C
12792  INTEGER n
12793 C
12794  REAL*8 summed, u
12795 C
12796 C Local variables
12797 C
12798  INTEGER ierr, ilwork, irecvcount
12799 C
12800  REAL*8 sumvec
12801 C
12802  dimension u(nshg,n), ilwork(nlwork)
12803  dimension sumvec(numpe), irecvcount(numpe)
12804 
12805  summed = sum(u)
12806 
12807  if (numpe > 1) then
12808  irecvcount = 1
12809  sumvec = summed
12810  call mpi_reduce_scatter(sumvec, summed, irecvcount,
12811  & mpi_double_precision, mpi_sum, mpi_comm_world, ierr)
12812 
12813  endif
12814 
12815  return
12816  end
12817 
12819 
12820  subroutine sumgatn (u, n, summed, nnp)
12821 
12822  include "global.h"
12823  include "mpif.h"
12824  include "auxmpi.h"
12825  include "common_blocks/fronts.h"
12826  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
12827 C
12828 C Argument variables
12829 C
12830  INTEGER n, nnp
12831 C
12832  REAL*8 summed, u
12833 C
12834 C Local variables
12835 C
12836  INTEGER ierr, ilwork, irecvcount
12837 C
12838  REAL*8 sumvec
12839 C
12840  dimension u(nnp,n), ilwork(nlwork)
12841  dimension sumvec(numpe), irecvcount(numpe)
12842 
12843 c protect against underflow
12844 c summed = sum(u)
12845  summed = sum(u) + 1.e-20
12846 
12847  if (numpe > 1) then
12848  irecvcount = 1
12849  sumvec = summed
12850  call mpi_reduce_scatter(sumvec, summed, irecvcount,
12851  & mpi_double_precision, mpi_sum, mpi_comm_world, ierr)
12852 
12853  endif
12854 
12855  return
12856  end
12857 
12859 
12860  subroutine sumgatint (u, n, summed )
12861 
12862  include "global.h"
12863  include "mpif.h"
12864  include "auxmpi.h"
12865  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
12866 
12867 C
12868 C Argument variables
12869 C
12870  INTEGER n
12871 C
12872 C Local variables
12873 C
12874  INTEGER ierr
12875 C
12876  integer u(n), summed
12877  integer sumvec(numpe), irecvcount(numpe)
12878 
12879 c$$$ ttim(62) = ttim(62) - tmr()
12880 
12881  summed = sum(u)
12882 
12883  if (numpe > 1) then
12884  irecvcount = 1
12885  sumvec = summed
12886  call mpi_reduce_scatter(sumvec, summed, irecvcount,
12887  & mpi_integer, mpi_sum, mpi_comm_world, ierr)
12888 
12889  endif
12890 c$$$ ttim(62) = ttim(62) + tmr()
12891 
12892  return
12893  end
12894 
12906 
12907  function mpoint (name, ndim1, ndim2, ndim3)
12908 c
12909  include "global.h"
12910  include "common_blocks/point.h"
12911 c
12912 C Argument variables
12913 C
12914  INTEGER mpoint, ndim1, ndim2, ndim3
12915 C
12916 C Local variables
12917 C
12918  INTEGER idim1, idim2, idim3
12919 C
12920  character*8 name
12921 c
12922 c.... calculate the array size
12923 c
12924  idim1 = ndim1
12925  idim2 = ndim2 * min(idim1, 1)
12926  idim3 = ndim3 * min(idim2, 1)
12927 c
12928 c.... store the array information
12929 c
12930  mpoint = mbeg
12931 c
12932 c.... set the memory pointer
12933 c
12934  mbeg = mpoint + max(1,idim1) * max(1,idim2) * max(1,idim3)
12935 c
12936 c.... if past the end of total memory allocated, set the error message
12937 c
12938  if (mbeg .gt. mend) call error('mpoint ', name, mbeg-mend)
12939 c
12940 c.... return
12941 c
12942  return
12943  end
12944 
12945  subroutine setper (nshg)
12946 
12947  use periodicity
12948 C
12949 C Argument variables
12950 C
12951  INTEGER nshg
12952 C
12953  allocate (rcount(nshg))
12954 
12955  return
12956  end
12957 
12958  subroutine perprep (iBC, iper,nshg)
12959 
12960  use periodicity
12961 C
12962 C Argument variables
12963 C
12964  INTEGER ibc, iper, nshg
12965 C
12966 C Local variables
12967 C
12968  INTEGER i, j, k
12969 C
12970  REAL*8 one
12971 C
12972  dimension ibc(nshg),
12973  & iper(nshg)
12974 
12975 c
12976 c..... calculate the inverse of the number of slaves + 1
12977 c
12978  one=1.00000000000
12979  rcount=one
12980  do j = 1,nshg
12981  if (btest(ibc(j),10)) then
12982  i = iper(j)
12983  rcount(i) = rcount(i) + one
12984  endif
12985  enddo
12986  do k=1,nshg
12987  if(rcount(k).ne.one) then
12988  rcount(k)=one/rcount(k)
12989  endif
12990  enddo
12991 
12992 c
12993 c.... return
12994 c
12995  return
12996  end
12997 
13005 
13006  subroutine initnabi( x, shpb )
13007 
13008  use pointer_data
13009  use pvsqbi
13010 
13011  include "global.h"
13012  include "common_blocks/blkdat.h"
13013  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
13014  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
13015  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
13016  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
13017  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
13018  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
13019 C
13020 C Argument variables
13021 C
13022  REAL*8 shpb
13023 C
13024 C Local variables
13025 C
13026  INTEGER iblk, iel
13027 C
13028  real*8 x(numnp,nsd)
13029 c
13030 c use is like
13031 c
13032 c NABI=pvsQbi -> NABI
13033 c
13034  dimension shpb(maxtop,maxsh,maxqpt)
13035  real*8, allocatable :: tmpshpb(:,:)
13036  allocate ( nabi(nshg,3) )
13037  allocate ( nasc(nshg) )
13038  allocate ( ndsurf(nshg) )
13039 
13040 c
13041 c.... calculate NABI
13042 c
13043  nabi=zero
13044  nasc=zero
13045  ndsurf=0
13046  if (lagrange .gt. 0) then
13047  allocate ( pnabi(nshg,3) )
13048  allocate ( nanbij(nshg,3,3) )
13049  pnabi = zero
13050  nanbij = zero
13051  endif
13052 c
13053 c.... --------------------> boundary elements <--------------------
13054 c
13055 c.... set up parameters
13056 c
13057 c intrul = intg (2,itseq)
13058 c intind = intptb (intrul)
13059 c
13060 c.... loop over the boundary elements
13061 c
13062  do iblk = 1, nelblb
13063 c
13064 c.... set up the parameters
13065 c
13066  iel = lcblkb(1,iblk)
13067  lelcat = lcblkb(2,iblk)
13068  lcsyst = lcblkb(3,iblk)
13069  iorder = lcblkb(4,iblk)
13070  nenl = lcblkb(5,iblk) ! no. of vertices per element
13071  nenbl = lcblkb(6,iblk) ! no. of vertices per bdry. face
13072  nshl = lcblkb(9,iblk)
13073  nshlb = lcblkb(10,iblk)
13074  mattyp = lcblkb(7,iblk)
13075  ndofl = lcblkb(8,iblk)
13076  npro = lcblkb(1,iblk+1) - iel
13077 
13078 
13079  if(lcsyst.eq.3) lcsyst=nenbl
13080 c
13081  if(lcsyst.eq.3 .or. lcsyst.eq.4) then
13082  ngaussb = nintb(lcsyst)
13083  else
13084  ngaussb = nintb(lcsyst)
13085  endif
13086 
13087 c
13088 c.... compute and assemble the residuals corresponding to the
13089 c boundary integral
13090 c
13091  allocate (tmpshpb(nshl,maxqpt))
13092 
13093  tmpshpb(1:nshl,:) = shpb(lcsyst,1:nshl,:)
13094 
13095  call asbnabi( x,
13096  & tmpshpb,
13097  & mienb(iblk)%p,
13098  & mibcb(iblk)%p)
13099 
13100  call asbnasc( x,
13101  & tmpshpb,
13102  & mienb(iblk)%p,
13103  & mibcb(iblk)%p)
13104 
13105  if (lagrange .gt. 0) then
13106  call asbpnabi( x,
13107  & tmpshpb,
13108  & mienb(iblk)%p,
13109  & mibcb(iblk)%p)
13110  endif
13111 
13112  deallocate (tmpshpb)
13113 
13114  enddo
13115 
13116 c
13117 c note that NABI has NOT been communicated. It
13118 C is the on processor contribution to this vector. It will used to
13119 C build the on processor contribution to res that will then be made
13120 C complete via a call to commu. Similarly the LHS usage will create
13121 C the on-processor contribution to the lhsK. Same for NASC
13122 c
13123  return
13124  end
13125 
13137 
13138  subroutine qpbc( rmass, qres, iBC, iper, ilwork )
13139 c
13140  include "global.h"
13141  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
13142  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
13143  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
13144  include "common_blocks/fronts.h"
13145 C
13146 C Argument variables
13147 C
13148  INTEGER ibc, ilwork, iper
13149 C
13150  REAL*8 qres, rmass
13151 C
13152 C Local variables
13153 C
13154  INTEGER i, idflow, istrt, j
13155 C
13156  REAL*8 tmp, tmpvec, uv
13157 C
13158  dimension rmass(nshg), qres(nshg,idflx),
13159  & ibc(nshg), iper(nshg),uv(nshg,2),
13160  & tmpvec(nshg,4), tmp(nshg),
13161  & ilwork(nlwork)
13162 c
13163  if(iabc==1) then !are there any axisym bc's
13164  do i=1,idflx/nsd
13165  do j=1,2
13166  istrt=j+(i-1)*(nflow-1)
13167  uv(:,j)=qres(:,istrt)
13168  enddo
13169  call rotabc(uv, ibc, 'in ')
13170  do j=1,2
13171  istrt=j+(i-1)*(nflow-1)
13172  qres(:,istrt)=uv(:,j)
13173  enddo
13174  enddo
13175  endif
13176 c
13177 c
13178 c.... compute qi for node A, i.e., qres <-- qres/rmass
13179 c
13180  if (numpe > 1) then
13181  call commu(qres , ilwork, idflx , 'in ')
13182  call commu(rmass , ilwork, 1 , 'in ')
13183  endif
13184 c
13185 c take care of periodic boundary conditions
13186 c but not on surface tension terms in qres(:,10-12)
13187 c that are used to compute normal vector
13188 c
13189  idflow = (nflow-1)*nsd
13190  do j= 1,nshg
13191  if ((btest(ibc(j),10))) then
13192  i = iper(j)
13193  rmass(i) = rmass(i) + rmass(j)
13194 c qres(i,:) = qres(i,:) + qres(j,:)
13195  qres(i,1:idflow) = qres(i,1:idflow) + qres(j,1:idflow)
13196  endif
13197  enddo
13198 
13199  do j= 1,nshg
13200  if ((btest(ibc(j),10))) then
13201  i = iper(j)
13202  rmass(j) = rmass(i)
13203 c qres(j,:) = qres(i,:)
13204  qres(j,1:idflow) = qres(i,1:idflow)
13205  endif
13206  enddo
13207 c
13208 c.... invert the diagonal mass matrix and find q
13209 c
13210  rmass = one/rmass
13211 
13212  do i=1, idflx
13213  qres(:,i) = rmass*qres(:,i)
13214  enddo
13215  if (isurf .eq. 1) then
13216  idflow=(nflow-1)*nsd
13217 c
13218 c.... calculation of the unit normal vector
13219 c
13220  tmp = sqrt(qres(:,idflow+1)**2
13221  & + qres(:,idflow+2)**2
13222  & + qres(:,idflow+3)**2)
13223  do i = 1, nshg
13224  if (tmp(i) .lt. 0.0001) tmp(i) = 0.0001
13225  end do
13226  tmp = one/tmp
13227 
13228  do i=1, nsd
13229  qres(:,idflow+i) = tmp*qres(:,idflow+i)
13230  enddo
13231  endif
13232 
13233  if(numpe > 1) then
13234  call commu(qres, ilwork, idflx, 'out')
13235  endif
13236 
13237  if(iabc==1) then !are there any axisym bc's
13238 c
13239 c slave has masters value, for abc we need to rotate it
13240 c
13241  do i=1,idflx/nsd
13242  do j=1,2
13243  istrt=j+(i-1)*(nflow-1)
13244  uv(:,j)=qres(:,istrt)
13245  enddo
13246  call rotabc(uv, ibc, 'out')
13247  do j=1,2
13248  istrt=j+(i-1)*(nflow-1)
13249  qres(:,istrt)=uv(:,j)
13250  enddo
13251  enddo
13252  endif
13253 
13254 c
13255 c.... return
13256 c
13257  return
13258  end
13259 
13271 
13272  subroutine qpbcsclr( rmass, qres, iBC, iper, ilwork )
13273 c
13274  include "global.h"
13275  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
13276  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
13277  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
13278  include "common_blocks/fronts.h"
13279 C
13280 C Argument variables
13281 C
13282  INTEGER ibc, ilwork, iper
13283 C
13284  REAL*8 qres, rmass
13285 C
13286 C Local variables
13287 C
13288  INTEGER i, j
13289 C
13290  dimension rmass(nshg), qres(nshg,nsd),
13291  & ibc(nshg), iper(nshg),
13292  & ilwork(nlwork)
13293 
13294  if(iabc==1) !are there any axisym bc's
13295  & call rotabc(qres, ibc, 'in ')
13296 
13297 c
13298 c.... compute qi for node A, i.e., qres <-- qres/rmass
13299 c
13300  if (numpe > 1) then
13301  call commu(qres , ilwork, nsd , 'in ')
13302  call commu(rmass , ilwork, 1 , 'in ')
13303  endif
13304 
13305 c
13306 c take care of periodic boundary conditions
13307 c
13308  do j= 1,nshg
13309  if (btest(ibc(j),10)) then
13310  i = iper(j)
13311  rmass(i) = rmass(i) + rmass(j)
13312  qres(i,:) = qres(i,:) + qres(j,:)
13313  endif
13314  enddo
13315 
13316  do j= 1,nshg
13317  if (btest(ibc(j),10)) then
13318  i = iper(j)
13319  rmass(j) = rmass(i)
13320  qres(j,:) = qres(i,:)
13321  endif
13322  enddo
13323 c
13324 c.... invert the diagonal mass matrix and find q
13325 c
13326  rmass = one/rmass
13327 
13328  do i=1, nsd
13329  qres(:,i) = rmass*qres(:,i)
13330  enddo
13331 
13332  if(numpe > 1) then
13333  call commu(qres, ilwork, nsd, 'out')
13334  endif
13335 
13336  if(iabc==1) !are there any axisym bc's
13337  & call rotabc(qres, ibc, 'out')
13338 
13339 c
13340 c.... return
13341 c
13342  return
13343  end
13344 
13354 
13355  subroutine restar (code, q, ac)
13356 c
13357  use readarrays ! used to access qold, acold
13358 
13359  include "global.h"
13360  include "mpif.h"
13361  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
13362  include "common_blocks/mio.h"
13363  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
13364  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
13365 C
13366 C Argument variables
13367 C
13368  REAL*8 ac, q
13369 C
13370 C Local variables
13371 C
13372  INTEGER iqoldsiz
13373 C
13374  character*4 code
13375  character*8 mach2
13376  character*20 fname1, fmt1
13377  character*5 cname
13378  integer ioerr
13379 
13380 c
13381  dimension q(nshg,ndof),ac(nshg,ndof)
13382 c
13383 c.... --------------------------> 'in ' <---------------------------
13384 c
13385  if (code .eq. 'in ') then
13386 c
13387 c Incompressible orders velocity, pressure, temperature unlike compressible
13388 c which is what we have our files set up for
13389 c
13390  q(:,1:3)=qold(:,2:4)
13391  q(:,4)=qold(:,1)
13392  if(ndof.gt.4) q(:,5:ndof)=qold(:,5:ndof)
13393 
13394  ac(:,1:3)=acold(:,2:4)
13395  ac(:,4)=acold(:,1)
13396  if(ndof.gt.4) ac(:,5:ndof)=acold(:,5:ndof)
13397 
13398  deallocate(qold)
13399  deallocate(acold)
13400  return
13401  endif
13402 c
13403 c.... --------------------------> 'out ' <---------------------------
13404 c
13405  if (code .eq. 'out ') then
13406 
13407  allocate( qold(nshg,ndof) )
13408  allocate( acold(nshg,ndof) )
13409  acold=0
13410 c
13411  qold(:,2:4) = q(:,1:3)
13412  qold(:,1) = q(:,4)
13413  if(ndof.gt.4) qold(:,5:ndof) = q(:,5:ndof)
13414 c
13415  acold(:,2:4) = ac(:,1:3)
13416  acold(:,1) = ac(:,4)
13417  if(ndof.gt.4) acold(:,5:ndof) = ac(:,5:ndof)
13418 c
13419  iqoldsiz=nshg*ndof
13420  call write_restart(myrank, lstep, nshg, ndof,
13421  & qold, acold)
13422 
13423  if (myrank.eq.master) then
13424  open(unit=72,file='numstart.dat',status='old',iostat=ioerr)
13425  if (ioerr.eq.0) then
13426  write(72,*) lstep
13427  else
13428  write(*,*) 'IO_ERROR file: numstart.dat code: ',ioerr
13429  endif
13430  close(72)
13431  endif
13432  deallocate(qold)
13433  deallocate(acold)
13434  return
13435  endif
13436 c
13437 c.... ----------------------> Error Handling <-----------------------
13438 c
13439 c.... Error handling
13440 c
13441  call error('restar ',code//' ',0)
13442 c
13443 c.... file error handling
13444 c
13445 995 call error('restar ','opening ', irstin)
13446 996 call error('restar ','opening ', irstou)
13447 c
13448 c.... end
13449 c
13450  end
13451 
13464 
13465  subroutine rotabc (global, iBC, code)
13466 c
13467  use specialbc ! gives us acs, contains (:,1)=cos(theta) (:,2)=sin(theta)
13468 
13469  include "global.h"
13470  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
13471 c
13472 c Argument variables
13473 c
13474  INTEGER ibc
13475 c
13476  REAL*8 global
13477 c
13478 c Local variables
13479 c
13480  REAL*8 tmp
13481 c
13482  dimension global(nshg,2), ibc(nshg),
13483  & tmp(nshg)
13484 
13485  character*3 code
13486 
13487  if (code .eq. 'in ') then
13488  where( btest(ibc,10))
13489  tmp = global(:,1)*acs(:,1) - global(:,2)*acs(:,2)
13490  global(:,2) = global(:,1)*acs(:,2) + global(:,2)*acs(:,1)
13491  global(:,1) = tmp
13492  endwhere
13493  else if (code .eq. 'out') then
13494  where( btest(ibc,10))
13495  tmp = global(:,1)*acs(:,1) + global(:,2)*acs(:,2)
13496  global(:,2) = -global(:,1)*acs(:,2) + global(:,2)*acs(:,1)
13497  global(:,1) = tmp
13498  endwhere
13499  else
13500  call error('rotabc ','code ',0)
13501  endif
13502 
13503  return
13504  end
13505 
13515 
13516  subroutine rstatic (res, y, Dy)
13517 c
13518  use residualcontrol
13519 
13520  include "global.h"
13521  include "mpif.h"
13522  include "auxmpi.h"
13523  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
13524  include "common_blocks/extrat.h"
13525  include "common_blocks/incomp.h"
13526  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
13527  include "common_blocks/mio.h"
13528  include "common_blocks/mioname.h"
13529  include "common_blocks/newdim.h"
13530  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
13531  include "common_blocks/resdat.h"
13532  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
13533  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
13534 C
13535 C Argument variables
13536 C
13537  REAL*8 res
13538 C
13539 C Local variables
13540 C
13541  INTEGER i, ierr, intsec
13542  INTEGER irecvcount, jresmx, jtotrs
13543  INTEGER mproc, nrsmax
13544 C
13545  REAL*8 cputme
13546  REAL*8 rdy1, rdy2, rdy4
13547  REAL*8 rdy5, resmax, resmaxl, resnrm
13548  REAL*8 resvec, rmaxdyp, rmaxdyu, rtmp
13549  REAL*8 rvec, totres
13550 C
13551  dimension res(nshg,nflow), mproc(1), rvec(numpe)
13552  dimension rtmp(nshg), nrsmax(1)
13553  dimension irecvcount(numpe), resvec(numpe)
13554 
13555  real*8 y(nshg,ndof), dy(nshg,4)
13556  integer tmrc
13557  integer ioerr
13558 c
13559 c.... compute max delta y
13560 c
13561  rdy1 = zero
13562  rdy2 = zero
13563  rdy4 = zero
13564  rdy5 = zero
13565  call sumgatn( abs(gami*delt(itseq)
13566  & * dy(1:numnp,1:3)),3,rdy1, numnp)
13567  call sumgatn( abs( y(1:numnp,1:3)),3,rdy2,numnp)
13568  call sumgatn( abs(gami*alfi*delt(itseq)
13569  & * dy(1:numnp,4)),1,rdy4,numnp)
13570  call sumgatn( abs( y(1:numnp,4)), 1,rdy5,numnp)
13571  rmaxdyu = rdy1/rdy2
13572  rmaxdyp = rdy4/rdy5
13573 
13574 c
13575 c..... Signal to quit if delta is very small. look in itrdrv.f for the
13576 c completion of the hack.
13577 c
13578  if( rmaxdyu .lt. dtol(1) .and. rmaxdyp .lt. dtol(2)) then
13579  istop = 1000
13580  endif
13581 
13582  if (numpe == 1) nshgt=nshg ! global = this processor
13583 c
13584 c.... -----------------------> Convergence <-------------------------
13585 c
13586 c.... compute the maximum residual and the corresponding node number
13587 c
13588  rtmp = zero
13589  if (impl(itseq) .ge. 9) then
13590  do i = 1, nflow
13591  rtmp = rtmp + res(:,i)**2 ! only add continuity and momentum
13592  enddo
13593  endif
13594 
13595  call sumgat(rtmp, 1, resnrm)
13596 
13597  resmaxl = maxval(rtmp)
13598 
13599  irecvcount = 1
13600  resvec = resmaxl
13601  if (numpe > 1) then
13602  call mpi_reduce_scatter(resvec, resmax, irecvcount,
13603  & mpi_double_precision, mpi_max, mpi_comm_world, ierr)
13604  if (resmax .eq. resvec(1) ) then
13605  mproc(1) = myrank
13606  nrsmax = maxloc(rtmp)
13607  else
13608  nrsmax(1) = -1
13609  mproc(1) = -1
13610  endif
13611 c BUG FIX - DES - 30JAN2014
13612  resvec = nrsmax(1)
13613  call mpi_reduce_scatter(resvec, rvec, irecvcount,
13614  & mpi_double_precision, mpi_max, mpi_comm_world, ierr)
13615  nrsmax = rvec(1)
13616 c BUG FIX - DES - 30JAN2014
13617  resvec = mproc(1)
13618  call mpi_reduce_scatter(resvec, rvec, irecvcount,
13619  & mpi_double_precision, mpi_max, mpi_comm_world, ierr)
13620  mproc = rvec(1)
13621  else
13622  resmax = resmaxl
13623  nrsmax = maxloc(rtmp)
13624  mproc(1) = 0
13625  endif
13626 c
13627 c.... correct the residuals
13628 c
13629  if (loctim(itseq) .eq. 0) then
13630  resnrm = resnrm
13631  resmax = resmax
13632  else
13633  resnrm = resnrm
13634  resmax = resmax
13635  endif
13636 c
13637 c.... approximate the number of entries
13638 c
13639  totres = resnrm / float(nshgt)
13640  totres = sqrt(totres)
13641  resmax = sqrt(resmax)
13642  if (resfrt .eq. zero) resfrt = totres
13643  jtotrs = int( 10.d0 * log10( totres / resfrt ) )
13644  jresmx = int( 10.d0 * log10( resmax / totres ) )
13645 
13646  if(rescontrol .gt. 0) then
13647  controlresidual = totres
13648  currentiter = currentiter + 1
13649  endif
13650 c
13651 c.... get the CPU-time
13652 c
13653 CAD cputme = (second(0) - ttim(100))
13654  intsec=tmrc()
13655  cputme = (intsec - ttim(100))
13656 c
13657 c.... output the result
13658 c
13659  if (numpe > 1) call mpi_barrier(mpi_comm_world, ierr)
13660 
13661  if (myrank .eq. master) then
13662 c
13663 c.... results of continuity and momentum
13664 c
13665  print 2000, lstep+1, cputme, totres, jtotrs, rmaxdyu,
13666  & rmaxdyp,nrsmax,
13667  & mproc(1)+1, jresmx, int(statsflow(4)),
13668  & int(statsflow(1))
13669  open (unit=ihist, file=fhist, status='unknown',
13670  & access='append',iostat=ioerr)
13671  if (ioerr.eq.0) then
13672  write (ihist,2000) lstep+1, cputme, totres, jtotrs,
13673  & rmaxdyu, rmaxdyp, nrsmax,
13674  & mproc(1)+1,jresmx,int(statsflow(4)),
13675  & int(statsflow(1))
13676  else
13677  write(*,*) 'IO_ERROR file: ',fhist,' code: ',ioerr
13678  endif
13679  close (ihist)
13680  endif
13681  if(numpe>1) call mpi_barrier(mpi_comm_world,ierr)
13682 c
13683 c.... return
13684 c
13685  return
13686 c
13687  1000 format(1p,i6,5e13.5)
13688  2000 format(1p,i6,e10.3,e10.3,2x,'(',i4,')',2x,e10.3,2x,e10.3,
13689  & 2x,'<',i6,'-',i2,'|',
13690  & i4,'>', ' [', i4,' -',i4,']')
13691  3000 format(1p,i6,e10.3,e10.3,3x,'(',i4,')',3x,'<',i6,'-',i2,'|',
13692  & i4,'>', ' [', i4,' -',i4,' -',i4,']')
13693 
13694 c
13695  end
13696 
13698 
13699  subroutine rstaticsclr (res, y, Dy, icomp)
13700 c
13701  include "global.h"
13702  include "mpif.h"
13703  include "auxmpi.h"
13704  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
13705  include "common_blocks/extrat.h"
13706  include "common_blocks/incomp.h"
13707  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
13708  include "common_blocks/matdat.h"
13709  include "common_blocks/mio.h"
13710  include "common_blocks/mioname.h"
13711  include "common_blocks/newdim.h"
13712  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
13713  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
13714 C
13715 C Argument variables
13716 C
13717  INTEGER icomp
13718 C
13719  REAL*8 res
13720 C
13721 C Local variables
13722 C
13723  INTEGER intsec, ioerr
13724 C
13725  REAL*8 cputme, rdy1, rdy2
13726  REAL*8 resnrm, rmaxdyt, rtmp, totres
13727 C
13728  dimension res(nshg)
13729  dimension rtmp(nshg)
13730  real*8 y(nshg,ndof), dy(nshg), nrm
13731  integer tmrc
13732 c
13733 c.... compute max delta y
13734 c
13735  rdy1 = zero
13736  rdy2 = zero
13737 c
13738 c.... normalize turbulence with molecular viscosity
13739 c
13740  nrm = zero
13741  call sumgat( abs(gami*delt(itseq)*dy(:)),1,rdy1)
13742  call sumgat( abs( y(:,icomp)),1,rdy2)
13743  rmaxdyt = rdy1/(rdy2+nrm)
13744 c
13745 c.... compute the maximum residual and the corresponding node number
13746 c
13747  rtmp = zero
13748  rtmp = rtmp + res**2 ! add temperature also
13749  call sumgat(rtmp, 1, resnrm)
13750 
13751  if (numpe == 1) nshgt=nshg ! global = this processor
13752 
13753  totres = resnrm / float(nshgt)
13754  totres = sqrt(totres)
13755 
13756 c if (mod(impl(1),100)/10 .eq. 0) then !not solving flow
13757  if (myrank .eq. master) then
13758 c
13759 c.... get the CPU-time
13760 c
13761  intsec=tmrc()
13762  cputme = (intsec - ttim(100))
13763 
13764  print 802, lstep+1, cputme, totres, rmaxdyt,
13765  & int(statssclr(1))
13766  open (unit=ihist, file=fhist, status='unknown',iostat=ioerr)
13767  if (ioerr.eq.0) then
13768  write (ihist,802) lstep+1, cputme, totres,
13769  & rmaxdyt,int(statssclr(1))
13770  else
13771  write(*,*) 'IO_ERROR file: ',fhist,' code: ',ioerr
13772  endif
13773  close(ihist)
13774  endif
13775 c else
13776 c if (myrank .eq. master) then
13777 c print 803, totres, rmaxdyT, int(statssclr(1))
13778 c write(ihist,803) totres, rmaxdyT, int(statssclr(1))
13779 c endif
13780 c endif
13781 
13782  return
13783 
13784  802 format(1p,i6,e10.3,e10.3,10x,e10.3,31x'[',i6,']')
13785  803 format(1p,16x,e10.3,10x,e10.3,31x,'[',i10,']')
13786 
13787  end
13788 
13828 
13829  subroutine solflow(y, ac, u,
13830  & yold, acold, uold,
13831  & x, ibc,
13832  & bc, res,
13833  & npermdims, ntmpdims, aperm,
13834  & atemp, iper,
13835  & ilwork, shp, shgl,
13836  & shpb, shglb, rowp,
13837  & colm, lhsk, lhsp,
13838  & solinc, rerr, sumtime,
13839  & svls_lhs, svls_ls, svls_nfaces)
13840  use pointer_data
13841  use lagrangemultipliers
13842 c
13843  include "global.h"
13844  include "mpif.h"
13845  include "auxmpi.h"
13846  include "svLS.h"
13847  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
13848  include "common_blocks/fronts.h"
13849  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
13850  include "common_blocks/incomp.h"
13851  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
13852  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
13853  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
13854  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
13855  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
13856 
13857 C
13858 C Argument variables
13859 C
13860  INTEGER npermdims
13861  INTEGER ntmpdims
13862 C
13863 C Local variables
13864 C
13865  INTEGER lesid
13866 C
13867  REAL*8 rdtmp
13868 C
13869  TYPE(svls_lhstype) svls_lhs
13870  TYPE(svls_lstype) svls_ls
13871 
13872  real*8 y(nshg,ndof), ac(nshg,ndof),
13873  & yold(nshg,ndof), acold(nshg,ndof),
13874  & u(nshg,nsd), uold(nshg,nsd),
13875  & x(numnp,nsd), bc(nshg,ndofbc),
13876  & res(nshg,nflow),
13877  & flowdiag(nshg,4),
13878  & aperm(nshg,npermdims), atemp(nshg,ntmpdims),
13879  & sclrdiag(nshg,1),
13880  & lhsk(9,nnz_tot), lhsp(4,nnz_tot)
13881 c
13882  real*8 shp(maxtop,maxsh,maxqpt),
13883  & shgl(maxtop,nsd,maxsh,maxqpt),
13884  & shpb(maxtop,maxsh,maxqpt),
13885  & shglb(maxtop,nsd,maxsh,maxqpt)
13886 c
13887  integer usr(100), eqntype,
13888  & rowp(nshg*nnz), colm(nshg+1),
13889  & ibc(nshg), ilwork(nlwork),
13890  & iper(nshg)
13891 c
13892  real*8 yalpha(nshg,ndof), acalpha(nshg,ndof),
13893  & ualpha(nshg,nsd),
13894  & lesp(nshg,4), lesq(nshg,4),
13895  & solinc(nshg,ndof)
13896 
13897  real*8 rerr(nshg,10), rtmp(nshg,4)
13898  REAL*8 sumtime
13899  INTEGER dof, svls_nfaces, i, j, k, l
13900  INTEGER, ALLOCATABLE :: incl(:)
13901  REAL*8, ALLOCATABLE :: faceres(:), res4(:,:), val4(:,:)
13902 c
13903 c.... *******************>> Element Data Formation <<******************
13904 c
13905 c
13906 c.... set the parameters for flux and surface tension calculations
13907 c
13908 c
13909  idflx = 0
13910  if(idiff >= 1 ) idflx= (nflow-1) * nsd
13911  if (isurf == 1) idflx=nflow*nsd
13912 c
13913 c.... compute solution at n+alpha
13914 c
13915  call itryalpha( uold, yold, acold,
13916  & u, y, ac,
13917  & ualpha, yalpha, acalpha)
13918 
13919 c
13920 c.... form the LHS matrices, the residual vector (at alpha)
13921 c
13922  call elmgmr(ualpha, yalpha, acalpha, x,
13923  & shp, shgl, ibc,
13924  & bc, shpb, shglb,
13925  & res, iper, ilwork,
13926  & rowp, colm, lhsk,
13927  & lhsp, rerr)
13928 
13929 
13930  IF (svlsflag .EQ. 1) THEN
13931 
13932 c####################################################################
13933 ! Here calling svLS
13934 
13935  ALLOCATE(faceres(svls_nfaces), incl(svls_nfaces))
13936  CALL addelmpvsqforsvls(faceres, svls_nfaces)
13937 
13938  incl = 1
13939  dof = 4
13940  IF (.NOT.ALLOCATED(res4)) THEN
13941  ALLOCATE (res4(dof,nshg), val4(dof*dof,nnz_tot))
13942  END IF
13943 
13944  DO i=1, nshg
13945  res4(1:dof,i) = res(i,1:dof)
13946  END DO
13947 
13948  DO i=1, nnz_tot
13949  val4(1:3,i) = lhsk(1:3,i)
13950  val4(5:7,i) = lhsk(4:6,i)
13951  val4(9:11,i) = lhsk(7:9,i)
13952  val4(13:15,i) = lhsp(1:3,i)
13953  val4(16,i) = lhsp(4,i)
13954  END DO
13955 
13956  !Val4(4:12:4,:) = -lhsP(1:3,:)^t
13957  DO i=1, nshg
13958  Do j=colm(i), colm(i+1) - 1
13959  k = rowp(j)
13960  DO l=colm(k), colm(k+1) - 1
13961  IF (rowp(l) .EQ. i) THEN
13962  val4(4:12:4,l) = -lhsp(1:3,j)
13963  EXIT
13964  END IF
13965  END DO
13966  END DO
13967  END DO
13968  CALL svls_solve(svls_lhs, svls_ls, dof, res4, val4, incl,
13969  2 faceres)
13970 
13971  DO i=1, nshg
13972  solinc(i,1:dof) = res4(1:dof,i)
13973  END DO
13974 
13975 c####################################################################
13976  ELSE
13977 c
13978 c.... lesSolve : main matrix solver
13979 c
13980  lesid = numeqns(1)
13981  eqntype = 1
13982 c
13983 c.... setup the linear algebra solver
13984 c
13985  rtmp = res(:,1:4)
13986  call usrnew( usr, eqntype, aperm,
13987  & atemp, rtmp, solinc,
13988  & flowdiag, sclrdiag, lesp,
13989  & lesq, ibc, bc,
13990  & iper, ilwork, numpe,
13991  & nshg, nshl, npermdims,
13992  & ntmpdims, rowp, colm,
13993  & lhsk, lhsp, rdtmp,
13994  & nnz_tot )
13995 c
13996 c.... solve linear system
13997 c
13998  call myflessolve( lesid, usr )
13999  call getsol( usr, solinc )
14000 
14001  if (numpe > 1) then
14002  call commu( solinc, ilwork, nflow, 'out')
14003  endif
14004 
14005  if(lagrange .gt. zero) then
14006  call calcnanblagrange(colm, rowp, solinc(:,1:3))
14007  call lagmultiplymatrix(solinc, 0, nsrflistlagrange,
14008  & numlagrangesrfs)
14009  lagincr(:,1:3) = (- resl(:,1:3) - addlag(:,1:3) )
14010  & /scalefactor(1,1)/alfi/gami/two
14011  endif
14012 
14013  END IF
14014 
14015  call rstatic(res, y, solinc) ! output flow stats
14016 c
14017 c.... end
14018 c
14019  return
14020  end
14021 
14042 
14043  subroutine solsclr(y, ac, u,
14044  & yold, acold, uold,
14045  & x, ibc,
14046  & bc, npermdimss, ntmpdimss,
14047  & aperms, atemps, iper,
14048  & ilwork, shp, shgl,
14049  & shpb, shglb, rowp,
14050  & colm, lhss, solinc)
14051 c
14052  use pointer_data
14053 
14054  include "global.h"
14055  include "mpif.h"
14056  include "auxmpi.h"
14057  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
14058  include "common_blocks/fronts.h"
14059  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
14060  include "common_blocks/incomp.h"
14061  include "common_blocks/sclrs.h"
14062  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
14063  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
14064 
14065 C
14066 C Argument variables
14067 C
14068  INTEGER npermdimss, ntmpdimss
14069 C
14070 C Local variables
14071 C
14072  INTEGER lesid, nsolsc
14073 C
14074  REAL*8 rlhsk, rlhsp
14075 C
14076  real*8 y(nshg,ndof), ac(nshg,ndof),
14077  & yold(nshg,ndof), acold(nshg,ndof),
14078  & u(nshg,nsd), uold(nshg,nsd),
14079  & x(numnp,nsd), bc(nshg,ndofbc),
14080  & res(nshg,1),
14081  & flowdiag(nshg,4),
14082  & sclrdiag(nshg,1), lhss(nnz_tot),
14083  & aperms(nshg,npermdimss), atemps(nshg,ntmpdimss)
14084 
14085 c
14086  real*8 shp(maxtop,maxsh,maxqpt),
14087  & shgl(maxtop,nsd,maxsh,maxqpt),
14088  & shpb(maxtop,maxsh,maxqpt),
14089  & shglb(maxtop,nsd,maxsh,maxqpt)
14090 c
14091  integer usr(100), eqntype,
14092  & rowp(nshg*nnz), colm(nshg+1),
14093  & ibc(nshg), ilwork(nlwork),
14094  & iper(nshg)
14095 c
14096  real*8 yalpha(nshg,ndof), acalpha(nshg,ndof),
14097  & ualpha(nshg,nsd),
14098  & lesp(nshg,1), lesq(nshg,1),
14099  & solinc(nshg,1)
14100 
14101 c
14102 c.... *******************>> Element Data Formation <<******************
14103 c
14104 c.... compute solution at n+alpha
14105 c
14106  call itryalpha( uold, yold, acold,
14107  & u, y, ac,
14108  & ualpha, yalpha, acalpha)
14109 c
14110 c.... form the LHS matrices, the residual vector (at alpha)
14111 c
14112  call elmgmrsclr(yalpha,acalpha, x,
14113  & shp, shgl, ibc,
14114  & bc, shpb, shglb,
14115  & res, iper, ilwork,
14116  & rowp, colm, lhss )
14117 
14118 c
14119 c.... lesSolve : main matrix solver
14120 c
14121  lesid = numeqns(1+nsolt+isclr)
14122  eqntype = 2
14123 c
14124 c.... setup the linear algebra solver
14125 c
14126  call usrnew( usr, eqntype, aperms,
14127  & atemps, res, solinc,
14128  & flowdiag, sclrdiag, lesp,
14129  & lesq, ibc, bc,
14130  & iper, ilwork, numpe,
14131  & nshg, nshl, npermdimss,
14132  & ntmpdimss, rowp, colm,
14133  & rlhsk, rlhsp, lhss,
14134  & nnz_tot )
14135 c
14136 c.... solve linear system
14137 c
14138  call myflessolve( lesid, usr )
14139  call getsol( usr, solinc )
14140 
14141  if (numpe > 1) then
14142  call commu( solinc, ilwork, 1, 'out')
14143  endif
14144 
14145  nsolsc=5+isclr
14146  call rstaticsclr(res, y, solinc, nsolsc) ! output scalar stats
14147 c
14148 c.... end
14149 c
14150  return
14151  end
14152 
14154 
14155  subroutine initstats(x, iBC, iper, ilwork)
14156 c
14157  use stats
14158 
14159  include "global.h"
14160  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
14161  include "common_blocks/fronts.h"
14162  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
14163  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
14164 
14165  real*8 x(numnp,3)
14166  integer ilwork(nlwork), iper(nshg), ibc(nshg)
14167 
14168  if (ipord .eq. 1) then
14169  ststype = 1
14170  else
14171  ststype = 2
14172  endif
14173 
14174  stswritefreq = 200
14175 
14176  nresdims = 11
14177  nsoldims = 10
14178  nlhsdims = 19
14179 
14180  allocate ( stsvec(nshg,nresdims) )
14181 
14182  if (ststype .eq. 1) then
14183  allocate ( stsreg(nshg) )
14184  allocate ( stsminv(nshg,6) )
14185  allocate ( stsb(nshg,3) )
14186  allocate ( stsdinv(nshg,3) )
14187  allocate ( stscinv(nshg,6) )
14188  endif
14189 
14190  allocate ( stspres(nshg) )
14191  allocate ( stspressqr(nshg) )
14192  allocate ( stsvel(nshg,3) )
14193  allocate ( stsvelsqr(nshg,6) )
14194  allocate ( stsvelreg(nshg,3) )
14195  allocate ( stsstress(nshg,6) )
14196 
14197  stspres = 0.0
14198  stspressqr = 0.0
14199  stsvel = 0.0
14200  stsvelsqr = 0.0
14201  stsvelreg = 0.0
14202  stsstress = 0.0
14203 
14204  step1 = lstep+1
14205  ntimestep = 0
14206  stsresflg = 0
14207 
14208  if (ststype .eq. 1) then
14209  call elmstatslhs( x, ibc, iper, ilwork )
14210  call stsinitlhs( nshg )
14211  endif
14212 
14213  return
14214  end
14215 
14218 
14219  subroutine stsinitlhs(nshg)
14220 
14221  use stats
14222  integer nshg
14223 
14224  real*8 res(nresdims), reg, det, r0, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5,
14225  & d0, d1, d2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5
14226  integer i
14227 
14228 c
14229 c.... build the regularization
14230 c
14231  do i = 1, nshg
14232  res = stsvec(i,:)
14233  reg = res(1) * res(2) * res(3)
14234  det = res(1) * (res(2) * res(3) - res(5) * res(5))
14235  & + res(4) * (res(5) * res(6) - res(4) * res(3))
14236  & + res(6) * (res(4) * res(5) - res(2) * res(6))
14237 
14238  if ( det .gt. 1.d-10*reg .and. reg .ne. 0 ) then
14239  stsreg(i) = 0
14240  else
14241  stsreg(i) = (res(1) + res(2) + res(3)) / 1000.
14242  endif
14243  enddo
14244 
14245 c
14246 c.... form M and factorize
14247 c
14248  do i = 1, nshg
14249  res = stsvec(i,:)
14250  reg = stsreg(i)
14251  r0 = res(1) + reg
14252  r1 = res(2) + reg
14253  r2 = res(3) + reg
14254  r3 = res(4)
14255  r4 = res(5)
14256  r5 = res(6)
14257 
14258  det = r0 * (r1 * r2 - r4 * r4)
14259  & + r3 * (r4 * r5 - r3 * r2)
14260  & + r5 * (r3 * r4 - r1 * r5)
14261  det = 1.0/det
14262 
14263  stsminv(i,1) = det * (r1 * r2 - r4 * r4)
14264  stsminv(i,2) = det * (r0 * r2 - r5 * r5)
14265  stsminv(i,3) = det * (r0 * r1 - r3 * r3)
14266  stsminv(i,4) = det * (r4 * r5 - r2 * r3)
14267  stsminv(i,5) = det * (r3 * r5 - r0 * r4)
14268  stsminv(i,6) = det * (r3 * r4 - r1 * r5)
14269  enddo
14270 
14271 c
14272 c.... form B, DInv and CInv
14273 c
14274  do i = 1, nshg
14275  res = stsvec(i,:)
14276  reg = stsreg(i)
14277  r0 = res(1)
14278  r1 = res(2)
14279  r2 = res(3)
14280  r3 = res(4)
14281  r4 = res(5)
14282  r5 = res(6)
14283  d0 = 1. / ( reg + r0 )
14284  d1 = 1. / ( reg + r1 )
14285  d2 = 1. / ( reg + r2 )
14286  stsdinv(i,1) = d0
14287  stsdinv(i,2) = d1
14288  stsdinv(i,3) = d2
14289  stsb(i,1) = r3
14290  stsb(i,2) = r4
14291  stsb(i,3) = r5
14292  c0 = r0 + r1 - r3 * r3 * (d0 + d1) + reg
14293  c1 = r1 + r2 - r4 * r4 * (d1 + d2) + reg
14294  c2 = r2 + r0 - r5 * r5 * (d2 + d0) + reg
14295  c3 = r5 - r3 * r4 * d1
14296  c4 = r3 - r4 * r5 * d2
14297  c5 = r4 - r5 * r3 * d0
14298  det = c0 * (c1 * c2 - c4 * c4)
14299  & + c3 * (c4 * c5 - c3 * c2)
14300  & + c5 * (c3 * c4 - c1 * c5)
14301  det = 1. / det
14302  stscinv(i,1) = det * (c1 * c2 - c4 * c4)
14303  stscinv(i,2) = det * (c0 * c2 - c5 * c5)
14304  stscinv(i,3) = det * (c0 * c1 - c3 * c3)
14305  stscinv(i,4) = det * (c4 * c5 - c2 * c3)
14306  stscinv(i,5) = det * (c3 * c5 - c0 * c4)
14307  stscinv(i,6) = det * (c3 * c4 - c1 * c5)
14308  enddo
14309 
14310  return
14311  end
14312 
14314 
14315  subroutine stsgetstats( y, yold, ac, acold,
14316  & u, uold, x,
14317  & shp, shgl, shpb, shglb,
14318  & ibc, bc, iper, ilwork,
14319  & rowp, colm, lhsk, lhsp )
14320 
14321  use stats
14322 
14323  include "global.h"
14324  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
14325  include "common_blocks/fronts.h"
14326  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
14327  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
14328  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
14329  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
14330 C
14331 C Local variables
14332  REAL*8 reg
14333 C
14334  real*8 y(nshg,ndof), yold(nshg,ndof),
14335  & ac(nshg,ndof), acold(nshg,ndof),
14336  & u(nshg,nsd), uold(nshg,nsd),
14337  & shp(maxtop,maxsh,maxqpt), shgl(maxtop,nsd,maxsh,maxqpt),
14338  & shpb(maxtop,maxsh,maxqpt),
14339  & shglb(maxtop,nsd,maxsh,maxqpt),
14340  & bc(nshg,ndofbc), lhsk(9,nnz_tot),
14341  & lhsp(4,nnz_tot), x(numnp,nsd)
14342 
14343  integer ibc(nshg), iper(nshg),
14344  & ilwork(nlwork), rowp(nshg*nnz),
14345  & colm(nshg+1)
14346 
14347 
14348  real*8 yalpha(nshg,ndof), acalpha(nshg,ndof),
14349  & ualpha(nshg,nsd),
14350  & res(nresdims), minv(6),
14351  & dinv(3), b(3),
14352  & cinv(6)
14353 
14354  real*8 u1, u2, u3, r0, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, t3, t4, t5
14355 
14356  integer i
14357 
14358  ntimestep = ntimestep + 1
14359 c
14360 c.... compute solution at n+alpha
14361 c
14362  call itryalpha( uold, yold, acold,
14363  & u, y, ac,
14364  & ualpha, yalpha, acalpha)
14365 
14366 c
14367 c.... assemble the residual
14368 c
14369  if (ststype .eq. 1) then
14370  call elmstatsres( yalpha, acalpha, x, shp, shgl,
14371  & shpb, shglb, ibc, bc,
14372  & iper, ilwork, rowp, colm,
14373  & lhsk, lhsp )
14374 
14375 c
14376 c.... compute the statistics
14377 c
14378  do i = 1, nshg
14379  res = stsvec(i,:)
14380  reg = stsreg(i)
14381 
14382  minv = stsminv(i,:)
14383  dinv = stsdinv(i,:)
14384  b = stsb(i,:)
14385  cinv = stscinv(i,:)
14386 
14387  u1 = yalpha(i,1)
14388  u2 = yalpha(i,2)
14389  u3 = yalpha(i,3)
14390 
14391  stspres(i) = stspres(i) + y(i,4)
14392  stspressqr(i) = stspressqr(i) + y(i,4)*y(i,4)
14393 
14394  r0 = res(1) + reg * u1
14395  r1 = res(2) + reg * u2
14396  r2 = res(3) + reg * u3
14397 
14398  stsvel(i,1) = stsvel(i,1)
14399  & + minv(1) * r0 + minv(4) * r1 + minv(6) * r2
14400  stsvel(i,2) = stsvel(i,2)
14401  & + minv(4) * r0 + minv(2) * r1 + minv(5) * r2
14402  stsvel(i,3) = stsvel(i,3)
14403  & + minv(6) * r0 + minv(5) * r1 + minv(3) * r2
14404 
14405  stsvelreg(i,1) = stsvelreg(i,1) + u1
14406  stsvelreg(i,2) = stsvelreg(i,2) + u2
14407  stsvelreg(i,3) = stsvelreg(i,3) + u3
14408 
14409  r0 = res(1) * u1 + reg * u1 * u1
14410  r1 = res(2) * u2 + reg * u2 * u2
14411  r2 = res(3) * u3 + reg * u3 * u3
14412  r3 = res(1) * u2 + res(2) * u1 + reg * u2 * u1
14413  r4 = res(2) * u3 + res(3) * u2 + reg * u3 * u2
14414  r5 = res(3) * u1 + res(1) * u3 + reg * u1 * u3
14415  r0 = dinv(1) * r0
14416  r1 = dinv(2) * r1
14417  r2 = dinv(3) * r2
14418  r3 = r3 - b(1) * (r0 + r1)
14419  r4 = r4 - b(2) * (r1 + r2)
14420  r5 = r5 - b(3) * (r2 + r0)
14421  t3 = cinv(1) * r3 + cinv(4) * r4 + cinv(6) * r5
14422  t4 = cinv(4) * r3 + cinv(2) * r4 + cinv(5) * r5
14423  t5 = cinv(6) * r3 + cinv(5) * r4 + cinv(3) * r5
14424 
14425  stsvelsqr(i,1) = stsvelsqr(i,1)
14426  & + r0 - dinv(1) * (b(1) * t3 + b(3) * t5)
14427  stsvelsqr(i,2) = stsvelsqr(i,2)
14428  & + r1 - dinv(2) * (b(2) * t4 + b(1) * t3)
14429  stsvelsqr(i,3) = stsvelsqr(i,3)
14430  & + r2 - dinv(3) * (b(3) * t5 + b(2) * t4)
14431 
14432  stsvelsqr(i,4) = stsvelsqr(i,4) + t3
14433  stsvelsqr(i,5) = stsvelsqr(i,5) + t4
14434  stsvelsqr(i,6) = stsvelsqr(i,6) + t5
14435 
14436  r0 = res(4)
14437  r1 = res(5)
14438  r2 = res(6)
14439  r3 = res(7)
14440  r4 = res(8)
14441  r5 = res(9)
14442 
14443  r0 = dinv(1) * r0
14444  r1 = dinv(2) * r1
14445  r2 = dinv(3) * r2
14446 
14447  r3 = r3 - b(1) * (r0 + r1)
14448  r4 = r4 - b(2) * (r1 + r2)
14449  r5 = r5 - b(3) * (r2 + r0)
14450 
14451  t3 = cinv(1) * r3 + cinv(4) * r4 + cinv(6) * r5
14452  t4 = cinv(4) * r3 + cinv(2) * r4 + cinv(5) * r5
14453  t5 = cinv(6) * r3 + cinv(5) * r4 + cinv(3) * r5
14454 
14455  stsstress(i,1) = stsstress(i,1)
14456  & + r0 - dinv(1) * (b(1) * t3 + b(3) * t5)
14457  stsstress(i,2) = stsstress(i,2)
14458  & + r1 - dinv(2) * (b(2) * t4 + b(1) * t3)
14459  stsstress(i,3) = stsstress(i,3)
14460  & + r2 - dinv(3) * (b(3) * t5 + b(2) * t4)
14461  stsstress(i,4) = stsstress(i,4) + t3
14462  stsstress(i,5) = stsstress(i,5) + t4
14463  stsstress(i,6) = stsstress(i,6) + t5
14464  enddo
14465  else if (ststype .eq. 2) then
14466 
14467  call evalatinterp( yalpha, stsvec, x,
14468  & nresdims, nshape)
14469 
14470  do i = 1, nshg
14471 
14472  u1 = stsvec(i,1)
14473  u2 = stsvec(i,2)
14474  u3 = stsvec(i,3)
14475 
14476  stspres(i) = stspres(i) + stsvec(i,4)
14477  stspressqr(i) = stspressqr(i) + stsvec(i,4)*stsvec(i,4)
14478 
14479  stsvel(i,1) = stsvel(i,1) + u1
14480  stsvel(i,2) = stsvel(i,2) + u2
14481  stsvel(i,3) = stsvel(i,3) + u3
14482 
14483  stsvelsqr(i,1) = stsvelsqr(i,1) + u1*u1
14484  stsvelsqr(i,2) = stsvelsqr(i,2) + u2*u2
14485  stsvelsqr(i,3) = stsvelsqr(i,3) + u3*u3
14486  stsvelsqr(i,4) = stsvelsqr(i,4) + u1*u2
14487  stsvelsqr(i,5) = stsvelsqr(i,5) + u2*u3
14488  stsvelsqr(i,6) = stsvelsqr(i,6) + u3*u1
14489 
14490  stsstress(i,1) = stsstress(i,1) + stsvec(i,6)
14491  stsstress(i,2) = stsstress(i,2) + stsvec(i,7)
14492  stsstress(i,3) = stsstress(i,3) + stsvec(i,8)
14493  stsstress(i,4) = stsstress(i,4) + stsvec(i,9)
14494  stsstress(i,5) = stsstress(i,5) + stsvec(i,10)
14495  stsstress(i,6) = stsstress(i,6) + stsvec(i,11)
14496 
14497  enddo
14498  endif
14499 
14500  if ( mod(ntimestep,stswritefreq) .eq. 0 .or.
14501  & ntimestep .eq. nstep(itseq) ) then
14502  call stswritestats()
14503  endif
14504 
14505  return
14506  end
14507 
14509 
14510  subroutine stswritestats()
14511 
14512  use stats
14513 
14514  include "global.h"
14515  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
14516  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
14517  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
14518 
14519 
14520  integer iofile, step2, itmp1, itmp,iofile2
14521  character*30 fname, fmt1
14522  character*5 cname
14523  character*1 dash
14524  real*8 outvec(nshg,19)
14525 c
14526 c.... open the output file
14527 c
14528  iofile = 39
14529  step2 = lstep+1 ! current time step
14530  itmp = 1
14531  itmp1 = 1
14532  if (step1 .gt. 0) itmp = int(log10(float(step1)))+1
14533  if (step2 .gt. 0) itmp1 = int(log10(float(step2)))+1
14534  dash = '-'
14535  write (fmt1,
14536  & "('(''stats.'',i',i1,',a1,i',i1,',1x)')")
14537  & itmp,itmp1
14538  write (fname,fmt1) step1,dash,step2
14539  fname = trim(fname) // cname(myrank+1)
14540  open ( unit = iofile, file = fname, status = 'unknown',
14541  & form = 'unformatted')
14542 c
14543 c.... write the statistics
14544 c
14545  outvec(:,1) = stspres(:)
14546  outvec(:,2:4) = stsvel(:,:)
14547 c outvec(:,2:4) = stsVelReg(:,:)
14548  outvec(:,5) = zero ! later will be temperature
14549  outvec(:,6) = stspressqr(:)
14550  outvec(:,7:12) = stsvelsqr(:,:)
14551  outvec(:,13) = zero ! later wil be tempSqr
14552  outvec(:,14:19) = stsstress(:,:)
14553 
14554  write (iofile) numnp, nshg, ntimestep
14555  write (iofile) outvec(1:nshg,:)
14556  close (iofile)
14557 
14558  iofile2 = 40
14559 
14560  111 format(1p,3e24.16)
14561  112 format(1p, e24.16)
14562  113 format(1p,6e24.16)
14563 
14564  return
14565  end
14566 
14569 
14570  subroutine asbsclr (y, x, shpb, shglb,
14571  & ienb, materb, ibcb, bcb,
14572  & res)
14573  include "global.h"
14574  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
14575  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
14576  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
14577  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
14578  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
14579 
14580 c........................Declarations....................................
14581  INTEGER ienb,materb,ibcb
14582  REAL*8 shglb,shpb,x,y,bcb,res,rl,sgn,yl,xlb
14583 c................................................................
14584 
14585  dimension y(nshg,ndofl), x(numnp,nsd),
14586  & shpb(nshl,*),
14587  & shglb(nsd,nshl,*),
14588  & ienb(npro,nshl), materb(npro),
14589  & ibcb(npro,ndibcb), bcb(npro,nshlb,ndbcb),
14590  & res(nshg)
14591 c
14592  dimension yl(npro,nshl,ndofl), xlb(npro,nenl,nsd),
14593  & rl(npro,nshl), sgn(npro,nshl)
14594  real*8 dwl(npro,nshl)
14595 c
14596 c.... get the matrix of mode signs for the hierarchic basis functions
14597 c
14598  if (ipord .gt. 1) then
14599  call getsgn(ienb,sgn)
14600  endif
14601 c
14602 c.... gather the variables
14603 c
14604  call localy(y, yl, ienb, ndofl, 'gather ')
14605  call localx(x, xlb, ienb, nsd, 'gather ')
14606 c
14607 c.... get the boundary element residuals
14608 c
14609  rl = zero
14610 
14611  call e3bsclr(yl, ibcb, bcb, shpb, shglb,
14612  & xlb, rl, sgn, dwl)
14613 c
14614 c.... assemble the residual and the modified residual
14615 c
14616  call local(res, rl, ienb, 1, 'scatter ')
14617 c
14618 c.... end
14619 c
14620  return
14621  end
14622 
14625 
14626  subroutine asbpnabi ( x, shpb,
14627  & ienb, ibcb)
14628  use pvsqbi
14629  use lagrangemultipliers ! brings in face radius and center
14630  include "global.h"
14631  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
14632  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
14633  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
14634  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
14635  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
14636  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
14637  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
14638 c..............................Declaration.............................
14639  INTEGER ienb,ibcb,iel,iface,ipt3,k,lnode,n,nodlcl,i,m
14640  REAL*8 x,shpb,bnorm,dxdxib,rl,sgn,shdrv,shglb,shpfun,temp,temp1,
14641  &temp2,temp3,v1,v2
14642  REAL*8 wdetjb,xlb,rl2
14643 c.......................................................................
14644 c
14645  dimension xlb(npro,nenl,nsd), bnorm(npro,nsd),
14646  & rl(npro,nshl,nsd), wdetjb(npro),
14647  & rl2(npro,nshl,nsd,3)
14648 
14649  dimension x(numnp,nsd),
14650  & shpb(nshl,ngaussb), shglb(nsd,nshl,ngaussb),
14651  & ienb(npro,nshl),
14652  & ibcb(npro,ndibcb)
14653 
14654  dimension lnode(27), sgn(npro,nshl),
14655  & shpfun(npro,nshl), shdrv(npro,nsd,nshl)
14656 
14657 c
14658  dimension dxdxib(npro,nsd,nsd), temp(npro),
14659  & temp1(npro), temp2(npro),
14660  & temp3(npro),
14661  & v1(npro,nsd), v2(npro,nsd)
14662 c
14663  real*8 intpxlb(npro,3,nsd), intpdistance(npro,3),
14664  & intpprofile(npro,3)
14665  real*8 tmplaginplanevectors(3,3,0:maxsurf)
14666  real*8 tmplagprofilearea(0:maxsurf)
14667  real*8 tmpprofiledelta(0:maxsurf)
14668  real*8 inplane1, inplane2, inplane3, inplanenorm
14669  integer count
14670 c
14671 c.... get the matrix of mode signs for the hierarchic basis functions
14672 c
14673  if (ipord .gt. 1) then
14674  call getsgn(ienb,sgn)
14675  endif
14676 c
14677 c.... gather the variables
14678 c
14679  call localx(x, xlb, ienb, nsd, 'gather ')
14680 c
14681 c.... calculate quadrature points
14682 c
14683  intpxlb = zero
14684  intpdistance = zero
14685  intpprofile = zero
14686  if (lcsyst.ne.6) then
14687  do intp=1, 3 ! use 3 quadrature points
14688  do n=1, 3
14689  intpxlb(:,intp,:) = intpxlb(:,intp,:)
14690  & +xlb(:,n,:)*qptb(1,n,intp)
14691  enddo
14692  enddo
14693  else
14694  do intp=1, 3 ! use 3 quadrature points
14695  do n=1, 2
14696  intpxlb(:,intp,:) = intpxlb(:,intp,:)
14697  & +xlb(:,n,:)*qptb(1,n,intp)
14698  enddo
14699  intpxlb(:,intp,:) = intpxlb(:,intp,:)
14700  & +xlb(:,5,:)*qptb(1,3,intp)
14701  enddo
14702  endif
14703 c
14704 c.... calculate profile functions at quadrature points
14705 c
14706  do k=1, numlagrangesrfs
14707  do intp = 1, 3
14708  do iel=1, npro
14709  if (ibcb(iel,2) .eq. nsrflistlagrange(k)) then
14710  intpdistance(iel,intp)=sqrt(
14711  & (intpxlb(iel,intp,1)-lagcenter(1,k))**2+
14712  & (intpxlb(iel,intp,2)-lagcenter(2,k))**2+
14713  & (intpxlb(iel,intp,3)-lagcenter(3,k))**2)
14714  & /lagradius(k)
14715  intpprofile(iel,intp)=
14716  & (profileorder(k)+2)/profileorder(k)*
14717  & (1-intpdistance(iel,intp)**profileorder(k))
14718  endif
14719  enddo
14720  enddo
14721  enddo
14722 
14723 c
14724 c.... get the boundary element residuals
14725 c
14726  rl = zero
14727  rl2 = zero
14728  tmplagprofilearea = zero
14729  tmpprofiledelta = zero
14730  tmplaginplanevectors = zero
14731 c
14732 c.... compute the nodes which lie on the boundary (hierarchic)
14733 c
14734  call getbnodes(lnode)
14735 c
14736 c.... loop through the integration points
14737 c
14738  ngaussb = nintb(lcsyst)
14739 c
14740  do intp = 1, ngaussb
14741 c
14742 c.... get the hierarchic shape functions at this int point
14743 c
14744  shglb=zero ! protect debugger
14745  call getshpb(shpb, shglb, sgn,
14746  & shpfun, shdrv)
14747 
14748 c
14749 c.... compute the normal to the boundary. This is achieved by taking
14750 c the cross product of two vectors in the plane of the 2-d
14751 c boundary face.
14752 c
14753  if(lcsyst.ne.6) then
14754  ipt3=3
14755  else
14756  ipt3=5
14757  endif
14758  v1 = xlb(:,2,:) - xlb(:,1,:)
14759  v2 = xlb(:,ipt3,:) - xlb(:,1,:)
14760 c
14761 c.....The following are done in order to correct temp1..3
14762 c based on the results from compressible code. This is done only
14763 c for wedges, depending on the boundary face.(tri or quad)
14764 c
14765  if (lcsyst .eq. 1) then
14766  temp1 = v1(:,2) * v2(:,3) - v2(:,2) * v1(:,3)
14767  temp2 = v2(:,1) * v1(:,3) - v1(:,1) * v2(:,3)
14768  temp3 = v1(:,1) * v2(:,2) - v2(:,1) * v1(:,2)
14769  else
14770  temp1 = - v1(:,2) * v2(:,3) + v2(:,2) * v1(:,3)
14771  temp2 = - v2(:,1) * v1(:,3) + v1(:,1) * v2(:,3)
14772  temp3 = - v1(:,1) * v2(:,2) + v2(:,1) * v1(:,2)
14773  endif
14774 c
14775  temp = one / sqrt( temp1**2 + temp2**2 + temp3**2 )
14776  bnorm(:,1) = temp1 * temp
14777  bnorm(:,2) = temp2 * temp
14778  bnorm(:,3) = temp3 * temp
14779 c
14780  if (lcsyst .eq. 3) then
14781  wdetjb = (1 - qwtb(lcsyst,intp)) / (four*temp)
14782  elseif (lcsyst .eq. 4) then
14783  wdetjb = qwtb(lcsyst,intp) / temp
14784  else
14785  wdetjb = qwtb(lcsyst,intp) / (four*temp)
14786  endif
14787 c
14788  do iel=1,npro
14789  count = 0
14790  do k=1, numlagrangesrfs
14791  if (ibcb(iel,2) .eq. nsrflistlagrange(k)) then
14792  iface = ibcb(iel,2)
14793  ndsurf(ienb(iel,1:nshlb))=iface
14794  count = count+1
14795  endif
14796  enddo
14797  if (count .eq. 0) then
14798  bnorm(iel,:) = zero ! we want zeros where we are not integrating
14799  wdetjb(iel) = zero ! we want zeros where we are not integrating
14800  endif
14801  enddo
14802 c
14803 c Calculate two orthonormal in-plane vectors
14804 c |bnorm(iel,1) bnorm(iel,2) bnorm(iel,3) |
14805 c |v1(iel,1) v1(iel,2) v1(iel,3) |
14806 c x1 component: -v1(iel,2)*bnorm(iel,3)+v1(iel,3)*bnorm(iel,2)
14807 c x2 component: -v1(iel,3)*bnorm(iel,1)+v1(iel,1)*bnorm(iel,3)
14808 c x3 component: -v1(iel,1)*bnorm(iel,2)+v1(iel,2)*bnorm(iel,1)
14809 c
14810  do k=1, numlagrangesrfs
14811  do iel=1,npro
14812  if (ibcb(iel,2) .eq. nsrflistlagrange(k)) then
14813  tmplaginplanevectors(1:3,1,k)=bnorm(iel,1:3)
14814  tmplaginplanevectors(1:3,2,k)=v1(iel,1:3)
14815  & /sqrt(v1(iel,1)**2+v1(iel,2)**2+v1(iel,3)**2)
14816  inplane1=-v1(iel,2)*bnorm(iel,3)
14817  & +v1(iel,3)*bnorm(iel,2)
14818  inplane2=-v1(iel,3)*bnorm(iel,1)
14819  & +v1(iel,1)*bnorm(iel,3)
14820  inplane3=-v1(iel,1)*bnorm(iel,2)
14821  & +v1(iel,2)*bnorm(iel,1)
14822  inplanenorm=one
14823  & /sqrt(inplane1**2+inplane2**2+inplane3**2)
14824  tmplaginplanevectors(1,3,k)=inplane1*inplanenorm
14825  tmplaginplanevectors(2,3,k)=inplane2*inplanenorm
14826  tmplaginplanevectors(3,3,k)=inplane3*inplanenorm
14827  exit
14828  endif
14829  enddo
14830  enddo
14831 c
14832 c Now lets calculate Integral N_(a:e)^i n_i ProfileFunction d Gamma
14833 c
14834 c
14835  do n = 1, nshlb
14836  nodlcl = lnode(n)
14837  rl(:,nodlcl,1) = rl(:,nodlcl,1) + shpfun(:,nodlcl)
14838  & * bnorm(:,1)*intpprofile(:,intp)*wdetjb(:)
14839  rl(:,nodlcl,2) = rl(:,nodlcl,2) + shpfun(:,nodlcl)
14840  & * bnorm(:,2)*intpprofile(:,intp)*wdetjb(:)
14841  rl(:,nodlcl,3) = rl(:,nodlcl,3) + shpfun(:,nodlcl)
14842  & * bnorm(:,3)*intpprofile(:,intp)*wdetjb(:)
14843  enddo
14844 c
14845 c Now lets calculate Integral N_(a:e)^i n_i N_(b:e)^i n_i d Gamma
14846 c
14847 c
14848  do k=1, numlagrangesrfs
14849  do n = 1, nshlb
14850  nodlcl = lnode(n)
14851  do m=1, nsd
14852  rl2(:,nodlcl,m,1)=rl2(:,nodlcl,m,1)+
14853  & shpfun(:,nodlcl)*shpfun(:,nodlcl)*wdetjb(:)
14854  & *tmplaginplanevectors(m,1,k)
14855  & *tmplaginplanevectors(m,1,k)
14856  rl2(:,nodlcl,m,2)=rl2(:,nodlcl,m,2)+
14857  & shpfun(:,nodlcl)*shpfun(:,nodlcl)*wdetjb(:)
14858  & *tmplaginplanevectors(m,2,k)
14859  & *tmplaginplanevectors(m,2,k)
14860  rl2(:,nodlcl,m,3)=rl2(:,nodlcl,m,3)+
14861  & shpfun(:,nodlcl)*shpfun(:,nodlcl)*wdetjb(:)
14862  & *tmplaginplanevectors(m,3,k)
14863  & *tmplaginplanevectors(m,3,k)
14864  enddo
14865  enddo
14866  enddo
14867 
14868  do k=1, numlagrangesrfs
14869  do iel=1,npro
14870  if (ibcb(iel,2) .eq. nsrflistlagrange(k)) then
14871  tmplagprofilearea(k)=tmplagprofilearea(k)+
14872  & intpprofile(iel,intp)*wdetjb(iel)
14873  tmpprofiledelta(k)=tmpprofiledelta(k)+
14874  & intpprofile(iel,intp)**2*wdetjb(iel)
14875  endif
14876  enddo
14877  enddo
14878  enddo ! quadrature point loop
14879 c
14880 c.... assemble the PNABI vector
14881 c
14882  call local(pnabi, rl, ienb, 3, 'scatter ')
14883 c
14884 c.... assemble the NANBIJ vector
14885 c
14886  do i=1, 3
14887  call local(nanbij(:,:,i),rl2(:,:,:,i),ienb,3,'scatter ')
14888  enddo
14889 
14890  do k=1, numlagrangesrfs
14891  lagprofilearea(k)=lagprofilearea(k)+tmplagprofilearea(k)
14892  profiledelta(k)=profiledelta(k)+tmpprofiledelta(k)
14893  inplanenorm=sqrt(laginplanevectors(1,1,k)**2+
14894  & laginplanevectors(2,1,k)**2+laginplanevectors(3,1,k)**2)
14895  if (inplanenorm .eq. zero) then
14896  laginplanevectors(:,:,k)=tmplaginplanevectors(:,:,k)
14897  endif
14898  enddo
14899 c
14900  return
14901  end
14902 
14905 
14906  subroutine asigmrsclr(y, ac, x,
14907  & shp, shgl, ien,
14908  & res, qres, xsebe, xmudmi )
14909 
14910 
14911  include "global.h"
14912  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
14913  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
14914  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
14915  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
14916  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
14917  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
14918 
14919 c......................Declaration.....................................
14920 C Argument variables
14921 C
14922  INTEGER ien
14923 C
14924  REAL*8 ac, qres, res, shgl
14925  REAL*8 shp, x, y
14926 C
14927 C Local variables
14928 C
14929  REAL*8 sgn
14930 c......................................................................
14931  dimension y(nshg,ndofl), ac(nshg,ndofl),x(numnp,nsd),
14932  & shp(nshl,ngauss), shgl(nsd,nshl,ngauss),
14933  & ien(npro,nshl),res(nshg),
14934  & qres(nshg,nsd),sgn(npro,nshl)
14935 
14936 c
14937  real*8 yl(npro,nshl,ndofl), acl(npro,nshl,ndofl),
14938  & xl(npro,nenl,nsd),
14939  & rl(npro,nshl), ql(npro,nshl,nsd),
14940  & dwl(npro,nenl)
14941 c
14942  real*8 xsebe(npro,nshl,nshl), xmudmi(npro,ngauss)
14943 c
14944 c.... gather the variables
14945 c
14946 c.... get the matrix of mode signs for the hierarchic basis functions.
14947 c
14948  if (ipord .gt. 1) then
14949  call getsgn(ien,sgn)
14950  endif
14951 
14952  call localy(y, yl, ien, ndofl, 'gather ')
14953  call localy(ac, acl, ien, ndofl, 'gather ')
14954  call localx(x, xl, ien, nsd, 'gather ')
14955  call local(qres, ql, ien, nsd, 'gather ')
14956 c
14957 c.... zero the matrices if they are being recalculated
14958 c
14959  if (lhs. eq. 1) then
14960  xsebe = zero
14961  endif
14962 c
14963 c.... get the element residuals, LHS matrix, and preconditioner
14964 c
14965  rl = zero
14966  call e3sclr(yl, acl, shp,
14967  & shgl, xl, dwl,
14968  & rl, ql, xsebe,
14969  & sgn, xmudmi)
14970 c
14971 c.... assemble the residual
14972 c
14973  call local(res, rl, ien, 1, 'scatter ')
14974 c
14975 c.... end
14976 c
14977  return
14978  end
14979 
14980  subroutine initsponge( y,x)
14981 
14982  use specialbc
14983 
14984  include "global.h"
14985  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
14986  include "common_blocks/matdat.h"
14987  include "common_blocks/mmatpar.h"
14988  include "common_blocks/outpar.h"
14989 
14990 C Local variables
14991 C
14992  INTEGER id
14993 C
14994  REAL*8 bfz, ptarget, rad, radc
14995  REAL*8 radsqr, radst, radsts, rslc
14996  REAL*8 rsteep, ttarget
14997  REAL*8 utarget, vcl, we
14998  REAL*8 zstart, zval
14999 C
15000  real*8 y(nshg,nflow), x(numnp,3)
15001  allocate (ytarget(nshg,nflow))
15002 
15003  if(matflg(5,1).eq.5) then
15004  write(*,*) 'calculating IC sponge'
15005  ytarget = y
15006  else
15007  write(*,*) 'calculating Analytic sponge'
15008 
15009 c
15010 c OLD style sponge pushed onto target. You need to be sure that your
15011 c solver.inp entries for start and stop of sponge match as well as the
15012 c growth rates
15013 c
15014  vcl=datmat(1,5,1) ! velocity on centerline
15015  rslc=datmat(2,5,1) ! shear layer center radius
15016  bfz=datmat(3,5,1)
15017  we=3.0*29./682.
15018  rsteep=3.0
15019  zstart=30.0
15020  radst=10.0
15021  radsts=radst*radst
15022  do id=1,numnp
15023  radsqr=x(id,2)**2+x(id,1)**2
15024 c if((x(id,3).gt. zstart) .or. (radsqr.gt.radsts)) then
15025  rad=sqrt(radsqr)
15026  radc=max(rad,radst)
15027  zval=max(x(id,3),zstart)
15028  utarget=(tanh(rsteep*(rslc-rad))+one)/two*
15029  & (vcl-we) + we
15030  ttarget = press/(ro*rgas)
15031  ptarget= press
15032  ytarget(id,1) = zero
15033  ytarget(id,2) = zero
15034  ytarget(id,3) = utarget
15035  ytarget(id,4) = ptarget
15036  ytarget(id,5) = ttarget
15037 c endif
15038  enddo
15039  endif
15040  return
15041  end
15042 
15044 
15045  subroutine initbct( x,lgmapping, iBC, BC )
15046 
15047  use specialbc
15048 
15049  include "global.h"
15050  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
15051  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
15052  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
15053  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
15054  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
15055 
15056  real*8 x(numnp,nsd), bc(nshg,ndofbc)
15057  integer ibc(numnp),lgmapping(numnp)
15058 
15059  if(any(ibits(ibc,3,3).eq.7)) then
15060  if (bctflag .eq. 0) then
15061  call initbctfromdat('bct.dat', x,lgmapping, ibc, bc )
15062 #if(VER_USE_VTK == 1)
15063  else if (bctflag .eq. 1) then
15064  call getnumfrombctvtp('bct.vtp'//char(0), ntv, nptsmax)
15065  call initbctfromvtp('bct.vtp', x, lgmapping, ibc, bc )
15066 #endif
15067  endif
15068  endif
15069 
15070  return
15071  end
15072 
15073  subroutine initbctfromdat(filename, x, lgmapping, iBC, BC )
15074 
15075  use specialbc
15076 
15077  include "global.h"
15078  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
15079  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
15080  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
15081  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
15082  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
15083  include "mpif.h"
15084 
15085 C Local variables
15086 C
15087  INTEGER i, ic, j, k
15088  INTEGER n, ntpts, ierr
15089 C
15090  REAL*8 x1, x2
15091  REAL*8 x3
15092 C
15093  character(len=*) filename
15094  real*8 x(numnp,nsd), bc(nshg,ndofbc), rj1,rj2,rj3,rj4,distd,epsd
15095  integer ibc(numnp),lgmapping(numnp)
15096  character*80 card
15097  real*8 distds
15098  real*8 dd
15099  integer global_node_id
15100 ! integer ioerr
15101 c
15102 c This one should be used for boundary layer meshes where bct.dat must
15103 c be given to greater precision than is currently being generated.
15104 c
15105 c epsd=1.0d-12 ! this is distance SQUARED to save square root
15106 
15107 c epsd=1.0d-8 ! this is distance SQUARED to save square root
15108  epsd=1.0d-6 ! new distance to avoid problems when using mm
15109 
15110  ic=0 !count the number on this processor
15111 
15112 c if(any(ibits(iBC,3,3).eq.7)) then
15113  if(myrank.eq.master) then
15114  write(*,*) ''
15115  write(*,'(A)') 'Opening '//filename
15116  endif
15117 c open(unit=567, file='bct.dat',status='old')
15118  open(unit=567, file=filename,action='READ',status='old')
15119  read (567,'(a80)') card
15120  read (card,*) ntv, nptsmax
15121 c read(567,*) ntv,nptsmax
15122  allocate (nbct(numnp))
15123  allocate (numbct(ntv))
15124  allocate (bct(ntv,nptsmax,4))
15125  do k=1,ntv
15126 
15127  if(bctmatchingflag.eq.0) then
15128  read(567,*) x1,x2,x3,ntpts
15129  else if (bctmatchingflag.eq.1) then
15130  read(567,*) x1,x2,x3,ntpts,global_node_id
15131  endif
15132 
15133  do i=1,numnp
15134  if(ibits(ibc(i),3,3) .eq.7) then
15135  if(bctmatchingflag.eq.0) then
15136 c
15137 c Find the point on the boundary (if it is on this processor)
15138 c that matches this point
15139 c
15140  dd= distds(x1,x2,x3,x(i,1),x(i,2),x(i,3))
15141  if(dd.lt.epsd) then
15142  ic=ic+1
15143  nbct(ic)=i ! the pointer to this point
15144  numbct(ic)=ntpts ! the number of time series
15145  do j=1,ntpts
15146 c read(567,*) BCt(ic,j,4),(BCt(ic,j,n),n=1,3)
15147  read(567,*) (bct(ic,j,n),n=1,4)
15148  enddo
15149  exit
15150  endif
15151  else if (bctmatchingflag.eq.1) then
15152  if(lgmapping(i).eq.global_node_id) then
15153  ic=ic+1
15154  nbct(ic)=i ! the pointer to this point
15155  numbct(ic)=ntpts ! the number of time series
15156  do j=1,ntpts
15157  read(567,*) (bct(ic,j,n),n=1,4)
15158  enddo
15159  exit
15160  endif
15161  endif
15162  endif
15163  enddo
15164  if(i.eq.numnp+1) then
15165 c
15166 c if we get here the point was not found. It must be on another
15167 c processor so we read past this record and move on
15168 c
15169  do j=1,ntpts
15170  read(567,*) rj1,rj2,rj3,rj4
15171  enddo
15172  endif
15173  enddo ! end of the loop over ntv
15174  bct(:,:,4)=bct(:,:,4)*bcttimescale
15175 c endif ! any 3 component nodes
15176  itvn=ic
15177  close(567)
15178  write(*,'(A,I3,A,I5,A)') ' Process rank(',myrank,') has ',ic,' bct nodes.'
15179 
15180  if (numpe > 1) call mpi_barrier(mpi_comm_world, ierr)
15181 
15182 ! open(unit=321, file='dat.dat',status='new',iostat=ioerr)
15183 !
15184 ! write(321,*)'ic= ',ic
15185 ! do i=1,ic
15186 ! write(321,*)'nBCt(',i,')= ',nBCt(i)
15187 ! enddo
15188 ! do i=1,ic
15189 ! write(321,*)'numBCt(',i,')= ',numBCt(i)
15190 ! enddo
15191 ! do i=1,ic
15192 ! do j=1,ntpts
15193 ! write(321,*)'BCt(',i,',',j,',all)= ',BCt(i,j,1),' ',
15194 ! & BCt(i,j,2),' ',BCt(i,j,3),' ',BCt(i,j,4)
15195 ! enddo
15196 ! enddo
15197 ! close(321)
15198 
15199  return
15200  end
15201 
15202 #if(VER_USE_VTK == 1)
15203  subroutine initbctfromvtp(filename, x, lgmapping, iBC, BC )
15204 
15205  use specialbc
15206 
15207  include "global.h"
15208  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
15209  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
15210  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
15211  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
15212  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
15213  include "mpif.h"
15214 
15215 C Local variables
15216 C
15217  INTEGER i, ic, j, k
15218  INTEGER n, ntpts, ierr
15219 C
15220  character(len=*) filename
15221  real*8 x(numnp,nsd), bc(nshg,ndofbc),distd,epsd
15222  integer ibc(numnp),lgmapping(numnp)
15223  real*8 distds
15224  real*8 dd
15225 
15226  real*8 x1(ntv), x2(ntv),x3(ntv)
15227 c real*8 v1(ntv,nptsmax),v2(ntv,nptsmax),v3(ntv,nptsmax)
15228 c real*8 v1(nptsmax,ntv),v2(nptsmax,ntv),v3(nptsmax,ntv)
15229  real*8 v1(nptsmax*ntv),v2(nptsmax*ntv),v3(nptsmax*ntv)
15230  real*8 ts(nptsmax)
15231  integer global_node_id(ntv)
15232 ! integer ioerr
15233 
15234  if(myrank.eq.master) then
15235  write(*,*) ''
15236  write(*,'(A)') 'Opening '//filename
15237  endif
15238  call getdatafrombctvtp(filename//char(0),x1,x2,x3,v1,v2,v3,
15239  & ts,global_node_id)
15240  ntpts=nptsmax
15241 c
15242 c This one should be used for boundary layer meshes where bct.dat must
15243 c be given to greater precision than is currently being generated.
15244 c
15245 c epsd=1.0d-12 ! this is distance SQUARED to save square root
15246 
15247 c epsd=1.0d-8 ! this is distance SQUARED to save square root
15248  epsd=1.0d-6 ! new distance to avoid problems when using mm
15249 
15250  ic=0 !count the number on this processor
15251 
15252 c if(any(ibits(iBC,3,3).eq.7)) then
15253 
15254  allocate (nbct(numnp))
15255  allocate (numbct(ntv))
15256  allocate (bct(ntv,nptsmax,4))
15257 
15258  do k=1,ntv
15259  do i=1,numnp
15260  if(ibits(ibc(i),3,3) .eq.7) then
15261  if(bctmatchingflag.eq.0) then
15262 c
15263 c Find the point on the boundary (if it is on this processor)
15264 c that matches this point
15265 c
15266  dd= distds(x1(k),x2(k),x3(k),x(i,1),x(i,2),x(i,3))
15267  if(dd.lt.epsd) then
15268  ic=ic+1
15269  nbct(ic)=i ! the pointer to this point
15270  numbct(ic)=ntpts ! the number of time series
