15271  do j=1,ntpts
15272 c BCt(ic,j,1)=v1(j,k);
15273 c BCt(ic,j,2)=v2(j,k);
15274 c BCt(ic,j,3)=v3(j,k);
15275  bct(ic,j,1)=v1((k-1)*ntpts+j);
15276  bct(ic,j,2)=v2((k-1)*ntpts+j);
15277  bct(ic,j,3)=v3((k-1)*ntpts+j);
15278  bct(ic,j,4)=ts(j);
15279  enddo
15280  exit
15281  endif
15282  else if (bctmatchingflag.eq.1) then
15283  if(lgmapping(i).eq.global_node_id(k)) then
15284  ic=ic+1
15285  nbct(ic)=i ! the pointer to this point
15286  numbct(ic)=ntpts ! the number of time series
15287  do j=1,ntpts
15288 c BCt(ic,j,1)=v1(j,k);
15289 c BCt(ic,j,2)=v2(j,k);
15290 c BCt(ic,j,3)=v3(j,k);
15291  bct(ic,j,1)=v1((k-1)*ntpts+j);
15292  bct(ic,j,2)=v2((k-1)*ntpts+j);
15293  bct(ic,j,3)=v3((k-1)*ntpts+j);
15294  bct(ic,j,4)=ts(j);
15295  enddo
15296  exit
15297  endif
15298  endif
15299  endif
15300  enddo
15301  enddo ! end of the loop over ntv
15302 
15303  bct(:,:,4)=bct(:,:,4)*bcttimescale
15304 c endif ! any 3 component nodes
15305  itvn=ic
15306 
15307 ! write(*,*) 'Process rank=%d',myrank,' has ',ic,' bct nodes.'
15308  write(*,'(A,I3,A,I5,A)') ' Process rank(',myrank,') has ',ic,' bct nodes.'
15309 
15310  if (numpe > 1) call mpi_barrier(mpi_comm_world, ierr)
15311 
15312 ! open(unit=321, file='vtp.dat',status='new',iostat=ioerr)
15313 !
15314 ! write(321,*)'ic= ',ic
15315 ! do i=1,ic
15316 ! write(321,*)'nBCt(',i,')= ',nBCt(i)
15317 ! enddo
15318 ! do i=1,ic
15319 ! write(321,*)'numBCt(',i,')= ',numBCt(i)
15320 ! enddo
15321 ! do i=1,ic
15322 ! do j=1,ntpts
15323 ! write(321,*)'BCt(',i,',',j,',all)= ',BCt(i,j,1),' ',
15324 ! & BCt(i,j,2),' ',BCt(i,j,3),' ',BCt(i,j,4)
15325 ! enddo
15326 ! enddo
15327 ! close(321)
15328 
15329  return
15330  end
15331 #endif
15332 
15333  subroutine bcint(timel,shp,shgl,shpb,shglb,x,BC,iBC)
15334 
15335  use specialbc ! brings in itvn,nbct, bct, numbct, nptsmax
15336 
15337  include "global.h"
15338  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
15339  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
15340  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
15341 
15342 C Local variables
15343 C
15344  REAL*8 wr
15345 C
15346  real*8 bc(nshg,ndofbc), timel,t
15347  real*8 x(numnp,nsd),
15348  & shp(maxtop,maxsh,maxqpt),
15349  & shgl(maxtop,nsd,maxsh,maxqpt),
15350  & shpb(maxtop,maxsh,maxqpt),
15351  & shglb(maxtop,nsd,maxsh,maxqpt)
15352 
15353  integer ibc(numnp),nlast,i,j,nper
15354 
15355  do i =1,itvn ! itvn is the number of varying nodes on this proc
15356 
15357  nlast=numbct(i) ! number of time series to interpolate from
15358  nper=timel/bct(i,nlast,4)! number of periods completed to shift off
15359 
15360 
15361  t=timel-nper*bct(i,nlast,4) ! now time in periodic domain
15362 
15363  do j=2,nlast !loop to find the interval that we are in
15364 
15365  if(bct(i,j,4).gt.t) then ! this is upper bound, j-1 is lower
15366 
15367  wr=(t-bct(i,j-1,4))/(bct(i,j,4)-bct(i,j-1,4))
15368  bc(nbct(i),3:5)= bct(i,j-1,1:3)*(one-wr)
15369  & + bct(i,j,1:3)*wr
15370  exit
15371 
15372  endif
15373  enddo
15374  enddo
15375  return
15376  end
15377 
15378  function distds(x1,y1,z1,x2,y2,z2)
15379  real*8 distds
15380  real*8 x1,y1,z1,x2,y2,z2,x,y,z
15381  x=x1-x2
15382  y=y1-y2
15383  z=z1-z2
15384  distds=x*x+y*y+z*z
15385  return
15386  end
15387 
15391 
15392  subroutine initimpt()
15393 
15394  use convolimpflow
15395  include "global.h"
15396  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
15397 
15398 C Local variables
15399 C
15400  INTEGER j, k, n
15401 
15402  open(unit=817, file='impt.dat',status='old')
15403  read (817,*) nptsimpmax
15404  allocate (numimpt(numimpsrfs))
15405  allocate (valueimpt(nptsimpmax,2,numimpsrfs))
15406  valueimpt=0
15407  do k=1,numimpsrfs
15408  read (817,*) numdataimp
15409  numimpt(k) = numdataimp
15410  do j=1,numdataimp
15411  read(817,*) (valueimpt(j,n,k),n=1,2) ! n=1 time, 2 value
15412  enddo
15413  enddo
15414  close(817)
15415 
15416  allocate (valuelistimp(ntimeptpt+1,numimpsrfs))
15417  valuelistimp(ntimeptpt+1,:) = valueimpt(1,2,:) !Z(time=0), last entry
15418  valuelistimp(1,:) = valueimpt(1,2,:) !Z(time=0)=Z(time=T)
15419  return
15420  end
15421 
15422 
15423 
15424  subroutine impint(ctime,jstep)
15425 
15426  use convolimpflow
15427 
15428  include "global.h"
15429  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
15430 
15431 C Local variables
15432 C
15433  REAL*8 wr
15434 C
15435  real*8 ctime, ptime
15436  integer nlast, nper, k, j , jstep
15437 
15438 
15439  do k =1,numimpsrfs
15440  nlast=numimpt(k) ! number of time series to interpolate from
15441  nper=ctime/valueimpt(nlast,1,k)!number of periods completed to shift off
15442  ptime = ctime-nper*valueimpt(nlast,1,k) ! now time in periodic domain
15443 
15444  do j=2,nlast !loop to find the interval that we are in
15445 
15446  if(valueimpt(j,1,k).gt.ptime) then ! this is upper bound, j-1 is lower
15447  wr=(ptime-valueimpt(j-1,1,k))
15448  & / ( valueimpt(j,1,k)-valueimpt(j-1,1,k) )
15449  valuelistimp(jstep,k)= valueimpt(j-1,2,k)*(one-wr)
15450  & + valueimpt(j,2,k)*wr
15451  exit
15452  endif
15453 
15454  enddo
15455  enddo
15456  return
15457  end
15458 
15459 
15463 
15464  subroutine initrcrt()
15465 
15466  use convolrcrflow
15467 
15468  include "global.h"
15469  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
15470  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
15471  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
15472 
15473 C Local variables
15474 C
15475  INTEGER j, k, n
15476 
15477 C
15478  open(unit=818, file='rcrt.dat',status='old')
15479  read (818,*) nptsrcrmax
15480  allocate (numrcrt(numrcrsrfs))
15481  allocate (rcrarea(numrcrsrfs))
15482  allocate (valuepdist(nptsrcrmax,2,numrcrsrfs))
15483  allocate (valuelistrcr(3,numrcrsrfs))
15484  rcrarea = zero
15485  valuepdist=0
15486  valuelistrcr=0
15487  do k=1,numrcrsrfs
15488  read (818,*) numdatarcr
15489  numrcrt(k) = numdatarcr
15490  do j=1,3
15491  read(818,*) valuelistrcr(j,k) ! reads Rp,C,Rd
15492  enddo
15493  do j=1,numdatarcr
15494  read(818,*) (valuepdist(j,n,k),n=1,2) ! n=1 time, 2 value
15495  enddo
15496  enddo
15497  close(818)
15498 
15499  allocate (dtrcr(numrcrsrfs))
15500  if (lstep .eq. 0) then
15501  nptsrcr = 0
15502  allocate (qhistrcr(nstep(1)+1,numrcrsrfs)) !for flow history
15503  allocate (phistrcr(nstep(1)+1,numrcrsrfs)) !for flow history
15504  allocate (rcrconvcoef(nstep(1)+2,numrcrsrfs)) !for convolution coeff
15505  qhistrcr = zero
15506  phistrcr = zero
15507  elseif (lstep .gt. 0) then
15508  nptsrcr = lstep
15509  allocate (qhistrcr(lstep+nstep(1)+1,numrcrsrfs))
15510  allocate (rcrconvcoef(lstep+nstep(1)+2,numrcrsrfs)) !for convolution coeff
15511  allocate (phistrcr(lstep+nstep(1)+1,numrcrsrfs))
15512  phistrcr = zero
15513  qhistrcr = zero
15514  call readdatafile(qhistrcr(1:lstep+1,:),lstep+1,numrcrsrfs,
15515  & 'QHistRCR.dat',870)
15516  call readdatafile(phistrcr(1:lstep+1,:),lstep+1,numrcrsrfs,
15517  & 'PHistRCR.dat',871)
15518  endif
15519 
15520  return
15521  end
15522 
15523 
15524  subroutine rcrint(ctime,Pdist)
15525 
15526  use convolrcrflow ! brings numRCRSrfs, ValuePdist
15527 
15528  include "global.h"
15529  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
15530 
15531 C Local variables
15532 C
15533  REAL*8 wr
15534 C
15535  real*8 ctime, ptime
15536  integer nlast, nper, k, j
15537  real*8 pdist(0:maxsurf)
15538 
15539  do k =1,numrcrsrfs
15540  nlast=numrcrt(k) ! number of time series to interpolate from
15541  nper=ctime/valuepdist(nlast,1,k)!number of periods completed to shift off
15542  ptime = ctime-nper*valuepdist(nlast,1,k) ! now time in periodic domain
15543 
15544  do j=2,nlast !loop to find the interval that we are in
15545 
15546  if(valuepdist(j,1,k).gt.ptime) then ! this is upper bound, j-1 is lower
15547  wr=(ptime-valuepdist(j-1,1,k))
15548  & / ( valuepdist(j,1,k)-valuepdist(j-1,1,k) )
15549  pdist(k)= valuepdist(j-1,2,k)*(one-wr)
15550  & + valuepdist(j,2,k)*wr
15551  exit
15552  endif
15553 
15554  enddo
15555  enddo
15556  return
15557  end
15558 
15561 
15562  subroutine initlagrange()
15563 
15564  use lagrangemultipliers
15565 
15566  include "global.h"
15567  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
15568  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
15569  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
15570 
15571 C Local variables
15572 C
15573  INTEGER k
15574  INTEGER n
15575  LOGICAL ierr
15576 C
15577  integer numofdata
15578 
15579  allocate(lagcenter(3,numlagrangesrfs))
15580  allocate(laginplanevectors(3,3,numlagrangesrfs))
15581  allocate(lagradius(numlagrangesrfs))
15582  allocate(lagprofilearea(numlagrangesrfs))
15583  allocate(lagold(numlagrangesrfs,3))
15584  allocate(lag(numlagrangesrfs,3))
15585  allocate(lagincr(numlagrangesrfs,3))
15586  allocate(lagalpha(numlagrangesrfs,3))
15587  allocate(profileorder(numlagrangesrfs))
15588  allocate(profiledelta(numlagrangesrfs))
15589  allocate(penalty(numlagrangesrfs,3))
15590  allocate(penaltycoeff(numlagrangesrfs,3))
15591  allocate(scalefactor(numlagrangesrfs,3))
15592  allocate(addlag(numlagrangesrfs,3))
15593  allocate(lagmeanflow(numlagrangesrfs))
15594  numofdata = numlagrangesrfs*3
15595  allocate(laghist(lstep+nstep(1)+1, numofdata))
15596  allocate(lagerrorhist(lstep+nstep(1)+1, numofdata))
15597  lagcenter = zero
15598  laginplanevectors = zero
15599  lagradius = zero
15600  lagprofilearea = zero
15601  lagold = zero
15602  lag = zero
15603  lagincr = zero
15604  lagalpha = zero
15605  profileorder = 0
15606  lagswitch = 0
15607  profiledelta = zero
15608  penalty = zero
15609  penaltycoeff = zero
15610  scalefactor = zero
15611  addlag = zero
15612  lagmeanflow = zero
15613  laghist = zero
15614  lagerrorhist = zero
15615  open(unit=800, file='LagrangeData.dat', status='old')
15616  do k=1, numlagrangesrfs
15617  read(800,*)
15618  read(800,*) (lagcenter(n,k), n=1,3) !Center of a constrained surface
15619  read(800,*)
15620  read(800,*) lagradius(k) !Surface radius
15621  read(800,*)
15622  read(800,*) profileorder(k) !Profile order
15623  read(800,*)
15624  read(800,*) lagmeanflow(k) !Mean flow
15625  read(800,*)
15626  read(800,*) (lagold(k,n), n=1,3) !Initial Lagrange Multipliers
15627  read(800,*)
15628  read(800,*) (penaltycoeff(k,n), n=1,3) !Penalty numbers
15629  read(800,*)
15630  read(800,*) (scalefactor(k,n), n=1,3) !Scaling factors
15631  enddo
15632  close(800)
15633 
15634 c CHECK IF THE LAGRANGE MULTIPLIER FILE EXISTS - DES
15635  INQUIRE(file='LagrangeMultipliers.dat', exist=ierr)
15636  if (lstep .gt. zero .AND. ierr) then
15637  call readdatafile(laghist(1:lstep+1,:),lstep+1,numofdata,
15638  & 'LagrangeMultipliers.dat',801)
15639  call readdatafile(lagerrorhist(1:lstep+1,:),lstep+1,numofdata,
15640  & 'LagrangeErrors.dat',802)
15641  endif
15642 
15643  return
15644  end
15645 
15648 
15649  subroutine phist(pressHist,QHist,betas,nTimePoint,nSrfs)
15650 
15651  include "global.h"
15652 C Local variables
15653 C
15654  INTEGER j, k
15655 C
15656  integer ntimepoint,nsrfs
15657  real*8 presshist(0:maxsurf)
15658  real*8 qhist(ntimepoint+1,nsrfs),betas(ntimepoint+2,nsrfs)
15659  !don't need here betas(ntimePoint+2)
15660  !but pb of array passing if cut at nTimePoint+1
15661  presshist=zero
15662  do k=1,nsrfs
15663  do j=1,ntimepoint+1
15664  presshist(k) = presshist(k) + qhist(j,k)*betas(j,k)
15665  enddo
15666  enddo
15667  return
15668  end
15669 
15671 
15672  subroutine readdatafile(DataFile,nrows,ncolms,Filename,UnitNumber)
15673 
15674  include "global.h"
15675 C Local variables
15676 C
15677  INTEGER i, j
15678 C
15679  character(len=*) filename
15680  real*8 datafile(nrows,ncolms)
15681  integer nrows, ncolms, unitnumber
15682 
15683  open(unit=unitnumber, file=filename, status='old')
15684  read(unitnumber,*)
15685  do i=1, nrows
15686  read(unitnumber,*) (datafile(i,j), j=1, ncolms)
15687  enddo
15688  close(unitnumber)
15689 
15690  return
15691  end
15692 
15696 
15697  subroutine elmgmrsclr (y, ac, x,
15698  & shp, shgl, ibc,
15699  & bc, shpb, shglb,
15700  & res, iper, ilwork,
15701  & rowp, colm, lhss )
15702 c
15703  use pointer_data
15704  use local_mass
15705 c
15706  include "global.h"
15707  include "mpif.h"
15708  include "common_blocks/aerfrc.h"
15709  include "common_blocks/blkdat.h"
15710  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
15711  include "common_blocks/elmpar.h"
15712  include "common_blocks/fronts.h"
15713  include "common_blocks/genpar.h"
15714  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
15715  include "common_blocks/intpt.h"
15716  include "common_blocks/propar.h"
15717  include "common_blocks/shpdat.h"
15718  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
15719  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
15720  include "common_blocks/sclrs.h"
15721 C
15722 C Argument variables
15723 C
15724  INTEGER ibc, iper
15725 C
15726  REAL*8 ac, bc, res, shgl
15727  REAL*8 shglb, shp, shpb, x
15728  REAL*8 y
15729 C
15730 C Local variables
15731 C
15732  INTEGER iblk, iel
15733 C
15734  REAL*8 qres, rmass
15735  REAL*8 spmass
15736 C
15737  dimension y(nshg,ndof), ac(nshg,ndof),
15738  & x(numnp,nsd), ibc(nshg),
15739  & bc(nshg,ndofbc), res(nshg),
15740  & iper(nshg)
15741 c
15742  dimension shp(maxtop,maxsh,maxqpt),
15743  & shgl(maxtop,nsd,maxsh,maxqpt),
15744  & shpb(maxtop,maxsh,maxqpt),
15745  & shglb(maxtop,nsd,maxsh,maxqpt)
15746 c
15747  dimension qres(nshg,nsd), rmass(nshg)
15748 c
15749  integer ilwork(nlwork), rowp(nshg*nnz), colm(nshg+1)
15750 
15751  real*8 lhss(nnz_tot)
15752 
15753  real*8, allocatable, dimension(:,:,:) :: xsebe
15754 c
15755 c.... set up the timer
15756 c
15757 
15758 CAD call timer ('Elm_Form')
15759 c
15760 c.... --------------------> diffusive flux <--------------------
15761 c
15762  ires = 1
15763 
15764  if (idiff==1 .or. idiff==3) then ! global reconstruction of qdiff
15765 c
15766 c loop over element blocks for the global reconstruction
15767 c of the diffusive flux vector, q, and lumped mass matrix, rmass
15768 c
15769  qres = zero
15770  rmass = zero
15771 
15772  do iblk = 1, nelblk
15773  iel = lcblk(1,iblk)
15774  lcsyst = lcblk(3,iblk)
15775  nenl = lcblk(5,iblk) ! no. of vertices per element
15776  nshl = lcblk(10,iblk)
15777  mattyp = lcblk(7,iblk)
15778  ndofl = lcblk(8,iblk)
15779  npro = lcblk(1,iblk+1) - iel
15780 
15781  ngauss = nint(lcsyst)
15782 c
15783 c.... compute and assemble diffusive flux vector residual, qres,
15784 c and lumped mass matrix, rmass
15785 
15786  call asiqsclr(y, x,
15787  & shp(lcsyst,1:nshl,:),
15788  & shgl(lcsyst,:,1:nshl,:),
15789  & mien(iblk)%p, qres,
15790  & rmass )
15791 
15792  enddo
15793 
15794 c
15795 c.... form the diffusive flux approximation
15796 c
15797  call qpbcsclr( rmass, qres, ibc, iper, ilwork )
15798 c
15799  endif
15800 c
15801 c.... --------------------> interior elements <--------------------
15802 c
15803  res = zero
15804  spmass = zero
15805 
15806  if (lhs .eq. 1) then
15807  lhss = zero
15808  endif
15809 
15810  if ((impl(1)/10) .eq. 0) then ! no flow solve so flxID was not zeroed
15811  flxid = zero
15812  endif
15813 c
15814 c.... loop over the element-blocks
15815 c
15816  do iblk = 1, nelblk
15817  iblock = iblk ! used in local mass inverse (p>2)
15818  iel = lcblk(1,iblk)
15819  lcsyst = lcblk(3,iblk)
15820  nenl = lcblk(5,iblk) ! no. of vertices per element
15821  nshl = lcblk(10,iblk)
15822  ndofl = lcblk(8,iblk)
15823  npro = lcblk(1,iblk+1) - iel
15824 
15825  ngauss = nint(lcsyst)
15826 c
15827 c.... allocate the element matrices
15828 c
15829  allocate ( xsebe(npro,nshl,nshl) )
15830 c
15831 c.... compute and assemble the residual and tangent matrix
15832 c
15833  call asigmrsclr(y, ac,
15834  & x,
15835  & shp(lcsyst,1:nshl,:),
15836  & shgl(lcsyst,:,1:nshl,:),
15837  & mien(iblk)%p, res,
15838  & qres, xsebe, mxmudmi(iblk)%p )
15839 c
15840 c.... satisfy the BC's on the implicit LHS
15841 c
15842  if (impl(1) .ne. 9 .and. lhs .eq. 1) then
15843  call fillsparsesclr(mien(iblk)%p,
15844  & xsebe, lhss,
15845  & rowp, colm)
15846  endif
15847 
15848  deallocate ( xsebe )
15849 c
15850 c.... end of interior element loop
15851 c
15852  enddo
15853 
15854 c
15855 c.... add in lumped mass contributions if needed
15856 c
15857  if((flmpr.ne.0).or.(flmpl.ne.0)) then
15858  call lmassaddsclr(ac(:,isclr), res,rowp,colm,lhss,gmass)
15859  endif
15860 
15861  have_local_mass = 1
15862 c
15863 c
15864 c call DtN routine which updates the flux to be consistent with the
15865 c current solution values. We will put the result in the last slot of
15866 c BC (we added a space in input.f). That way we can localize this
15867 c value to the boundary elements. This is important to keep from calling
15868 c the DtN evaluator more than once per node (it can be very expensive).
15869 c
15870  if(idtn.eq.1) call dtn(ibc,bc,y)
15871 c
15872 c.... --------------------> boundary elements <--------------------
15873 c
15874 c
15875 c.... loop over the boundary elements
15876 c
15877  do iblk = 1, nelblb
15878 c
15879 c.... set up the parameters
15880 c
15881  iel = lcblkb(1,iblk)
15882  lcsyst = lcblkb(3,iblk)
15883  nenl = lcblkb(5,iblk) ! no. of vertices per element
15884  nenbl = lcblkb(6,iblk) ! no. of vertices per bdry. face
15885  nshl = lcblkb(9,iblk)
15886  nshlb = lcblkb(10,iblk)
15887  ndofl = lcblkb(8,iblk)
15888  npro = lcblkb(1,iblk+1) - iel
15889 
15890  if(lcsyst.eq.3) lcsyst=nenbl
15891  if(lcsyst.eq.3 .or. lcsyst.eq.4) then
15892  ngaussb = nintb(lcsyst)
15893  else
15894  ngaussb = nintb(lcsyst)
15895  endif
15896 c
15897 c localize the dtn boundary condition
15898 c
15899 
15900  if(idtn.eq.1) call dtnl( ibc, bc, mienb(iblk)%p,
15901  & mibcb(iblk)%p, mbcb(iblk)%p)
15902 
15903 c
15904 c.... compute and assemble the residuals corresponding to the
15905 c boundary integral
15906 c
15907  call asbsclr(y, x,
15908  & shpb(lcsyst,1:nshl,:),
15909  & shglb(lcsyst,:,1:nshl,:),
15910  & mienb(iblk)%p, mmatb(iblk)%p,
15911  & mibcb(iblk)%p, mbcb(iblk)%p,
15912  & res)
15913 c
15914 c.... end of boundary element loop
15915 c
15916  enddo
15917 c
15918 c
15919 c.... --------------------> communications <-------------------------
15920 c
15921 
15922  if (numpe > 1) then
15923  call commu(res , ilwork, 1 , 'in ')
15924  endif
15925 
15926 c
15927 c.... ----------------------> post processing <----------------------
15928 c
15929 c.... satisfy the BCs on the residual
15930 c
15931  call bc3ressclr(ibc, res, iper, ilwork)
15932 c
15933 c.... return
15934 c
15935 CAD call timer ('Back ')
15936  return
15937  end
15938 
15939 
15940 c
15941 c....routine to compute and return the flow rates for coupled surfaces of a given type
15942 c
15943  subroutine getflowq (qsurf,y,srfIdList,numSrfs)
15944 
15945  use pvsqbi ! brings in NABI
15946 c
15947  include "global.h"
15948  include "mpif.h"
15949  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
15950 C
15951 C Local variables
15952 C
15953  INTEGER i, ierr, j, k
15954  INTEGER npars
15955 
15956 C
15957  real*8 y(nshg,3)
15958  real*8 qsurf(0:maxsurf),qsurfproc(0:maxsurf)
15959  integer numsrfs, srfidlist(0:maxsurf)
15960 
15961 c note we only need the first three entries (u) from y
15962 
15963  IF (numsrfs .EQ. 0) RETURN
15964 
15965  qsurfproc=zero
15966  do i = 1,nshg
15967  do k = 1,numsrfs
15968  if (srfidlist(k).eq.ndsurf(i)) then
15969  do j = 1,3
15970  qsurfproc(k) = qsurfproc(k) + nabi(i,j)*y(i,j)
15971  enddo
15972  endif
15973  enddo
15974  enddo
15975 c
15976 c at this point, each qsurf has its "nodes" contributions to Q
15977 c accumulated into qsurf. Note, because NABI is on processor this
15978 c will NOT be Q for the surface yet
15979 c
15980 c.... reduce integrated Q for each surface, push on qsurf
15981 c
15982  npars=maxsurf+1
15983  call mpi_allreduce(qsurfproc, qsurf, npars,
15984  & mpi_double_precision,mpi_sum, mpi_comm_world,ierr)
15985 c
15986 c.... return
15987 c
15988  return
15989  end
15990 c
15991 c.... routine to compute and return the flow rates multiplied by a profile function
15992 c.... for constrained surfaces
15993 c
15994  subroutine getprofileflowq (qsurf, y, srfIdList, numSrfs)
15995 
15996  use pvsqbi ! brings in PNABI, ndsurf
15997 c
15998  include "global.h"
15999  include "mpif.h"
16000  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
16001 C
16002 C Local variables
16003 C
16004  INTEGER ierr
16005  INTEGER npars
16006 
16007 C
16008  real*8 y(nshg,3)
16009  real*8 qsurf(0:maxsurf), qsurfproc(0:maxsurf)
16010  integer numsrfs, irankcoupled, srfidlist(0:maxsurf)
16011  integer i, j, k
16012 c
16013 c.... clear the vectors
16014 c
16015  qsurfproc = zero
16016  do i = 1,nshg
16017  if(numsrfs .gt. zero) then
16018  do k = 1, numsrfs
16019  irankcoupled = 0
16020  if (srfidlist(k) .eq. ndsurf(i)) then
16021  irankcoupled=k
16022  do j = 1, 3
16023  qsurfproc(irankcoupled) = qsurfproc(irankcoupled)
16024  & +pnabi(i,j)*y(i,j)
16025  enddo
16026  endif
16027  enddo
16028  endif
16029  enddo
16030 c
16031 c at this point, each qsurf has its "nodes" contributions to Q
16032 c accumulated into qsurf. Note, because PNABI is on processor this
16033 c will NOT be Q for the surface yet
16034 c
16035 c.... reduce integrated Q for each surface, push on qsurf
16036 c
16037  npars=maxsurf+1
16038  call mpi_allreduce(qsurfproc, qsurf, npars,
16039  & mpi_double_precision,mpi_sum, mpi_comm_world,ierr)
16040 
16041 c
16042 c.... return
16043 c
16044  return
16045  end
16046 
16049 
16050  subroutine calcnanblagrange(col, row, y)
16051 c
16052 
16053  use lagrangemultipliers
16054  use pvsqbi
16055 
16056  include "global.h"
16057  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
16058  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
16059 c
16060  integer col(nshg+1), row(nnz_tot)
16061  real*8 y(nshg,3)
16062 c
16063  real*8 tmp1, tmp2, tmp3
16064  integer p, i, j, k, n, m
16065 c
16066 c.... clear the vector
16067 c
16068  if (lagswitch .gt. 0) then
16069  nanblagrange(4:6,:,:) = zero
16070  else
16071  nanblagrange = zero
16072  endif
16073 c
16074 c....calculate NANBLagrange
16075 c
16076  do i = 1, nshg
16077  do n=1, 3
16078  do p=1, numlagrangesrfs
16079  tmp1 = 0
16080  tmp2 = 0
16081  tmp3 = 0
16082  if (nsrflistlagrange(p).eq.ndsurf(i)) then
16083  do k = col(i), col(i+1)-1
16084  j = row(k)
16085 c
16086  tmp1 = tmp1
16087  1 +lhslagl(1,k,n)*y(j,1)
16088  2 +lhslagl(4,k,n)*y(j,2)
16089  3 +lhslagl(7,k,n)*y(j,3)
16090  tmp2 = tmp2
16091  1 +lhslagl(2,k,n)*y(j,1)
16092  2 +lhslagl(5,k,n)*y(j,2)
16093  3 +lhslagl(8,k,n)*y(j,3)
16094  tmp3 = tmp3
16095  1 +lhslagl(3,k,n)*y(j,1)
16096  2 +lhslagl(6,k,n)*y(j,2)
16097  3 +lhslagl(9,k,n)*y(j,3)
16098 c
16099  enddo
16100  if (lagswitch .gt. 0) then
16101  m = n+3
16102  nanblagrange(m,i,1)=nanblagrange(m,i,1)+tmp1
16103  nanblagrange(m,i,2)=nanblagrange(m,i,2)+tmp2
16104  nanblagrange(m,i,3)=nanblagrange(m,i,3)+tmp3
16105  else
16106  m=n
16107  nanblagrange(m,i,1)=nanblagrange(m,i,1)+tmp1
16108  nanblagrange(m,i,2)=nanblagrange(m,i,2)+tmp2
16109  nanblagrange(m,i,3)=nanblagrange(m,i,3)+tmp3
16110  endif
16111  endif
16112  enddo
16113  enddo
16114  enddo
16115 c
16116  return
16117  end
16118 
16121 
16122  subroutine getinnerproduct (qsurf, y, srfIdList, numSrfs)
16123 c
16124  use lagrangemultipliers ! brings in NANBLagrange
16125  use pvsqbi ! brings in ndsurf
16126 c
16127  include "global.h"
16128  include "mpif.h"
16129  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
16130 c
16131 C
16132  INTEGER npars, ierr
16133 
16134 C
16135  real*8 y(nshg,3)
16136  real*8 qsurf(0:maxsurf,3), qsurfproc(0:maxsurf,3)
16137  integer numsrfs, irankcoupled, srfidlist(0:maxsurf)
16138  integer i, j, k, n
16139 c
16140 c.... clear the vector
16141 c
16142  qsurfproc = zero
16143  if(numsrfs.gt.zero) then
16144  do i = 1, nshg
16145  do n=1, 3
16146  do k = 1, numsrfs
16147  if (srfidlist(k) .eq. ndsurf(i)) then
16148  do j=1, 3
16149  qsurfproc(k,n)=qsurfproc(k,n)
16150  & +nanblagrange(n,i,j)*y(i,j)
16151  enddo
16152  endif
16153  enddo
16154  enddo
16155  enddo
16156  endif
16157 c
16158 c at this point, each qsurf has its "nodes" contributions to Q
16159 c accumulated into qsurf. Note, because NABI is on processor this
16160 c will NOT be Q for the surface yet
16161 c
16162 c.... reduce integrated Q for each surface, push on qsurf
16163 c
16164  do n=1, 3
16165  npars=maxsurf+1
16166  call mpi_allreduce(qsurfproc(:,n), qsurf(:,n), npars,
16167  & mpi_double_precision,mpi_sum, mpi_comm_world,ierr)
16168  enddo
16169 c
16170 c.... return
16171 c
16172  return
16173  end
16174 
16176 
16177  subroutine lagmultiplymatrixtranspose(srfIDList, numSrfs)
16178 
16179  use pvsqbi ! brings in NABI
16180  use lagrangemultipliers !brings in the current part of coef for Lagrange Multipliers
16181 c
16182  include "global.h"
16183  include "mpif.h"
16184  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
16185  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
16186  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
16187 C
16188 C Local variables
16189 C
16190  INTEGER i, k
16191 
16192 C
16193  real*8 diagonaldelta, diagonaldeltasurf
16194  integer srfidlist(0:maxsurf), numsrfs
16195 
16196  diagonaldelta = -two*alfi*gami*delt(1)
16197  lagapproduct = zero
16198 
16199  do i=1, nshg
16200  do k = 1, numsrfs
16201  diagonaldeltasurf = zero
16202  diagonaldeltasurf = diagonaldelta*lagmeanflow(k)
16203  if (srfidlist(k).eq.ndsurf(i)) then
16204  lagapproduct(i,1:3)=lagapproduct(i,1:3)+diagonaldeltasurf
16205  & *((nanblagrange(1,i,1:3)-pqlagrange(k,1)*nabi(i,1:3)
16206  & -qlagrange(k,1)*pnabi(i,1:3)/lagprofilearea(k)
16207  & +qlagrange(k,1)*nabi(i,1:3)*profiledelta(k))
16208  & *addlag(k,1)+nanblagrange(2,i,1:3)*addlag(k,2)
16209  & +nanblagrange(3,i,1:3)*addlag(k,3) )
16210  endif
16211  enddo
16212  enddo
16213 
16214  return
16215  end
16216 
16218 
16219  subroutine lagmultiplymatrix (Dy, CaseNumber, srfIDList, numSrfs)
16220 
16221  use pvsqbi ! brings in NABI
16222  use lagrangemultipliers !brings in the current part of coef for Lagrange Multipliers
16223 c
16224  include "global.h"
16225  include "mpif.h"
16226  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
16227  include "common_blocks/inpdat.h"
16228  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
16229 c
16230 C
16231 C Local variables
16232 C
16233  INTEGER k
16234 C
16235  real*8 dy(nshg,3), diagonaldeltasurf
16236  real*8 diagonaldelta, procaddlag(0:maxsurf,3)
16237  integer casenumber, srfidlist(0:maxsurf), numsrfs
16238 
16239  diagonaldelta = -two*alfi*gami*delt(1)
16240  procaddlag = zero
16241  if (casenumber .eq. zero) then
16242  call getflowq(procaddlag(:,1), dy(:,1:3), srfidlist, numsrfs)
16243  qlagrange(1:numsrfs,2)=procaddlag(1:numsrfs,1)
16244  procaddlag = zero
16245  call getprofileflowq(procaddlag(:,1), dy(:,1:3), srfidlist,
16246  & numsrfs)
16247  pqlagrange(1:numsrfs,2)=procaddlag(1:numsrfs,1)
16248  & /lagprofilearea(1:numsrfs)
16249  procaddlag = zero
16250  call getinnerproduct(procaddlag, dy(:,1:3), srfidlist, numsrfs)
16251  iplagrange(1:numsrfs,4:6)=procaddlag(1:numsrfs,1:3)
16252  endif
16253 
16254  do k = 1, numsrfs
16255  diagonaldeltasurf = zero
16256  diagonaldeltasurf = diagonaldelta * lagmeanflow(k)
16257  addlag(k,1)=diagonaldeltasurf*
16258  & (iplagrange(k,4)-pqlagrange(k,1)*qlagrange(k,2)
16259  & -qlagrange(k,1)*pqlagrange(k,2)
16260  & +qlagrange(k,1)*qlagrange(k,2)*profiledelta(k))
16261  addlag(k,2)=diagonaldeltasurf*iplagrange(k,5)
16262  addlag(k,3)=diagonaldeltasurf*iplagrange(k,6)
16263  enddo
16264 
16265  return
16266  end
16267 
16268 c
16269 c...initialize the coefficients for the impedance convolution
16270 c
16271  subroutine calcimpconvcoef (numISrfs, numTpoints)
16272 
16273  use convolimpflow !uses flow history and impedance for convolution
16274 
16275  include "global.h"
16276  include "common_blocks/timdat.h" !for alfi
16277 C
16278 C Local variables
16279 C
16280  INTEGER j
16281 C
16282  integer numisrfs, numtpoints
16283 
16284  allocate (convcoef(numtpoints+2,3)) !same time discret. for all imp. BC
16285  do j=1,numtpoints+2
16286  convcoef(j,:)=0.5/numtpoints !dt/2 divided by period T=N*dt
16287  convcoef(j,1)=convcoef(j,1)*(1.0-alfi)*(1.0-alfi)
16288  convcoef(j,2)=convcoef(j,2)*(1.0+2*alfi*(1.0-alfi))
16289  convcoef(j,3)=convcoef(j,3)*alfi*alfi
16290  enddo
16291  convcoef(1,2)=zero
16292  convcoef(1,3)=zero
16293  convcoef(2,3)=zero
16294  convcoef(numtpoints+1,1)=zero
16295  convcoef(numtpoints+2,2)=zero
16296  convcoef(numtpoints+2,1)=zero
16297 c
16298 c...calculate the coefficients for the impedance convolution
16299 c
16300  allocate (impconvcoef(numtpoints+2,numisrfs))
16301 
16302 c..try easiest convolution Q and Z constant per time step
16303  do j=3,numtpoints+1
16304  impconvcoef(j,:) = valuelistimp(j-1,:)/numtpoints
16305  enddo
16306  impconvcoef(1,:) =zero
16307  impconvcoef(2,:) =zero
16308  impconvcoef(numtpoints+2,:) =
16309  & valuelistimp(numtpoints+1,:)/numtpoints
16310 c compensate for yalpha passed not y in Elmgmr()
16311  impconvcoef(numtpoints+1,:)= impconvcoef(numtpoints+1,:)
16312  & - impconvcoef(numtpoints+2,:)*(1.0-alfi)/alfi
16313  impconvcoef(numtpoints+2,:)= impconvcoef(numtpoints+2,:)/alfi
16314  return
16315  end
16316 
16317 c
16318 c...calculate the time varying coefficients for the RCR convolution
16319 c
16320  subroutine calcrcrconvcoef (stepn, numSrfs)
16321 
16322  use convolrcrflow !brings in ValueListRCR, dtRCR
16323 
16324  include "global.h"
16325  include "common_blocks/timdat.h" !brings alfi
16326 C
16327 C Local variables
16328 C
16329  INTEGER j
16330 C
16331  integer numsrfs, stepn
16332 
16333  rcrconvcoef = zero
16334  if (stepn .eq. 0) then
16335  rcrconvcoef(1,:) = valuelistrcr(1,:)*(1.0-alfi) +
16336  & valuelistrcr(3,:)*(-alfi + 1.0 + 1/dtrcr(:)
16337  & - exp(-alfi*dtrcr(:))*(1 + 1/dtrcr(:)))
16338  rcrconvcoef(2,:) = valuelistrcr(1,:)*alfi
16339  & + valuelistrcr(3,:)
16340  & *(alfi - 1/dtrcr(:) + exp(-alfi*dtrcr(:))/dtrcr(:))
16341  endif
16342  if (stepn .ge. 1) then
16343  rcrconvcoef(1,:) =-valuelistrcr(3,:)*exp(-dtrcr(:)*(stepn+alfi))
16344  & *(1 + (1 - exp(dtrcr(:)))/dtrcr(:))
16345  rcrconvcoef(stepn+1,:) = valuelistrcr(1,:)*(1-alfi)
16346  & - valuelistrcr(3,:)*(alfi - 1 - 1/dtrcr(:)
16347  & + exp(-alfi*dtrcr(:))/dtrcr(:)*(2 - exp(-dtrcr(:))))
16348  rcrconvcoef(stepn+2,:) = valuelistrcr(1,:)*alfi
16349  & + valuelistrcr(3,:)
16350  & *(alfi - 1/dtrcr(:) + exp(-alfi*dtrcr(:))/dtrcr(:))
16351  endif
16352  if (stepn .ge. 2) then
16353  do j=2,stepn
16354  rcrconvcoef(j,:) = valuelistrcr(3,:)/dtrcr(:)*
16355  & exp(-dtrcr(:)*(stepn + alfi + 2 - j))*
16356  & (1 - exp(dtrcr(:)))**2
16357  enddo
16358  endif
16359 
16360 c compensate for yalpha passed not y in Elmgmr()
16361  rcrconvcoef(stepn+1,:)= rcrconvcoef(stepn+1,:)
16362  & - rcrconvcoef(stepn+2,:)*(1.0-alfi)/alfi
16363  rcrconvcoef(stepn+2,:)= rcrconvcoef(stepn+2,:)/alfi
16364 
16365  return
16366  end
16367 
16368 c
16369 c...calculate the time dependent H operator for the RCR convolution
16370 c
16371  subroutine calchoprcr (timestepRCR, stepn, numSrfs)
16372 
16373  use convolrcrflow !brings in HopRCR, dtRCR
16374 
16375  include "global.h"
16376  include "mpif.h" !needed?
16377  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
16378 C
16379  integer numsrfs, stepn
16380  real*8 pdistcur(0:maxsurf), timesteprcr
16381 
16382  hoprcr=zero
16383  call rcrint(timesteprcr*(stepn + alfi),pdistcur)
16384  hoprcr(1:numsrfs) = rcric(1:numsrfs)
16385  & *exp(-dtrcr(1:numsrfs)*(stepn + alfi)) + pdistcur(1:numsrfs)
16386  return
16387  end
16388 
16389 c
16390 c.... This subroutine writes FlowHist.dat and PressHist.dat files
16391 c
16392  subroutine updrcr(y, srfIDList, numSrfs)
16393 
16394  use convolrcrflow
16395 
16396  include "global.h"
16397  include "common_blocks/outpar.h"
16398  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
16399  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
16400  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
16401 C
16402  real*8 y(nshg, ndof), newp(0:maxsurf)
16403  integer srfidlist(0:maxsurf), numsrfs
16404 
16405  call integrscalar(newp,y(:,4),srfidlist,numsrfs)
16406  phistrcr(lstep+1,1:numsrfs)=newp(1:numsrfs)/rcrarea(1:numsrfs)
16407  if ((mod(lstep, ntout) .eq. 0).and.
16408  & (myrank .eq. zero)) then
16409  call outputdatafile(qhistrcr(1:lstep+1,:),lstep+1,numsrfs,
16410  & 'QHistRCR.dat',870)
16411  call outputdatafile(phistrcr(1:lstep+1,:),lstep+1,numsrfs,
16412  & 'PHistRCR.dat',871)
16413  endif
16414 
16415  return
16416  end
16417 
16418 
16419 c
16420 c ... calculate initial conditions for the CalcSurfaces
16421 c
16422  subroutine calccalcic(y,srfIdList,numSrfs)
16423 
16424  use calcflowpressure
16425 c
16426  include "global.h"
16427  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
16428  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
16429 C
16430  integer srfidlist(0:maxsurf), numsrfs, irankcoupled
16431  real*8 y(nshg,4) !need velocity and pressure
16432  real*8 qini(0:maxsurf) !initial flow rate
16433  real*8 pdistini(0:maxsurf)!initial distal pressure
16434  real*8 pini(0:maxsurf),couplearea(0:maxsurf) ! initial pressure
16435  real*8 velonly(nshg,3), ponly(nshg)
16436 c
16437  ponly(:)= one ! one to get area
16438  call integrscalar(couplearea,ponly,srfidlist,numsrfs) !get surf area
16439  calcarea(1:numsrfs) = couplearea(1:numsrfs)
16440  velonly(:,1:3)=y(:,1:3)
16441  call getflowq(qini,velonly,srfidlist,numsrfs) !get initial flow
16442  flowhist(lstep+1,1:numsrfs)=qini(1:numsrfs) !initialize QHistRCR
16443  ponly(:)=y(:,4) ! pressure
16444  call integrscalar(pini,ponly,srfidlist,numsrfs) !get initial pressure integral
16445  pini(1:numsrfs) = pini(1:numsrfs)/calcarea(1:numsrfs)
16446  presshist(lstep+1,1:numsrfs)=pini(1:numsrfs)
16447 
16448  return
16449  end
16450 c
16451 c ... initialize the influence of the initial conditions for the RCR BC
16452 c
16453  subroutine calcrcric(y,srfIdList,numSrfs)
16454 
16455  use convolrcrflow !brings RCRic, ValueListRCR, ValuePdist
16456 
16457  include "global.h" !needed?
16458  include "mpif.h" !needed?
16459  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
16460  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
16461 C
16462  integer srfidlist(0:maxsurf), numsrfs, irankcoupled
16463  real*8 y(nshg,4) !need velocity and pressure
16464  real*8 qini(0:maxsurf) !initial flow rate
16465  real*8 pdistini(0:maxsurf)!initial distal pressure
16466  real*8 pini(0:maxsurf),couplearea(0:maxsurf) ! initial pressure
16467  real*8 velonly(nshg,3), ponly(nshg)
16468 
16469  allocate (rcric(0:maxsurf))
16470 c call RCRint(lstep,PdistIni) !get initial distal P
16471  call rcrint(time,pdistini) !get initial distal P
16472  ponly(:)= one ! one to get area
16473  call integrscalar(couplearea,ponly,srfidlist,numsrfs) !get surf area
16474  rcrarea(1:numsrfs) = couplearea(1:numsrfs)
16475  if (lstep .eq. zero) then
16476  velonly(:,1:3)=y(:,1:3)
16477  call getflowq(qini,velonly,srfidlist,numsrfs) !get initial flow
16478  qhistrcr(1,1:numsrfs)=qini(1:numsrfs) !initialize QHistRCR
16479  ponly(:)=y(:,4) ! pressure
16480  call integrscalar(pini,ponly,srfidlist,numsrfs) !get initial pressure integral
16481  pini(1:numsrfs) = pini(1:numsrfs)/rcrarea(1:numsrfs)
16482  phistrcr(1,1:numsrfs)=pini(1:numsrfs)
16483  rcric(1:numsrfs) = pini(1:numsrfs)
16484  & - valuelistrcr(1,:)*qini(1:numsrfs)-pdistini(1:numsrfs)
16485  elseif (lstep .gt. zero) then
16486  rcric(1:numsrfs) = phistrcr(1,1:numsrfs)
16487  & -valuelistrcr(1,1:numsrfs)*qhistrcr(1,1:numsrfs)
16488  & -pdistini(1:numsrfs)
16489  endif
16490 
16491  return
16492  end
16493 
16494 
16495 c
16496 c.... This subroutine writes FlowHist.dat and PressHist.dat files
16497 c
16498  subroutine updcalc(y, srfIDList, numSrfs)
16499 
16500  use calcflowpressure
16501 
16502  include "global.h"
16503  include "common_blocks/outpar.h"
16504  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
16505  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
16506  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
16507 C
16508  real*8 y(nshg, ndof), newp(0:maxsurf), newq(0:maxsurf)
16509  integer srfidlist(0:maxsurf), numsrfs
16510 
16511  call getflowq(newq, y(:,1:3), srfidlist,numsrfs) !new flow at time n+1
16512  flowhist(lstep+1,1:numsrfs) = newq(1:numsrfs)
16513  call integrscalar(newp, y(:,4), srfidlist, numsrfs)
16514  presshist(lstep+1,1:numsrfs) = newp(1:numsrfs)/calcarea(1:numsrfs)
16515  if ((mod(lstep, ntout) .eq. 0).and.
16516  & (myrank .eq. zero)) then
16517 c CALL AppendDataFile(NewQ(1:numSrfs), srfIDList(1:numSrfs),
16518 c 2 numSrfs, 'FlowHist.dat', 1004)
16519 c CALL AppendDataFile(NewP(1:numSrfs), srfIDList(1:numSrfs),
16520 c 2 numSrfs, 'PressHist.dat', 1005)
16521  call outputdatafile(flowhist(1:lstep+1,:),lstep+1,numsrfs,
16522  & 'FlowHist.dat',1004)
16523  call outputdatafile(presshist(1:lstep+1,:),lstep+1,numsrfs,
16524  & 'PressHist.dat',1005)
16525  endif
16526 
16527  return
16528  end
16529 
16530 c
16531 c.... This subroutine writes Lagrange Multipliers and errors in
16532 c.... LagrangeMultipliers.dat and LagrangeErrors.dat
16533 c
16534  subroutine updatelagrangecoef(y, col, row, srfIDList, numSrfs)
16535 
16536  use lagrangemultipliers
16537 
16538  include "global.h"
16539  include "common_blocks/nomodule.h"
16540  include "common_blocks/outpar.h"
16541  include "common_blocks/workfc.h"
16542  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
16543  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
16544 C
16545 C Local variables
16546 C
16547  INTEGER k
16548 C
16549  real*8 y(nshg, ndof)
16550  integer col(nshg+1), row(nnz_tot)
16551  integer srfidlist(0:maxsurf), numsrfs, numofdata
16552  real*8 integral(0:maxsurf), innerproduct(0:maxsurf,3)
16553 
16554  integral = zero
16555  innerproduct = zero
16556  call getflowq(integral, y(:,1:3), srfidlist, numsrfs)
16557  qlagrange(1:numsrfs,1)=integral(1:numsrfs)
16558  integral = zero
16559  call getprofileflowq(integral, y(:,1:3), srfidlist, numsrfs)
16560  pqlagrange(1:numsrfs,1)=integral(1:numsrfs)
16561  & /lagprofilearea(1:numsrfs)
16562  integral = zero
16563  lagswitch = 0
16564  call calcnanblagrange(col, row, y(:,1:3))
16565  call getinnerproduct(innerproduct, y(:,1:3), srfidlist, numsrfs)
16566  iplagrange(1:numsrfs,1:3)=innerproduct(1:numsrfs,1:3)
16567  do k=1, numsrfs
16568  numofdata = (k-1)*3+1
16569  lagerrorhist(lstep+1,numofdata)=abs(iplagrange(k,1)
16570  & -two*qlagrange(k,1)*pqlagrange(k,1)
16571  & +qlagrange(k,1)**2*profiledelta(k))
16572  lagerrorhist(lstep+1,numofdata+1)=abs(iplagrange(k,2))
16573  lagerrorhist(lstep+1,numofdata+2)=abs(iplagrange(k,3))
16574  lagerrorhist(lstep+1,numofdata:numofdata+2)=
16575  & lagerrorhist(lstep+1,numofdata:numofdata+2)
16576  & *lagmeanflow(k)
16577  laghist(lstep+1,numofdata:numofdata+2)=lag(k,1:3)
16578  enddo
16579 
16580  if ((mod(lstep, ntout) .eq. 0).and.
16581  & (myrank .eq. zero)) then
16582  numofdata = numlagrangesrfs*3
16583  call outputdatafile(laghist(1:lstep+1,:),lstep+1, numofdata,
16584  & 'LagrangeMultipliers.dat',801)
16585  call outputdatafile(lagerrorhist(1:lstep+1,:),lstep+1,
16586  & numofdata,'LagrangeErrors.dat',802)
16587  endif
16588 c
16589  return
16590  end
16591 c
16592 c.... this function calculates an initial condition of a constrained surface
16593 c
16594  subroutine calclagrangeic(srfIDList, numSrfs)
16595 c
16596  use lagrangemultipliers
16597 
16598  include "global.h"
16599  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
16600  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
16601 C
16602 C Local variables
16603 C
16604  INTEGER k
16605 C
16606  integer srfidlist(0:maxsurf), numsrfs, numofdata
16607 
16608  lagswitch = 0
16609  allocate(lhslagl(9,nnz_tot,3))
16610  allocate(resl(numsrfs,3))
16611  allocate(lagapproduct(nshg,3))
16612  lhslagl = zero
16613  resl = zero
16614  lagapproduct = zero
16615  call mergelagrangeparameters(srfidlist, numsrfs)
16616  profiledelta(1:numsrfs)=profiledelta(1:numsrfs)
16617  & /lagprofilearea(1:numsrfs)/lagprofilearea(1:numsrfs)
16618  do k=1, numsrfs
16619  lagmeanflow(k)=two*lagprofilearea(k)/lagmeanflow(k)
16620  & /lagmeanflow(k)
16621  if (lstep .eq. zero) then
16622  laghist(1,(k-1)*3+1:(k-1)*3+3)=lagold(k,1:3)
16623  elseif (lstep .gt. zero) then
16624  lagold(k,1:3)=laghist(lstep+1,(k-1)*3+1:(k-1)*3+3)
16625  endif
16626  enddo
16627 
16628  return
16629  end
16630 
16631 c
16632 c.... this function calculates an initial condition of a constrained surface
16633 c
16634  subroutine calclagrangeerroric(y, col, row, srfIDList, numSrfs)
16635 c
16636  use lagrangemultipliers
16637 
16638  include "global.h"
16639  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
16640  include "common_blocks/timdat.h"
16641 C
16642 C Local variables
16643 C
16644  INTEGER k
16645 C
16646  real*8 y(nshg, ndof)
16647  integer srfidlist(0:maxsurf), numsrfs, numofdata
16648  integer col(nshg+1), row(nnz_tot)
16649  real*8 integral(0:maxsurf), innerproduct(0:maxsurf,3)
16650 
16651  integral = zero
16652  innerproduct = zero
16653  call getflowq(integral, y(:,1:3), srfidlist, numsrfs)
16654  qlagrange(1:numsrfs,1)=integral(1:numsrfs)
16655  integral = zero
16656  call getprofileflowq(integral, y(:,1:3), srfidlist, numsrfs)
16657  pqlagrange(1:numsrfs,1)=integral(1:numsrfs)
16658  & /lagprofilearea(1:numsrfs)
16659  integral = zero
16660  call calcnanblagrange(col, row, y(:,1:3))
16661  call getinnerproduct(innerproduct, y(:,1:3), srfidlist, numsrfs)
16662  iplagrange(1:numsrfs,1:3)=innerproduct(1:numsrfs,1:3)
16663  do k=1, numsrfs
16664  numofdata = (k-1)*3+1
16665  lagerrorhist(lstep+1,numofdata)=abs(iplagrange(k,1)
16666  & -two*qlagrange(k,1)*pqlagrange(k,1)
16667  & +qlagrange(k,1)**2*profiledelta(k))
16668  lagerrorhist(lstep+1,numofdata+1)=abs(iplagrange(k,2))
16669  lagerrorhist(lstep+1,numofdata+2)=abs(iplagrange(k,3))
16670  lagerrorhist(lstep+1,numofdata:numofdata+2)=
16671  & lagerrorhist(lstep+1,numofdata:numofdata+2)
16672  & *lagmeanflow(k)
16673  enddo
16674 
16675  return
16676  end
16677 
16678 c
16679 c.... this function calculates an area and plane vectors of a constrained surface
16680 c
16681  subroutine mergelagrangeparameters(srfIDList, numSrfs)
16682 c
16683  use lagrangemultipliers
16684 c
16685  include "global.h"
16686  include "mpif.h"
16687 C
16688 C Local variables
16689 C
16690  INTEGER i, ierr, j, k
16691 C
16692  integer srfidlist(0:maxsurf), numsrfs
16693  real*8 vectmag(3), inplane1, inplane2, inplane3, inplanenorm
16694  real*8, allocatable, dimension (:) :: totalarea
16695  real*8, allocatable, dimension (:,:,:) :: inplanevectors
16696 c
16697  allocate(totalarea(numsrfs))
16698  allocate(inplanevectors(3,3,numsrfs))
16699  totalarea = zero
16700  inplanevectors = zero
16701  call mpi_allreduce(lagprofilearea, totalarea, numsrfs,
16702  & mpi_double_precision,mpi_sum, mpi_comm_world,ierr)
16703  lagprofilearea(1:numsrfs)=totalarea(1:numsrfs)
16704  totalarea = zero
16705  call mpi_allreduce(profiledelta, totalarea, numsrfs,
16706  & mpi_double_precision,mpi_sum, mpi_comm_world,ierr)
16707  profiledelta(1:numsrfs)=totalarea(1:numsrfs)
16708  inplanevectors = zero
16709 
16710  do i=1,3
16711  do j=1,3
16712  call mpi_allreduce(laginplanevectors(i,j,:),
16713  & inplanevectors(i,j,:), numsrfs,
16714  & mpi_double_precision, mpi_sum, mpi_comm_world,ierr)
16715  enddo
16716  enddo
16717  laginplanevectors = inplanevectors
16718  do k=1, numsrfs
16719  do i=1,3
16720  vectmag(i)=sqrt(laginplanevectors(1,i,k)**2+
16721  & laginplanevectors(2,i,k)**2+laginplanevectors(3,i,k)**2)
16722  enddo
16723  if ( vectmag(1) .gt. zero .and. vectmag(2) .gt. zero) then
16724  laginplanevectors(1:3,1,k) = laginplanevectors(1:3,1,k)
16725  & /vectmag(1)
16726  laginplanevectors(1:3,2,k)=laginplanevectors(1:3,2,k)
16727  & /vectmag(2)
16728  inplane1=-laginplanevectors(2,2,k)*laginplanevectors(3,1,k)
16729  & +laginplanevectors(2,1,k)*laginplanevectors(3,2,k)
16730  inplane2=-laginplanevectors(1,1,k)*laginplanevectors(3,2,k)
16731  & +laginplanevectors(1,2,k)*laginplanevectors(3,1,k)
16732  inplane3=-laginplanevectors(1,2,k)*laginplanevectors(2,1,k)
16733  & +laginplanevectors(1,1,k)*laginplanevectors(2,2,k)
16734  inplanenorm=one/sqrt(inplane1**2+inplane2**2+inplane3**2)
16735  laginplanevectors(1,3,k)=inplane1*inplanenorm
16736  laginplanevectors(2,3,k)=inplane2*inplanenorm
16737  laginplanevectors(3,3,k)=inplane3*inplanenorm
16738  endif
16739  enddo
16740 c
16741  return
16742  end
16743 c
16744 c.........function that integrates a scalar over a boundary
16745 c
16746  subroutine integrscalar(scalInt,scal,srfIdList,numSrfs)
16747 
16748  use pvsqbi !brings ndsurf, NASC
16749 
16750  include "global.h"
16751  include "mpif.h"
16752  include "common_blocks/conpar.h"
16753 C
16754 C Local variables
16755 C
16756  INTEGER ierr
16757  INTEGER npars
16758 C
16759  integer srfidlist(0:maxsurf), numsrfs, i, k
16760  real*8 scal(nshg), scalint(0:maxsurf), scalintproc(0:maxsurf)
16761 
16762  IF (numsrfs .EQ. 0) RETURN
16763 
16764  scalintproc = zero
16765  do i = 1,nshg
16766  do k = 1,numsrfs
16767  if (srfidlist(k).eq.ndsurf(i)) then
16768  scalintproc(k) = scalintproc(k) + nasc(i)*scal(i)
16769  endif
16770  enddo
16771  enddo
16772 c
16773 c at this point, each scalint has its "nodes" contributions to the scalar
16774 c accumulated into scalIntProc. Note, because NASC is on processor this
16775 c will NOT be the scalar for the surface yet
16776 c
16777 c.... reduce integrated scalar for each surface, push on scalInt
16778 c
16779  npars=maxsurf+1
16780  call mpi_allreduce(scalintproc, scalint, npars,
16781  & mpi_double_precision, mpi_sum, mpi_comm_world,ierr)
16782 
16783  return
16784  end
16785 
16787 
16788  subroutine outputdatafile(DataFile, nrows, ncolms, Filename,
16789  & unitnumber)
16790 
16791  include "global.h"
16792 C
16793 C Local variables
16794 C
16795  INTEGER i, n
16796 C
16797  character(len=*) filename
16798  real*8 datafile(nrows,ncolms)
16799  integer nrows, ncolms, unitnumber
16800  integer ioerr
16801 
16802  open(unit=unitnumber, file=filename,status='replace',iostat=ioerr)
16803 
16804  if (ioerr.eq.0) then
16805  write(unitnumber,*) nrows
16806  do i=1, nrows
16807  write(unitnumber,*) (datafile(i,n),n=1, ncolms)
16808  enddo
16809  else
16810  write(*,*) 'IO_ERROR file: ',filename,' code: ',ioerr
16811  endif
16812 
16813  close(unitnumber)
16814 
16815  return
16816  end
